Dreamer_Flow000.EuDutch:
Here's a tip! When you need to land
on a tight space, just [setfontcol red]jump and spin[setfontcol none]!
Want to see how?
Dreamer_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Here's a tip! When you need to land
on a tight space, just [setfontcol red]jump and spin[setfontcol none]!
Want to see how?
Dreamer_Flow000.EuFrench:
Astuce![wait 30] Le [setfontcol red]saut tournoyant[setfontcol black] te
permet de contrôler au mieux ton
saut. Tu veux voir comment on fait?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Dreamer_Flow000.EuGerman:
Kleiner Tipp: [setfontcol red]Dreh dich im Sprung[setfontcol none],
wenn du nur wenig Platz zum Landen
hast! Soll ich es dir zeigen?
Dreamer_Flow000.EuItalian:
Indizio! Quando hai bisogno di un
perfetto atterraggio, [setfontcol red]salta e gira[setfontcol none]!
Vuoi vedere come?
Dreamer_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Un consejillo televisado: para lograr
un aterrizaje perfecto, ¡combina
el [setfontcol red]Salto [setfontcol none]y el [setfontcol red]Giro[setfontcol none]! ¿Te lo enseño?
Dreamer_Flow000.JpJapanese:
ヒント! <ruby>狭<rt>せま</rt></ruby>い<ruby>足場<rt>あしば</rt></ruby>は [setfontcol red]ジャンプ ・ アンド ・ スピン[setfontcol none]!
どんな<ruby>感<rt>かん</rt></ruby>じか <ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>てみますか?
Dreamer_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Here's a tip! When you need to land
on a tight space, just [setfontcol red]jump and spin[setfontcol none]!
Want to see how?
Dreamer_Flow000.UsFrench:
Astuce! Pour vous assurer d'atterrir
à un endroit précis, essayez de
[setfontcol red]sauter, puis de tourbillonner[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Voulez-vous en voir un exemple?
Dreamer_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Un teleconsejo: para aterrizar con
precisión, ¡combina el [setfontcol red]Salto [setfontcol none]y el [setfontcol red]Giro[setfontcol none]!
¿Quieres ver cómo se hace?

Dreamer_Flow002.EuGerman:
Na gut, das schaffst
du auch allein!
Dreamer_Flow002.JpJapanese: それでは がんばって!

DreamerEnd000.EuDutch:
Get some [setfontcol red]extra height[setfontcol none] by [setfontcol blue]jumping and
[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]spinning in mid-air[setfontcol none]![newpage]
[setfontcol black]This is a great way to pull off a
[setfontcol blue]precise landing[setfontcol black]![setfontcol blue][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
DreamerEnd000.EuEnglish:
Get some [setfontcol red]extra height[setfontcol none] by [setfontcol blue]jumping and
[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]spinning in mid-air[setfontcol none]![newpage]
[setfontcol black]This is a great way to pull off a
[setfontcol blue]precise landing[setfontcol black]![setfontcol blue][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
DreamerEnd000.EuFrench:
Ecoute bien: le fait de [setfontcol blue]tournoyer [setfontcol black]te
permet d'aller un peu [setfontcol red]plus loin[setfontcol black]![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][newpage]
Utilise donc le [setfontcol blue]saut tournoyant[setfontcol none] si tu
veux aller [setfontcol red]plus loin[setfontcol none], [setfontcol red]plus haut[setfontcol none], et
[setfontcol blue]atterrir comme un vrai pro[setfontcol none]!
DreamerEnd000.EuGerman:
[setfontcol black]Zögere nicht, dich während eines
Sprungs zu [setfontcol blue]drehen[setfontcol black][setfontcol none][setfontcol black].[wait 15] So kommst du
[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]höher und weiter[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]![setfontcol none][setfontcol black][newpage]
Außerdem lässt sich so eine
[setfontcol blue]kontrolliertere Landung[setfontcol black] hinlegen.[setfontcol none]
DreamerEnd000.EuItalian:
Per un salto [setfontcol red]più alto e più lungo[setfontcol none],
[setfontcol blue]salta e fai una piroetta mentre
sei in aria[setfontcol none]![newpage]
[setfontcol black]Questa tecnica potrà esserti utile
anche quando devi effettuare un
[setfontcol blue]atterraggio perfetto[setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]
DreamerEnd000.EuSpanish:
Si ves que tu salto se va a quedar
un pelín corto, ¡haz un [setfontcol blue]Giro[setfontcol none]![wait 15]
¡Notarás la diferencia![newpage]
[setfontcol black]Es una manera genial de[setfontcol red] [setfontcol black][setfontcol blue]controlar
esos aterrizajes[setfontcol black]..[setfontcol none][setfontcol black].[setfontcol none]
DreamerEnd000.JpJapanese:
ジャンプした<ruby>後<rt>あと</rt></ruby>、 もうちょっとで<ruby>届<rt>とど</rt></ruby>きそう!
そんな<ruby>時<rt>とき</rt></ruby>は <ruby>迷<rt>まよ</rt></ruby>わず[setfontcol blue]スピン[setfontcol none]![wait 15]で [setfontcol red]さらに<ruby>跳<rt>と</rt></ruby>べます[setfontcol none]![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]<ruby>狭<rt>せま</rt></ruby>い<ruby>足場<rt>あしば</rt></ruby>に<ruby>着地<rt>ちゃくち</rt></ruby>する<ruby>時<rt>とき</rt></ruby>[setfontcol black]や[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]
[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]<ruby>高<rt>たか</rt></ruby>くジャンプしたい<ruby>時<rt>とき</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]にも<ruby>便利<rt>べんり</rt></ruby>です
DreamerEnd000.UsEnglish:
Get some [setfontcol red]extra height[setfontcol none] by [setfontcol blue]jumping and
[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]spinning in midair[setfontcol none]![newpage]
[setfontcol black]This is a great way to pull off a
[setfontcol blue]precise landing[setfontcol black]![setfontcol blue][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
DreamerEnd000.UsFrench:
Pour prolonger un saut, n'hésitez
pas à [setfontcol blue]tourbillonner[setfontcol none]![wait 15] Vous irez [setfontcol red]un peu
plus haut et un peu plus loin[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Cette technique est parfaite pour
[setfontcol blue]atterrir dans les endroits étroits [setfontcol none]et
pour [setfontcol red]sauter un peu plus haut[setfontcol none].
DreamerEnd000.UsSpanish:
¡Para mantenerte en el aire un poco
más, no dudes en usar el [setfontcol blue]Giro[setfontcol none]![wait 15]
¡Podrás llegar [setfontcol red]un poquito más alto[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Es una buena técnica para [setfontcol red]saltar más
alto [setfontcol black]y [setfontcol black][setfontcol blue]controlar esos aterrizajes[setfontcol black]..[setfontcol black][setfontcol black].[setfontcol black][setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Kinopio001.EuDutch:
I can't see a thing without my
glasses! I hope they're safe!
Kinopio001.EuEnglish:
I can't see a thing without my
glasses! I hope they're safe!
Kinopio001.EuFrench:
Excuse-moi, mais... j'ai fait tomber
mes lunettes. Je ne vois même pas
assez bien pour les trouver!
Kinopio001.EuGerman:
Auweia... Wo ist meine Brille?!? Ohne
sie kann ich sie nicht... [setfontsize small]wiederfinden...
Kinopio001.EuItalian:
Scusa... Mi sono caduti gli occhiali...
E non ci vedo abbastanza per trovarli!
Kinopio001.EuSpanish:
Se me han caído las gafas
y no veo ni torta...
Kinopio001.JpJapanese:
メガネ なくしちゃいました…
うー・・・ うまく<ruby>掘<rt>ほ</rt></ruby>れないです～～～～
Kinopio001.UsEnglish:
I can't see a thing without my
glasses! I hope they're safe!
Kinopio001.UsFrench:
Ack! J'ai échappé mes lunettes!
Je ne vois rien... Est-ce que je
creuse à la bonne place?
Kinopio001.UsSpanish:
Disculpa, ¡perdí mis lentes! 
No veo... nada, nada...

Tico010.EuDutch:
If you need health, shoot a [icon StarBit] at one
of those [setfontcol yellow]shiny spots on the ground[setfontcol none].[newpage]
A [icon Coin] will pop out that will [setfontcol blue]restore
some of your life[setfontcol none]!

If you need health, shoot a [icon StarBit] at one
of those [setfontcol yellow]shiny spots on the ground[setfontcol none].[newpage]
A [icon Coin] will pop out that will [setfontcol blue]restore
some of your life[setfontcol none]!
Tico010.EuFrench:
Si tu es en mauvaise posture, tire
un [icon StarBit] sur ces petits [setfontcol yellow]points dorés
plantés dans le sol[setfontcol none].[newpage]
Une [icon Coin] apparaîtra et tu pourras
[setfontcol blue]récupérer un peu d'énergie[setfontcol none]!
Tico010.EuGerman:
Wenn es knapp wird, schieß
einfach ein [icon StarBit] [setfontcol purple]Sternenteil [setfontcol none]auf die
[setfontcol yellow]schimmernden Punkte am Boden[setfontcol none].[newpage]
Eine [icon Coin] [setfontcol yellow]Münze [setfontcol none]wird erscheinen,
die deine [setfontcol blue]Lebenskraft wiederauffüllt[setfontcol none]!

Se sei a corto di energia, spara delle
[setfontcol purple]Astroschegge [setfontcol none][icon StarBit] a quei [setfontcol yellow]punti gialli
sul terreno[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Salterà fuori una [setfontcol yellow]Moneta[setfontcol none] [icon Coin] che
ti permetterà di [setfontcol blue]recuperare un po'
di energia[setfontcol none]!
Tico010.EuSpanish:
Cuando tengas poca energía, lanza [icon StarBit]
a uno de esos [setfontcol yellow]puntos brillantes
que hay en el suelo[setfontcol none].[newpage]
¡Sacarás una [icon Coin] y podrás [setfontcol blue]recuperar
energía[setfontcol none]!

ピンチになったら [setfontcol yellow]<ruby>足元<rt>あしもと</rt></ruby>の<ruby>光<rt>ひかり</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]に 
[icon StarBit][setfontcol red]スターピース[setfontcol none]を<ruby>当<rt>あ</rt></ruby>ててください[newpage]
そうすれば [icon Coin][setfontcol red]コイン[setfontcol black]が<ruby>出<rt>で</rt></ruby>るので
[setfontcol blue]<ruby>体力<rt>たいりょく</rt></ruby>を<ruby>回復<rt>かいふく</rt></ruby>[setfontcol black]できます![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

If you need health, shoot a [icon StarBit] at one
of those [setfontcol yellow]shiny spots on the ground[setfontcol none].[newpage]
A [icon Coin] will pop out that will [setfontcol blue]restore
some of your life[setfontcol none]!

un de [setfontcol yellow]ces ronds dorés sur le sol[setfontcol none].[newpage]

Pichan000_Flow000.EuDutch:
[setfontcol red]Fluzzard[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol red]Fluzzard[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol black]He [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]says [setfontcol blue]you're
OK [setfontcol black][setfontcol none]and that you can glide with him.[setfontcol black][newpage]
Will you glide with [setfontcol red]Fluzzard[setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Fluzzard[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol red]Fluzzard[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol black]He [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]says [setfontcol blue]you're
OK [setfontcol black][setfontcol none]and that you can glide with him.[setfontcol black][newpage]
Will you glide with [setfontcol red]Fluzzard[setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow000.EuFrench:
[setfontcol red]Araplane[setfontcol none] dit que [setfontcol blue]tu es un chic type[setfontcol none]!
Chic type! Chic type! Il aimerait bien
planer avec toi.[setfontcol black][newpage]
[setfontcol black]Yark! [setfontcol black]Tu veux planer avec [setfontcol red]Araplane[setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Dieser [setfontcol red]Tuku-Gleiter[setfontcol none] hier? [setfontcol black]Er [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]kann
dich leiden[setfontcol none], also darfst du dich
an seine Krallen hängen.[setfontcol black][newpage]
Möchtest du mit dem
[setfontcol red]Tuku-Gleiter[setfontcol black] fliegen?!?[setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow000.EuItalian:
[setfontcol red]Alapinta[setfontcol none] dice che [setfontcol blue]gli piaci [setfontcol none]e che puoi
volare con lui...[newpage]
Allora, vuoi volare con [setfontcol red]Alapinta[setfontcol none]?
Pichan000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Oye, el [setfontcol red]Guacaplano [setfontcol none]dice que [setfontcol blue]se
fía de ti [setfontcol none]y que puedes volar con él.
¿Quieres volar?
Pichan000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
コイツ! コイツ! [setfontcol red]グライバード[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]
[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]コイツ[setfontcol black]が[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]アナタのコト [setfontcol none]<ruby>気<rt>き</rt></ruby>になるんだって![newpage]
[setfontcol black]アナタとなら、[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol blue]うまく うまく とべる[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]かも[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]?!
[setfontcol red]グライバード[setfontcol black]と <ruby>一緒<rt>いっしょ</rt></ruby>にとんで![setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow000.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Fluzzard[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol red]Fluzzard[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol black]He [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]says [setfontcol blue]you're
OK [setfontcol black][setfontcol none]and that you can glide with him.[setfontcol black][newpage]
Will you glide with [setfontcol red]Fluzzard[setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow000.UsFrench:
Mon ami [setfontcol red]Araplane [setfontcol none]juste là? Il dit que
tu es [setfontcol blue]gentil[setfontcol none]. Il voudrait que tu planes
avec lui. Planer! Avec lui! Oui![newpage]
Alors, veux-tu planer? Avec lui? Hm?
Pichan000_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡[setfontcol red]Guacaplano[setfontcol none]! ¡[setfontcol red]Guacaplano[setfontcol none]! Dice que
[setfontcol blue]confía en ti [setfontcol none]y puedes volar con él.[setfontcol black][newpage]
¿Quieres volar con [setfontcol red]Guacaplano[setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]

Pichan000_Flow001.EuDutch:
If you can glide through [setfontcol yellow]the big sun
circle[setfontcol none] at the end, [setfontcol red]you win[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red] You win[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red]
[setfontcol black]But it's not easy! Not easy![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow001.EuEnglish:
If you can glide through [setfontcol yellow]the big sun
circle[setfontcol none] at the end, [setfontcol red]you win[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red] You win[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red]
[setfontcol black]But it's not easy! Not easy![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow001.EuFrench:
Il faut traverser le [setfontcol yellow]portail en forme
de soleil[setfontcol none] pour gagner[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]! [setfontcol red]Gagner[setfontcol black]!
[setfontcol red]Gagner[setfontcol black]! Mais c'est dur! Yark! Yark![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow001.EuGerman:
Wenn du durch den [setfontcol yellow]großen Sonnenkranz
[setfontcol none]am Ende segelst, [setfontcol red]gewinnst du[setfontcol black]! [setfontcol red]Gewinnst
du[setfontcol black]! Einfach ist es nicht[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]! Nicht einfach![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow001.EuItalian:
Se riesci a volare attraverso il
[setfontcol yellow]grande cerchio solare [setfontcol none]finale, [setfontcol red]vinci[setfontcol none]!
[setfontcol red]Vinci[setfontcol none]! Ma non sarà facile! Facile!
Pichan000_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Atraviesa el [setfontcol yellow]gran círculo con forma
de sol [setfontcol none]que hay al final y [setfontcol red]ganarás[setfontcol none]!
¡Ojo, no es moco de [setfontcol red]Guacaplano[setfontcol none]!
Pichan000_Flow001.JpJapanese:
<ruby>戦場<rt>せんじょう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>先<rt>さき</rt></ruby>の[setfontcol yellow]おおきな<ruby>太陽<rt>たいよう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>輪<rt>わ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]をくぐれば
[setfontcol red]ゴール! [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]ゴール![setfontcol black] ・・・タイヘンダヨ![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow001.UsEnglish:
If you can glide through [setfontcol yellow]the big sun
circle[setfontcol none] at the end, [setfontcol red]you win[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red] You win[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red]
[setfontcol black]But it's not easy! Not easy![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Pichan000_Flow001.UsFrench:
Si tu traverses le [setfontcol yellow]gros cercle en
forme de soleil [setfontcol none]à la fin, [setfontcol red]tu gagnes[setfontcol none]!
[setfontcol red]Tu gagnes[setfontcol none]! Mais c'est difficile!
Pichan000_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡Si planeas a través del [setfontcol yellow]gran círculo
solar[setfontcol none] que está al final, tú [setfontcol red]ganarás[setfontcol black]!
¡[setfontcol red]Ganarás[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red][setfontcol black] ¡Pero no es fácil![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Pichan000_Flow002.EuDutch:
Too bad! So sad! Come back some
other time and fly!
Pichan000_Flow002.EuEnglish:
Too bad! So sad! Come back some
other time and fly!
Pichan000_Flow002.EuFrench:
C'est trop bête! Bête! Bête! Reviens
nous voir si tu veux planer!
Pichan000_Flow002.EuGerman:
Tschüss! Tschüss! Zu viel Angst,
um zu [setfontcol black]fliegen[setfontcol none]! Angst! Angst!
Pichan000_Flow002.EuItalian:
Peccato! Peccato! Torna un'altra
volta per provare a volare!
Pichan000_Flow002.EuSpanish:
¿No te atreves? Bueno, ¡aquí te
espero por si cambias de opinión!
Pichan000_Flow002.JpJapanese:
ザンネン! ザンネン! 
そのうち <ruby>一緒<rt>いっしょ</rt></ruby>にとんで!
Pichan000_Flow002.UsEnglish:
Too bad! So sad! Come back some
other time and fly!
Pichan000_Flow002.UsFrench:
C'est triste! Trop triste! Reviens
plus tard si tu veux voler!
Pichan000_Flow002.UsSpanish:
¡Qué mal! ¡Qué triste! ¡Vuelve pronto
y anímate a volar!

PichanRacer000_Flow000.EuDutch:
Race! Race! All right, it's on! [newpage]
I'm the [setfontcol red]best there is[setfontcol none] - just try me!
I never lose a race!
PichanRacer000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Race! Race! All right, it's on! [newpage]
I'm the [setfontcol red]best there is[setfontcol none] - just try me!
I never lose a race!
PichanRacer000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Course! Course! C'est parti![newpage]
Je suis [setfontcol red]le plus rapide de la galaxie[setfontcol none]!
Yark! Yark! Je n'ai jamais perdu!
Tu veux planer? Planer! Planer!
PichanRacer000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Wettflug! Wettflug! Los geht's! [newpage]
Ich bin der [setfontcol red]heißeste Vogel[setfontcol none], schneller
geht es nicht! Geht nicht! Ich habe 
noch nie verloren! Nie verloren!
PichanRacer000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Gara! Gara! Vediamo chi vince![newpage]
Qui il [setfontcol red]migliore[setfontcol none] sono io! Non perdo
mai una gara! Vuoi sfidarmi?
PichanRacer000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Una carrera! ¡Una carrera!
¡Menudo carrerón tengo montado! [newpage]
Yo soy [setfontcol red]el más rápido de la galaxia[setfontcol none],
¡por supuesto! ¡Jamás he perdido
una carrera! ¿Quieres competir?
PichanRacer000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
きたぜ! きたぜ! ガチンコ <ruby>勝負<rt>しょうぶ</rt></ruby>だ! [newpage]
[setfontcol red]チームのヘッド[setfontcol none]の<ruby>名<rt>な</rt></ruby>にかけて
レース! レース! <ruby>負<rt>ま</rt></ruby>ける<ruby>気<rt>き</rt></ruby>しねェ!!
PichanRacer000_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Race! Race! All right, it's on! [newpage]
I'm the [setfontcol red]best there is[setfontcol none]--just try me!
I never lose a race!
PichanRacer000_Flow000.UsFrench:
La course! La course! Yahouuu![newpage]
Je suis le [setfontcol red]meilleur de la galaxie[setfontcol none]! Fais
la course contre moi! Je ne perds
jamais!
PichanRacer000_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Una carrera! ¡Una carrera![newpage]
¡Soy el [setfontcol red]mejor de todos[setfontcol none], compruébalo!
¡Yo nunca pierdo una carrera! ¡Nunca!

PichanRacer000_Flow001.EuDutch:
What? What?! Running away?
Too scared?
PichanRacer000_Flow001.EuEnglish:
What? What?! Running away?
Too scared?
PichanRacer000_Flow001.EuFrench:
Quoi! Quoi! Tu te débines?
Yark! Trouillard! Trouillard!
PichanRacer000_Flow001.EuGerman:
Was, was? Du läufst davon? Davon?!?
Angsthase! Angsthase! Braaaak!
PichanRacer000_Flow001.EuItalian:
Cosa? Scappi via? Via?
Hai paura? Paura?
PichanRacer000_Flow001.JpJapanese:
マジか?! マジか?! あんた <ruby>逃<rt>に</rt></ruby>げんのか!
おう! おう!
PichanRacer000_Flow001.UsEnglish:
What? What?! Running away?
Too scared?
PichanRacer000_Flow001.UsFrench:
Quoi, quoi? On a trop peur pour
faire la course? Trop peur?

PichanRacer000_Flow002.EuDutch:
It's a showdown. Showdown! This one
is for real. Let's go!
PichanRacer000_Flow002.EuEnglish:
It's a showdown. Showdown! This one
is for real. Let's go!
PichanRacer000_Flow002.EuFrench:
C'est l'heure de vérité! Heure! Heure!
Fini de rigoler, en avant! Yark! Yark!
PichanRacer000_Flow002.EuGerman:
Ein Duell! Duell der Schnellsten! 
Jetzt kommt's drauf an. Los geht's!
PichanRacer000_Flow002.EuItalian:
Una sfida! Sfida! Non è uno scherzo!
Dai, su! Su!
PichanRacer000_Flow002.EuSpanish:
¡Reto! ¡Reto! ¡Y no creas que me
podrás ganar fácilmente! ¡Vamos!
PichanRacer000_Flow002.JpJapanese:
<ruby>勝負<rt>しょうぶ</rt></ruby>! <ruby>勝負<rt>しょうぶ</rt></ruby>! 
<ruby>本気<rt>マジ</rt></ruby>でいくぜ!! おら! おら!
PichanRacer000_Flow002.UsEnglish:
It's a showdown. Showdown! This one
is for real. Let's go!
PichanRacer000_Flow002.UsFrench:
C'est l'ultime épreuve! Ultime!
Cette fois, c'est la bonne! Allez!
PichanRacer000_Flow002.UsSpanish:
¡Reto! ¡Reto! ¡Y no creas que me
podrás vencer fácilmente! ¡Vamos!

PichanRacer000_Flow003.EuDutch:
Can't believe it! Can't believe it! I'm
not good enough to be the leader![newpage]
You be the [setfontcol red]new leader[setfontcol none]! Leader needs
a trophy. A trophy! Take this [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
PichanRacer000_Flow003.EuEnglish:
Can't believe it! Can't believe it! I'm
not good enough to be the leader![newpage]
You be the [setfontcol red]new leader[setfontcol none]! Leader needs
a trophy. A trophy! Take this [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
PichanRacer000_Flow003.EuFrench:
Pas croyable, pas croyable! Je ne
suis plus le maître du ciel! Yark![newpage]
C'est toi, le nouveau [setfontcol red]maître du ciel[setfontcol none]!
Il te faut un trophée! Trophée!
Trophée! Tiens, prends [setfontcol black]cette [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
PichanRacer000_Flow003.EuGerman:
Es darf nicht wahr sein,
darf nicht sein... Ich bin kein
Spitzenreiter mehr! Nicht mehr![newpage]
Du bist die [setfontcol red]neue Nummer eins[setfontcol none]!
Du brauchst eine Medaille. Medaille!
Genau, nimm diesen [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] Power-Stern[setfontcol black]![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
PichanRacer000_Flow003.EuItalian:
Impossibile! Impossibile! Non sono
abbastanza bravo per essere il
migliore! Migliore![newpage]
Sei tu il [setfontcol red]migliore[setfontcol none]! E il migliore merita
un premio! Ecco una [setfontcol yellow]Superstella[setfontcol none][setfontcol black] [icon PowerStar]![setfontcol none]
PichanRacer000_Flow003.EuSpanish:
No... No... ¡No me lo puedo creer!
¡Ya no soy el líder de esta galaxia![newpage]
¡Tú eres el [setfontcol red]nuevo líder[setfontcol none]!
Todo líder necesita un trofeo... ¡Sí!
Toma esta [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black], ¡menudo trofeo![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
PichanRacer000_Flow003.JpJapanese:
くっそ! ありえねェ・・・!
<ruby>負<rt>ま</rt></ruby>けたからには チームのヘッド<ruby>引退<rt>いんたい</rt></ruby>だぜ・・・[newpage]
[setfontcol red]<ruby>新<rt>あたら</rt></ruby>しいヘッド[setfontcol none]は あんたしか いねェ!!![newpage]
[setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar]コイツ[setfontcol black]は[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol red]ヘッドの<ruby>魂<rt>ソウル</rt></ruby>[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]だ![setfontcol yellow]
[setfontcol black]うけと[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]って[setfontcol none]くれ!
PichanRacer000_Flow003.UsEnglish:
Can't believe it! Can't believe it! I'm
not good enough to be the leader![newpage]
You be the [setfontcol red]new leader[setfontcol none]! Leader needs
a trophy. A trophy! Take this [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
PichanRacer000_Flow003.UsFrench:
Impossible! Impossible...! J'ai perdu!
Je ne suis pas assez bon pour être
le champion de la course![newpage]
Tu es le [setfontcol red]nouveau champion[setfontcol none]! Champion!
Tiens, un trophée pour le champion!
Prends cette [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol none]!
PichanRacer000_Flow003.UsSpanish:
No... No... ¡No me lo puedo creer!
¡Ya no soy el líder de esta galaxia![newpage]
¡Tú eres el [setfontcol red]nuevo líder[setfontcol none]!
Todo líder necesita un trofeo... ¡Sí!
Toma esta [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black], ¡menudo trofeo![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]

PichanRacer000_Flow004.EuDutch:
Little guy! Small fry! C'mon - try!
Try! Is that all you've got?
PichanRacer000_Flow004.EuEnglish:
Little guy! Small fry! C'mon - try!
Try! Is that all you've got?
PichanRacer000_Flow004.EuFrench:
Petit joueur! Petit! Petit! C'est tout
ce que tu sais faire? Yark! Yark!
PichanRacer000_Flow004.EuGerman:
Kleiner Klempner! Klempner, klein!
Wirst du mein Rivale sein? Rivale!
PichanRacer000_Flow004.EuItalian:
Ehi, tu! Ehi, tu! Dovresti impegnarti
per davvero! Davvero!
PichanRacer000_Flow004.EuSpanish:
¡Pequeñajo, renacuajo! ¿Estás
buscando un atajo? ¿Eso es todo
lo que sabes hacer?
PichanRacer000_Flow004.JpJapanese:
チンタラ! チンタラ! ・・・<ruby>本気<rt>マジ</rt></ruby>でやれよ?! 
そんなもんかよ?! おら! おら!
PichanRacer000_Flow004.UsEnglish:
Little guy! Small fry! C'mon--try!
Try! Is that all you've got?
PichanRacer000_Flow004.UsFrench:
C'est ce que tu appelles planer?![newpage]
Tu es encore trop petit, un tout
petit poussin! Tu dois apprendre
à planer! À planer comme un grand!
PichanRacer000_Flow004.UsSpanish:
¡Pequeñín! ¡Chiquilín!
¡Por lo menos llega hasta el fin!
¿O no das más?

SignBoard000.EuDutch:

Tilt [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]to the left or right[setfontcol none] to turn!
Point [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol blue]down to do a nosedive[setfontcol none]!
It's a fast dive, so be careful!

DemoEpilog000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Ah, c'est parfait. Tout le monde est
réuni à présent.

Jetzt sind alle versammelt.
DemoEpilog000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Oh, bene!
Ora ci siamo tutti!

<ruby>良<rt>よ</rt></ruby>かった
これで みんな<ruby>揃<rt>そろ</rt></ruby>いましたね

Ahh, merveilleux. Nous sommes enfin
tous réunis.

Moc000_Flow000.EuGerman:

[setfontcol blue]Wind [setfontcol black]trägt dich[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]

Moc000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Salta por aquí
y el [setfontcol blue]viento [setfontcol black]te llevará[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]!

Kinopio000.EuDutch:
Move along now. Nothing to see here.[newpage]
[setfontsize large]I'm on CLOUD control![newpage]
[setfontsize small]Ha ha! Get it? Instead of "crowd",
I said... Aww, never mind. Wow, tough galaxy...
Kinopio000.EuEnglish:
Move along now. Nothing to see here.[newpage]
[setfontsize large]I'm on CLOUD control![newpage]
[setfontsize small]Ha ha! Get it? Instead of "crowd",
I said... Aww, never mind. Wow, tough galaxy...
Kinopio000.EuFrench:
Rien à signaler par ici...[newpage]
[setfontsize large]Pas un nuage à l'horizon...[newpage]
[setfontsize small]Ha ha! Tu as compris? Nuage! Comme un...
nuage, quoi. C'est juste... Bon, ça va sinon?
Kinopio000.EuGerman:
Bitte weitergehen, hier gibt es nichts
von Interesse... Außer vielleicht...[newpage]
[setfontsize large]Einer dichten Wolkenhecke![newpage]
[setfontsize small]Haha! Lustig, nicht?[wait 15] Was für ein Wortspiel![wait 30]
Anstelle von „Decke“, deswegen... [wait 15]Schon gut,
schon gut, einen Versuch war's wert...
Kinopio000.EuItalian:
Proseguiamo... Non c'è niente da
vedere, qua...[newpage]
[setfontsize large]Ho la testa completamente
fra le nuvole![newpage]
[setfontsize small]Ahahah! Hai capito?
Non importa... Questa Galassia è stata dura...
Kinopio000.EuSpanish:
[setfontsize large]¡Estamos en las nubes![newpage]
[setfontsize small]¡Ja, ja! ¿Pillas la ironía? Bah, da igual, tienes
bastante con lo difícil que es esta galaxia...
Kinopio000.JpJapanese:
いやぁ、 <ruby>難<rt>むずか</rt></ruby>しすぎて…[newpage]
[unknowncommand 1 2 0][setfontsize large]<ruby>雲<rt>くも</rt></ruby>ったなあ…[newpage]
[setfontsize small]「こまったなあ」 と 「<ruby>雲<rt>くも</rt></ruby>」 をかけてみたんですが…
…………ダジャレってむずかしいですね…
Kinopio000.UsEnglish:
Move along now. Nothing to see here.[newpage]
[setfontsize large]I'm on CLOUD control![newpage]
[setfontsize small]Ha ha! Get it? Instead of "crowd,"
I said... Aww, never mind. Wow, tough galaxy...
Kinopio000.UsFrench:
M. [Mario/Luigi]! Tu devrais t'habiller plus
chaudement! La météo annonce une...[newpage]
[setfontsize large]Tempête de nuage![newpage]
[setfontsize small]Hah! Une tempête de nuage! Neige, nuage...
Hohoho! Sortez vos pelles, c'est l'heure de
pelleter des nuages! Hahaha... ha... heu... Non?
Kinopio000.UsSpanish:
[setfontsize large]¡Estamos en las nubes![newpage]
[setfontsize small]¡Ja, ja! ¿Captas la ironía? Bah, da igual, tienes
bastante con lo difícil que es esta galaxia...

Dreamer_Flow000.EuDutch:

Here's a tip! There's a trick to

Astuce![wait 30] Tu veux voir comment on fait

wie du wie ein [setfontcol red]Profi schwimmst[setfontcol none]?

Indizio! [setfontcol red]Nuota da professionista[setfontcol none]!
Vuoi vedere come?

Un consejillo televisado: [setfontcol red]moverse
como pingüino en el agua [setfontcol none]tiene
su truco. ¿Te lo enseño?
Dreamer_Flow000.JpJapanese:
ヒント! [setfontcol red]<ruby>水<rt>みず</rt></ruby>をスイスイ<ruby>泳<rt>およ</rt></ruby>ぐ[setfontcol black]には[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]?
どんな<ruby>感<rt>かん</rt></ruby>じか <ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>てみますか?
Dreamer_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Here's a tip! There's a trick to
[setfontcol red]swimming like a pro[setfontcol none]! Want to see?

Astuce! Voulez-vous voir la[setfontcol red] meilleure

Un teleconsejo: [setfontcol red]moverse como

Dreamer_Flow002.EuGerman:
Na gut, das schaffst
du auch allein!
Dreamer_Flow002.JpJapanese: それじゃ がんばって!

DreamerEnd000.EuDutch:
On the surface, use [icon ControlStick] to direct
yourself and [icon Zbtn] [setfontcol red][setfontcol black]to[setfontcol red] dive[setfontcol none]. If you're
underwater, use [icon ControlStick] and [icon Abtn] to swim.[newpage]
Press [icon ControlStick] [setfontcol blue]forwards [setfontcol black]to [setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]descend [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]and
[setfontcol blue]back [setfontcol none]to [setfontcol red]surface[setfontcol none]. [wait 15][setfontcol red]Guide yourself [setfontcol none]by
[setfontcol blue]turning left and right[setfontcol none]! Try it out![newpage]
[setfontcol red]If you start running out of air[setfontcol none],
tilt [icon ControlStick] [setfontcol blue]back[setfontcol none][wait 15] and hold [icon Abtn] to get to
the surface... Or find an [setfontcol red]air bubble[setfontcol none]!

ta direction et [setfontcol blue]appuie sur [setfontcol none][icon Abtn] pour

[setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]descendre [setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]et [setfontcol blue]vers le bas [setfontcol black]pour
[setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]remonter[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none].[newpage]
Incline-le vers la [setfontcol blue]gauche [setfontcol black]ou[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black] la [setfontcol blue]droite [setfontcol none][wait 15]

Schwimme an der Oberfläche mit [icon ControlStick]

und drücke [icon Abtn], um zu schwimmen.[newpage]

ihn [setfontcol blue]nach hinten, [setfontcol none]um [setfontcol red]hochzuschauen[setfontcol none].[newpage]

entsprechend. Alles klar?[newpage]

[setfontcol red]bevor dir die Luft ausgeht[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Usa [icon ControlStick] per direzionarti in superficie e

Inclina [icon ControlStick] [setfontcol blue]in avanti [setfontcol black]per [setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]puntare in

[setfontcol blue]Sinistra[setfontcol black] e [setfontcol blue]destra [setfontcol none][wait 15]ti faranno [setfontcol red]girare[setfontcol none]...[newpage]
[setfontcol black]P[setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol black]er [setfontcol red]non rimanere senz'aria[setfontcol none], inclina [icon ControlStick]
[setfontcol blue]indietro [setfontcol none][wait 15]e tieni premuto [icon Abtn] per

[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]hacia delante [setfontcol none]para [setfontcol red]descender [setfontcol black]o a[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]
[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]izquierda[setfontcol black] o [setfontcol blue]derecha [setfontcol black]para[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol red]girar[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none].[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Si necesitas aire[setfontcol none], mantén pulsado [icon Abtn] 
y mueve [icon ControlStick] [setfontcol blue]hacia atrás [setfontcol none]para volver

DreamerEnd000.JpJapanese:
<ruby>水面<rt>すいめん</rt></ruby>を[icon Abtn]で<ruby>泳<rt>およ</rt></ruby>いで [icon Zbtn][setfontcol red]ボタン[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]で [setfontcol red]もぐれます[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
もぐった<ruby>後<rt>あと</rt></ruby>は [icon ControlStick]で<ruby>方向<rt>ほうこう</rt></ruby>を<ruby>決<rt>き</rt></ruby>めて[icon Abtn]で<ruby>進<rt>すす</rt></ruby>みます[newpage]
[setfontcol blue][icon ControlStick]を[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][setfontcol blue]<ruby>奥<rt>おく</rt></ruby>[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]に<ruby>倒<rt>たお</rt></ruby>すと[setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]<ruby>下向<rt>したむ</rt></ruby>き[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol red] [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]<ruby>手前<rt>てまえ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]に<ruby>倒<rt>たお</rt></ruby>すと[setfontcol red]<ruby>上向<rt>うえむ</rt></ruby>き[setfontcol none]
[setfontcol blue]<ruby>左右<rt>さゆう</rt></ruby>に<ruby>倒<rt>たお</rt></ruby>して[setfontcol none]、 [wait 15][setfontcol red][setfontcol black]<ruby>左<rt>ひだり</rt></ruby>や<ruby>右<rt>みぎ</rt></ruby>に[setfontcol red] <ruby>回転<rt>かいてん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]できます[newpage]
[setfontcol red]<ruby>空気<rt>くうき</rt></ruby>がきれる<ruby>前<rt>まえ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]に [icon ControlStick][setfontcol blue]を<ruby>手前<rt>てまえ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]に<ruby>倒<rt>たお</rt></ruby>して[wait 15]
[setfontcol red][icon Abtn]ボタン[setfontcol none]で <ruby>水面<rt>すいめん</rt></ruby>に もどりましょう

Kinopio003_Flow001.EuDutch:
[setfontsize large]GYAH![newpage]
[setfontsize normal]It's you... [Mario/Luigi], right?![wait 30] Like our new
ship? It's called a [setfontcol blue]Starshroom[setfontcol none]!
We're shoving off soon![newpage]
Oh yeah, I forgot to introduce myself![setfontcol black][wait 15]
I found this nifty headlamp, so I am
now the [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]Toad Brigade Captain[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
There's a pretty scary monster
just past here - be careful!

[setfontsize large]Ouah! [setfontsize normal][Mario/Luigi]?! C'est vraiment toi?[wait 15]
Chaleureuses salutations de la part
du [setfontcol red]c[setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol red]a[setfontcol red]pitaine de la brigade Toad[setfontcol black]![setfontcol black][wait 15][setfontcol black][setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]

[setfontcol black]ici car quelque chose de monstrueux
nous bloque le passage![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][newpage]
Heu... Tu n'irais pas dans cette
direction, par hasard?
Kinopio003_Flow001.EuGerman:
[setfontsize large]Huch! [setfontsize normal][Mario/Luigi]?!? Du bist es wirklich![wait 15]
Ich, der [setfontcol red]Kapitän des Suchtrupps[setfontcol black],[setfontcol black][wait 15]
bin hocherfreut, dich hier zu treffen[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red] [setfontcol none][newpage]
Ich habe das [setfontcol blue]Pilz-Raumschiff [setfontcol black]hier [setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]für

dass sich gar nicht weit von hier
etwas Riesiges auf Stelzen bewegt![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][newpage]
Das müssen wir unbedingt
genauer untersuchen!
Kinopio003_Flow001.EuItalian:
[setfontsize large]Aaah! [setfontsize normal][Mario/Luigi]?! Sei proprio tu?![wait 15][newpage]

L'abbiamo chiamata [setfontcol blue]Ufo Fungo[setfontcol black]![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]

[setfontcol black]Dopo aver trovato questa lampada,
[setfontcol black][wait 15][setfontcol black]mi sono autoproclamato[setfontcol none] [setfontcol red]Capitano
Toad[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Fai attenzione perché un mostro
spaventoso è appena passato di qua!
Kinopio003_Flow001.EuSpanish:
[setfontsize large]¡Vaya! [setfontsize normal]¡Pero si eres [Mario/Luigi]!
¿Te mola nuestra [setfontcol blue]Champinave[setfontcol none]?
Vamos a estar un rato por aquí.[setfontcol black][newpage]
Por cierto, me he encontrado
esta linterna, ¡así que ahora
soy el [setfontcol red]jefe de la Cuadrilla Toad[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]![newpage]
Ahí delante hay algo que le pondría
los pelos de punta a más de uno...
¿Vas a ir a echar un vistazo?
Kinopio003_Flow001.JpJapanese:
[setfontsize large]あーーっ!! [setfontsize normal][Mario/Luigi]さんじゃないですか!!![wait 15]
[setfontcol blue]キノコ<ruby>船<rt>せん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]をココに<ruby>停<rt>と</rt></ruby>めて <ruby>正解<rt>せいかい</rt></ruby>でしたね?![newpage]
いやぁ・・・・・・ [Mario/Luigi]さんが
<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>のチリにならなくて <ruby>良<rt>よ</rt></ruby>かったです!![newpage]
あ! <ruby>名乗<rt>なの</rt></ruby>り<ruby>遅<rt>おく</rt></ruby>れました! [setfontcol black][wait 15][setfontcol none]ワタシは[setfontcol red]キノピオ<ruby>隊長<rt>たいちょう</rt></ruby>[setfontcol black]!!
[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black][setfontcol black][wait 15][setfontcol black]まぁ・・・ <ruby>詳<rt>くわ</rt></ruby>しい<ruby>話<rt>はなし</rt></ruby>は<ruby>後<rt>のち</rt></ruby>ほどに![setfontcol none]

ACK! How did you get up here?![newpage]

ahead. Try to find them too!
Tico003.EuFrench:

Ci sono altri [setfontcol yellow]Sfavillotti [setfontcol none][icon Luma] più avanti!
Cerca di trovarli!
Tico003.EuSpanish:
¡Qué susto! ¿Qué haces aquí arriba?[newpage]

¡A ver si los encuentras!

あぁ! ビックリした!
いきなり <ruby>飛<rt>と</rt></ruby>び<ruby>出<rt>で</rt></ruby>てくるなんて![newpage]

[setfontsize large]AAAAAAHH![newpage]
[setfontsize normal]Woah, tu m'as fait peur en sortant de

trouver!

¡AAAH! ¡¿Cómo llegaste hasta aquí?![newpage]
Hay más [setfontcol yellow]amigos[setfontcol none] [icon Luma] míos allí delante.

CareTakerHunter000_Flow000.EuDutch:
You're searching for that [icon PowerStar], right?
I found one of [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]those[setfontcol yellow] things [setfontcol none]down at
the tip earlier.[newpage]
But, hold on! There ain't no such thing
as a free lunch![wait 15] ...Or a free [icon PowerStar].
CareTakerHunter000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
You're searching for that [icon PowerStar], right?
I found one of [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]those[setfontcol yellow] things [setfontcol none]down at
the tip earlier.[newpage]
But, hold on! There ain't no such thing
as a free lunch![wait 15] ...Or a free [icon PowerStar].
CareTakerHunter000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Tu cherches une [icon PowerStar], n'est-ce pas?
J'en ai trouvé [setfontcol yellow]une [setfontcol black]dans la décharge,
il n'y a pas longtemps[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none].[newpage]
Holà, attends! [wait 15]Tu penses que je vais
te la donner comme ça? C'est mal me
connaître! Tout se paye, mon garçon!
CareTakerHunter000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Du bist auf der Suche nach einem
dieser [icon PowerStar], nicht wahr? Ich habe
[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]vorhin im Müll [setfontcol yellow]so einen [setfontcol black]gefunden[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]![newpage]
[setfontcol none]Augenblick! [wait 15]Du glaubst, ich gebe ihn
dir einfach so? Träum weiter,
alles hat seinen Preis!
CareTakerHunter000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Stai cercando una [setfontcol yellow]Superstella[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar]?
Ne ho trovata [setfontcol yellow]una[setfontcol none] nel cestino, prima...[newpage]
Ma aspetta un attimo! [wait 15]Non crederai di
averla gratis! Che mi dai in cambio?
CareTakerHunter000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Estás buscando una [icon PowerStar] de esas, ¿eh?
¡Qué casualidad! No hace mucho que
me encontré [setfontcol yellow]una [setfontcol none]en el vertedero.[newpage]
¡No tan rápido, amigo! [wait 15]¿Crees que
te la voy a dar por tu bigote bonito?
¿Y qué gano yo con eso?
CareTakerHunter000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
アンタ [icon PowerStar]<ruby>探<rt>さが</rt></ruby>しとるんやろ?
ウチ、 この<ruby>前<rt>まえ</rt></ruby> ゴミ<ruby>捨<rt>す</rt></ruby>て<ruby>場<rt>ば</rt></ruby>で[setfontcol yellow]ソレ[setfontcol none]みつけててん[newpage]
でもな?[wait 15] タダでもらえると<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>たら <ruby>大間違<rt>おおまちが</rt></ruby>いや!
<ruby>世<rt>よ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>中<rt>なか</rt></ruby>、 そうアマくないで!
CareTakerHunter000_Flow000.UsEnglish:
You're searching for that [icon PowerStar], right?
I found one of [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]those[setfontcol yellow] things [setfontcol none]at the
garbage dump earlier.[newpage]
But, hold on! There ain't no such thing
as a free lunch![wait 15] ...Or a free [icon PowerStar].
CareTakerHunter000_Flow000.UsFrench:
Tu cherches des [icon PowerStar], non? J'en ai
trouvé [setfontcol black]une [setfontcol none]au dépotoir ce matin.[newpage]
Ah-ah! Un instant![wait 15] Ce n'est pas
gratuit, mon petit. Désolée!
CareTakerHunter000_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Estás buscando una [icon PowerStar], ¿verdad?
Encontré una de esas[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none]entre la basura.[newpage]
¡Pero... un momento! [wait 15]¿Crees que
te la voy a dar por tu bigote bonito?
¿Y qué gano yo con eso?

CareTakerHunter000_Flow002.EuDutch:
Ya know, I just love those [icon Topman] [setfontcol red][setfontcol red]red[setfontcol red]
guys[setfontcol none]! See if you can get [setfontcol red]one o' them
[setfontcol none]to come over [setfontcol blue]here[setfontcol none]!

Ya know, I just love those [icon Topman] [setfontcol red][setfontcol red]red[setfontcol red]
guys[setfontcol none]! See if you can get [setfontcol red]one o' them
[setfontcol none]to come over [setfontcol blue]here[setfontcol none]!

petites [setfontcol red]toupies rouges [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Topman] [setfontcol black]craquantes[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]!
J'adorerais en voir une [setfontcol blue]de plus près[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Elle pourrait me tenir compagnie!

Weißt du was? Ich bin ganz vernarrt

Warum bringst du mir nicht
einen von [icon Topman] [setfontcol red]denen[setfontcol none] [setfontcol blue]hierher[setfontcol black]?[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]

Lo sai che amo quelle [setfontcol red]cosette
rosse [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Topman][setfontcol none]! Perché non cerchi di farne

ウチ、 [setfontcol red][icon Topman]<ruby>赤<rt>あか</rt></ruby>いの[setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol black]が[setfontcol red][setfontcol black] [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]メッチャ<ruby>好<rt>す</rt></ruby>きやねん!

Ya know, I just love those [icon Topman] [setfontcol red][setfontcol red]red[setfontcol red]
guys[setfontcol none]! See if you can get one o' them
to come over [setfontcol blue]here[setfontcol none]!
CareTakerHunter000_Flow002.UsFrench:
J'adore les petites [setfontcol red]toupies [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]rouges [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Topman][setfontcol none]!
Essaie donc d'en attirer une [setfontcol blue]près de
moi[setfontcol none]!
CareTakerHunter000_Flow002.UsSpanish:
¡La verdad, adoro a esas [setfontcol red]criaturitas
rojas [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Topman][setfontcol none]! ¿Qué tal si [setfontcol blue]me traes [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]una[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]

CareTakerHunter000_Flow003.EuFrench:
Apporte-moi donc une de ces jolies
toupies [icon Topman]!

Oooooh! Ist er nicht hinreißend?!?
Sooo süüüß! Vielen Dank!

あぁ～ん♪ めっちゃ<ruby>可愛<rt>かわい</rt></ruby>いわ
おおきに おおきに

Hooon! Elles sont tellement mignonnes!
Merci beaucoup, mon petit!

Caretaker000_Flow000.EuDutch:
I'm goin' nuts here! [wait 30]We're gettin' [setfontcol blue]more
and more [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]boxes of junk [setfontcol none]every day!
Caretaker000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
I'm goin' nuts here! [wait 30]We're gettin' [setfontcol blue]more
and more [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]boxes of junk [setfontcol none]every day!
Caretaker000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Il y a de plus en plus de [setfontcol blue]caisses qui
s'amassent [setfontcol none]ici![wait 30] J'en perds les boulons,
mon garçon!
Caretaker000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Ich dreh noch durch![wait 30]
Tag für Tag bekommen [setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]wir[setfontcol blue]
mehr Kisten voller Schrott[setfontcol none]!
Caretaker000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Questa storia non ha fine! [wait 30]Ogni giorno
[setfontcol blue]si aggiungono nuove casse [setfontcol none]di rifiuti!
Caretaker000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Me tienen de los nervios! [wait 30]¡No hacen
más que traer [setfontcol blue]cajas inútiles[setfontcol none]!
Caretaker000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
ココは <ruby>行<rt>い</rt></ruby>き<ruby>止<rt>ど</rt></ruby>まり! ただのゴミ<ruby>焼却所<rt>しょうきゃくじょ</rt></ruby>や[wait 30]
[setfontcol blue]この<ruby>箱<rt>はこ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]、 ようけ[setfontcol blue]<ruby>増<rt>ふ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]えてまう[setfontcol none]んや! かなわんわ!!
Caretaker000_Flow000.UsEnglish:
I'm goin' nuts here! [wait 30]We're gettin' [setfontcol blue]more
and more [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]boxes of junk [setfontcol none]every day!
Caretaker000_Flow000.UsFrench:
Ça me rend complètement folle! [wait 30]Les
caisses n'arrêtent pas de s'empiler,
ici! On en reçoit [setfontcol blue]chaque jour[setfontcol none]!

¡Ya no aguanto más! [wait 30] ¡Cada día nos
llegan [setfontcol blue]más y más cajas de basura[setfontcol none]!

Caretaker000_Flow001.EuDutch:
Do me a favour and [setfontcol red]burn all of these
up [setfontcol black]right quick. Whaddya say?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Do me a favour and [setfontcol red]burn all of these
up [setfontcol black]right quick. Whaddya say?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow001.EuFrench:
Sois gentil et aide-moi à m'en
débarrasser [setfontcol red]en [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol red]les [setfontcol red]brûlant [setfontcol none]le plus
vite possible...

Tu mir einen Gefallen und [setfontcol red]verbrenne
die lästigen Kisten[setfontcol none], so schnell du
kannst! Wärst du so freundlich[setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow001.EuItalian:
Mi faresti un grosso favore? Dovresti
[setfontcol red]bruciarle tutte [setfontcol none]il più velocemente
possibile! Ti va?
Caretaker000_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Ayúdame y [setfontcol red]quema todas estas cajas
[setfontcol black]tan rápido como puedas. ¿Qué dices?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow001.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]まとめて[setfontcol red]<ruby>燃<rt>も</rt></ruby>やしたろか [setfontcol none]と<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>ってるんや
アンタ!! パパーッと [setfontcol red]<ruby>燃<rt>も</rt></ruby>やしてくれへん[setfontcol none]?
Caretaker000_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Do me a favor and [setfontcol red]burn all of these
up [setfontcol black]right quick. Whaddya say?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow001.UsFrench:
Si tu veux me faire plaisir, [setfontcol red]brûle
toutes ces caisses [setfontcol none]aussi vite que
possible. Ça t'intéresse, petit?
Caretaker000_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Ayúdame a [setfontcol red]quemar todas estas cajas
[setfontcol black]tan rápido como puedas. ¿Qué dices?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Caretaker000_Flow002.EuDutch: Well, let's put you to work, then!
Caretaker000_Flow002.EuEnglish: Well, let's put you to work, then!
Caretaker000_Flow002.EuGerman:
Sehr schön! Dann zeig mal,
was du draufhast!
Caretaker000_Flow002.UsEnglish: Well, let's put you to work, then!

Caretaker000_Flow003.EuDutch:
Ack! Fine. Whatta pain... If ya want
outta here, use that[setfontcol red] pipe over there[setfontcol none].
Caretaker000_Flow003.EuEnglish:
Ack! Fine. Whatta pain... If ya want
outta here, use that[setfontcol red] pipe over there[setfontcol none].
Caretaker000_Flow003.EuFrench:
Ah, malheur! Bon, si tu veux
partir, utilise le [setfontcol red]tuyau là-bas[setfontcol none].
Caretaker000_Flow003.EuGerman:
Oh, ich armer Tropf...[wait 30] Ich sehe
schon, du nimmst in Kauf, dass ich
unter wertlosen Kisten verschwinde![newpage]
Also verschwinde doch auch, am
einfachsten durch die [setfontcol red]Röhre dort
drüben[setfontcol none]. Und überleg's dir noch mal!
Caretaker000_Flow003.EuItalian:
Come vuoi... Peccato! Se te ne vuoi
andare, usa il [setfontcol red]tubo laggiù[setfontcol none]!
Caretaker000_Flow003.EuSpanish:
¡¿Cómo?! Bueno, vale. Si quieres salir
de aquí, métete [setfontcol red]por aquella tubería[setfontcol none].
Caretaker000_Flow003.JpJapanese:
ホンマ、 ナンギやわ～…
あ、 <ruby>帰<rt>かえ</rt></ruby>るんやったら [setfontcol red]そこの<ruby>土管<rt>どかん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]から<ruby>帰<rt>かえ</rt></ruby>ってな
Caretaker000_Flow003.UsEnglish:
Ack! Fine. Whatta pain... If ya want
outta here, use that[setfontcol red] pipe over there[setfontcol none].
Caretaker000_Flow003.UsFrench:
Bon. Tant pis... Si tu veux t'en aller,
passe par le [setfontcol red]tuyau juste là[setfontcol none].
Caretaker000_Flow003.UsSpanish:
¡Oh, está bien! Si quieres salir de
este lugar, usa [setfontcol red]esa tubería de allí[setfontcol none].

Caretaker000_Flow004.EuFrench: Tu veux bien essayer, mon petit?

Hilfst du mir mit

Caretaker000_Flow004.JpJapanese: ん? やってくれるん?

Caretaker000_Flow005.EuDutch:

Now, THAT'S more like it! Thanks![newpage]

¡Ooh, ha sido impresionante! ¡Gracias![newpage]

おおきに おおきに!

Now, THAT'S more like it! Thanks![newpage]

Caretaker000_Flow006.EuDutch: Well, aren't you just one huge help!
Caretaker000_Flow006.EuEnglish: Well, aren't you just one huge help!
Caretaker000_Flow006.EuFrench:
Eh bien, eh bien, que dites-vous de

Caretaker000_Flow007.EuDutch:
Oh, no no no! That won't do at all!
Put some elbow grease into it!
Caretaker000_Flow007.EuEnglish:
Oh, no no no! That won't do at all!
Put some elbow grease into it!

Non, non, non! Ça ne va pas du tout!

あかんあかん!

Oh, no no no! That won't do at all!

ça, mon petit!
Caretaker000_Flow007.UsSpanish:
¡Oooh, no, no, no! ¡Así no lo lograrás!
¡Inténtalo de nuevo con más ganas!

Caretaker000_Flow000.EuDutch:
This is the end of the road for all
the rubbish in the universe![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]So many boxes[setfontcol none]... It's gettin' way
outta control, if ya ask me!
Caretaker000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
This is the end of the road for all
the rubbish in the universe![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]So many boxes[setfontcol none]... It's gettin' way
outta control, if ya ask me!
Caretaker000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Bienvenue dans la déchetterie de
la galaxie![newpage]
Il y a [setfontcol blue]tant [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]de caisses[setfontcol none] que j'en
perds les boulons!
Caretaker000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Willkommen auf der Mülldeponie
des vorderen Universums![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]So viele Kisten Schrott[setfontcol none]... So langsam
nimmt das wirklich überhand!
Caretaker000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Tutta la spazzatura dell'universo
finisce qui! Non è possibile![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Quante casse[setfontcol none]... La situazione mi sta
sfuggendo di mano!
Caretaker000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Este es el basurero oficial
del universo...[newpage]
¡Nos llegan [setfontcol blue]tantas cajas [setfontcol none]que esto
se nos está yendo de las manos!
Caretaker000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
ココは <ruby>行<rt>い</rt></ruby>き<ruby>止<rt>ど</rt></ruby>まり! ただのゴミ<ruby>焼却所<rt>しょうきゃくじょ</rt></ruby>や[wait 30]
[setfontcol blue]この<ruby>箱<rt>はこ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]、 ようけ[setfontcol blue]<ruby>増<rt>ふ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]えてまう[setfontcol none]んや! かなわんわ!!
Caretaker000_Flow000.UsEnglish:
This is the end of the road for all
the trash in the universe![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]So many boxes[setfontcol none]... It's gettin' way
outta control, if ya ask me!
Caretaker000_Flow000.UsFrench:
Ici, c'est carrément le dépotoir de
l'univers, comme tu peux le voir![wait 30]
[setfontcol blue]Toutes ces caisses[setfontcol none]... Ça me dépasse!
Caretaker000_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Parece que todos los desperdicios
del mundo vienen a parar aquí![newpage]
¡[setfontcol blue]Demasiadas cajas[setfontcol none]! La verdad es que
en mi opinión sobran todas.

Caretaker000_Flow001.EuDutch:
Do me a favour and [setfontcol red]burn all of these
[setfontcol black]as fast as ya can. Whaddya say?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Do me a favour and [setfontcol red]burn all of these
[setfontcol black]as fast as ya can. Whaddya say?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow001.EuFrench:
Tu veux bien m'aider [setfontcol red]en [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol red]les [setfontcol red]brûlant [setfontcol none]le
plus vite possible?
Caretaker000_Flow001.EuGerman:
Tu mir einen Gefallen und [setfontcol red]verbrenne
sie[setfontcol black],[setfontcol red] [setfontcol black]so schnell du kannst.
Kannst du das für mich erledigen?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow001.EuItalian:
Mi faresti un favore? Puoi [setfontcol red]bruciare
tutte queste casse [setfontcol none]al più presto?
Allora?
Caretaker000_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¿Por qué no me haces un favorcillo
y [setfontcol red]quemas todas esas cajas [setfontcol none]tan rápido
como puedas[setfontcol black]? ¿Qué me dices?[setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow001.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol black]まとめて[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]<ruby>燃<rt>も</rt></ruby>やしたろか [setfontcol none]と<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>ってるんや
アンタ!! パパーッと [setfontcol red]<ruby>燃<rt>も</rt></ruby>やしてくれへん[setfontcol none]?
Caretaker000_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Do me a favor and [setfontcol red]burn all of these
[setfontcol black]as fast as ya can. Whaddya say?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow001.UsFrench:
Mes articulations sont si rouillées, je
ne peux rien faire... Pourrais-tu les
[setfontcol red]brûler[setfontcol none], toi? [setfontcol black]Aussi vite que possible[setfontcol none]?
Caretaker000_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Hazme un favor y [setfontcol red]quémalas todas [setfontcol black]tan
rápido como puedas. ¿Qué me dices?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Caretaker000_Flow002.EuDutch: All right - I'll leave ya to it!
Caretaker000_Flow002.EuEnglish: All right - I'll leave ya to it!
Caretaker000_Flow002.EuFrench:
Parfait, au travail, mon petit!
Fais rouler tes mécaniques!
Caretaker000_Flow002.EuGerman: Alles klar, ich überlasse dir das!
Caretaker000_Flow002.UsEnglish: All right--I'll leave ya to it!
Caretaker000_Flow002.UsFrench: Parfait! Fais de ton mieux, petit!
Caretaker000_Flow002.UsSpanish: ¡Está bien, te dejo a lo tuyo!

Caretaker000_Flow003.EuDutch:
Ack. All right. If you wanna get outta
here, take [setfontcol red]that pipe [setfontcol none]over there.
Caretaker000_Flow003.EuEnglish:
Ack. All right. If you wanna get outta
here, take [setfontcol red]that pipe [setfontcol none]over there.
Caretaker000_Flow003.EuFrench:
Ah, les jeunes d'aujourd'hui...
Bon, si tu veux partir, utilise
le [setfontcol red]tuyau[setfontcol none].
Caretaker000_Flow003.EuGerman:
Ich verstehe. Du bist dir wohl zu fein
dafür?!? Mach dich einfach [setfontcol red]durch die
Röhre dort [setfontcol black]wieder [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]aus dem Staub!!!
Caretaker000_Flow003.EuItalian:
Accipicchia! E va beh, se te ne vuoi
andare, puoi usare il [setfontcol red]tubo[setfontcol none] [setfontcol red]laggiù[setfontcol none]!
Caretaker000_Flow003.EuSpanish:
¡¿Cómo?! Bueno, no te voy a obligar...
Si quieres salir de aquí, usa esa
[setfontcol green][setfontcol red]tubería [setfontcol green][setfontcol black]de allí[setfontcol green][setfontcol none].
Caretaker000_Flow003.JpJapanese:
ホンマ、 ナンギやわ～…
あ、 <ruby>帰<rt>かえ</rt></ruby>るんやったら [setfontcol red]そこの<ruby>土管<rt>どかん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]から<ruby>帰<rt>かえ</rt></ruby>ってな
Caretaker000_Flow003.UsEnglish:
Ack. All right. If you wanna get outta
here, take [setfontcol red]that pipe [setfontcol none]over there.
Caretaker000_Flow003.UsFrench:
Argh, bon... D'accord. Si tu veux t'en
aller, passe par le [setfontcol red]tuyau [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]juste là[setfontcol none].
Caretaker000_Flow003.UsSpanish:
¡Ay! De acuerdo. Si quieres salir de
aquí, métete por [setfontcol red]esa tubería[setfontcol none] de allí.

Caretaker000_Flow004.EuFrench:
Alors, mon bichon, tu veux
bien m'aider?
Caretaker000_Flow004.EuGerman: Nun, was sagst du? Hilfst du mir?
Caretaker000_Flow004.JpJapanese: ん? やってくれるん?
Caretaker000_Flow004.UsFrench:
Alors, petit? Voudrais-tu me donner
un coup de main?

Caretaker000_Flow005.EuDutch:
Oh, thanks! That looks great![newpage]
Here ya go - take this [icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]! Boy, I wish
more folks worked as hard as you![setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow005.EuEnglish:
Oh, thanks! That looks great![newpage]
Here ya go - take this [icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]! Boy, I wish
more folks worked as hard as you![setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow005.EuFrench:
Merci, mon garçon, tout est en ordre![newpage]
Tiens, pour la peine, voici [setfontcol yellow]cette[setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]!
Ah, si tous les jeunes pouvaient
être aussi serviables que toi!
Caretaker000_Flow005.EuGerman:
Oh, vielen Dank! Das sieht super aus!
Nun zu meinem Teil der Abmachung:
Hier hast du deinen [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]![newpage]
Meine Güte, wenn doch nur alle so
fleißig wären wie du...[setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow005.EuItalian:
Oh, grazie! Hai ripulito tutto!
Grandioso![newpage]
Ecco! Prendi questa [setfontcol yellow]Superstella[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]!
Magari lavorassero tutti come te![setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow005.EuSpanish:
Muchas gracias, ¡ya está todo mucho
más despejado![newpage]
Toma esta [icon PowerStar] como recompensa.
¡Chaval, ojalá todo el mundo fuera
tan eficiente como tú!
Caretaker000_Flow005.JpJapanese:
おおきに おおきに!
キレーなったわ![newpage]
そや! [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]コレ[setfontcol none] <ruby>拾<rt>ひろ</rt></ruby>たヤツやけど、
よかったら <ruby>持<rt>も</rt></ruby>って<ruby>行<rt>い</rt></ruby>き!
Caretaker000_Flow005.UsEnglish:
Oh, thanks! That looks great![newpage]
Here ya go--take [setfontcol black]this[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]! Boy, I wish
more folks worked as hard as you![setfontcol none]
Caretaker000_Flow005.UsFrench:
Oh! Merci, merci beaucoup! C'est
tellement plus... aéré![newpage]
Tiens, prends [setfontcol black]cette [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! Aaah, si tous
les jeunes pouvaient être aussi
serviables que toi...
Caretaker000_Flow005.UsSpanish:
¡Muchas gracias! ¡Se ve impecable![newpage]
[setfontcol black]¡Aquí tienes esta [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]! ¡Ojalá todos
trabajaran con tanto empeño como tú![setfontcol none]

Caretaker000_Flow006.EuDutch: Now, that's a job well done!
Caretaker000_Flow006.EuEnglish: Now, that's a job well done!
Caretaker000_Flow006.EuFrench:
Mon petit, tu as travaillé
comme un vrai robot!
Caretaker000_Flow006.EuItalian: Che gran bel lavoro che hai fatto!
Caretaker000_Flow006.JpJapanese: おおきに! <ruby>助<rt>たす</rt></ruby>かったわ
Caretaker000_Flow006.UsEnglish: Now, that's a job well done!
Caretaker000_Flow006.UsSpanish: ¡A eso lo llamo un trabajo bien hecho!

Caretaker000_Flow007.EuDutch:
Oh, no no no! That won't do! Ya
gotta put yer back into it, sweetie!
Caretaker000_Flow007.EuEnglish:
Oh, no no no! That won't do! Ya
gotta put yer back into it, sweetie!
Caretaker000_Flow007.EuFrench:
Non, non, non! Ça ne va pas du tout!
Dérouille-toi un peu et au travail!
Caretaker000_Flow007.EuGerman:
Oh nein, nein, nein! Dir fehlt der nötige
Hang zur Sauberkeit, mein Lieber!
Caretaker000_Flow007.EuItalian:
Oh, no! No! Così non va! Ci devi
mettere più impegno!
Caretaker000_Flow007.EuSpanish:
¡No, hombre, no! ¡Tienes que darte
más vidilla!
Caretaker000_Flow007.JpJapanese:
あかんあかん!
もっと チャッチャとせな!
Caretaker000_Flow007.UsEnglish:
Oh, no no no! That won't do! Ya
gotta put yer back into it, sweetie!
Caretaker000_Flow007.UsFrench:
Oh, non, non, non! Tu peux faire
mieux que ça, petit! Allez!
Caretaker000_Flow007.UsSpanish:
¡Oh, no, no! ¡Así no acabamos nunca!
¡Tienes que ponerle más ganas, bonito!

SignBoard000.EuDutch: [setfontcol orange]P2[setfontcol none]! You [setfontcol red]help[setfontcol none] too!
SignBoard000.EuEnglish: [setfontcol orange]P2[setfontcol none]! You [setfontcol red]help[setfontcol none] too!
SignBoard000.EuFrench:
[setfontcol orange]J[setfontcol none][setfontcol orange]2[setfontcol none], tu peux
[setfontcol red]aider[setfontcol none] aussi!
SignBoard000.EuGerman: [setfontcol orange]SP2[setfontcol none], hilf mit!
SignBoard000.EuItalian:
[setfontcol orange]G2[setfontcol none], aiuta
anche tu!
SignBoard000.EuSpanish:
[setfontcol orange]J2[setfontcol black],[setfontcol orange] [setfontcol none]¡tú también
puedes ayudar!
SignBoard000.JpJapanese: [setfontcol orange]2P[setfontcol none]も<ruby>壊<rt>こわ</rt></ruby>して!
SignBoard000.UsEnglish: [setfontcol orange]P2[setfontcol none]! You [setfontcol red]help[setfontcol none] too!
SignBoard000.UsSpanish:
[setfontcol orange]J2[setfontcol black],[setfontcol orange] [setfontcol none]¡tú también
puedes ayudar!

HoneyBee000.EuDutch:
You're a New Bee, huh? If you like
flying, be sure to avoid any [setfontcol blue]water[setfontcol none]!
HoneyBee000.EuEnglish:
You're a New Bee, huh? If you like
flying, be sure to avoid any [setfontcol blue]water[setfontcol none]!
HoneyBee000.EuFrench:
Bzzz, tu apprends à voler de tes
propres ailes, on dirait. Petit conseil:
tiens-toi à l'écart de l'[setfontcol blue]eau[setfontcol none]! Bzzz!
HoneyBee000.EuGerman:
Du bist eine Jungbiene,
nicht wahr?[newpage]
Wir summen alle vor uns hin und
haben Spaß am Fliegen. Sieh nur zu,
dass du [setfontcol blue]dem [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]Wasser fernbleibst[setfontcol none]!
HoneyBee000.EuItalian:
Sei una nuova apetta? Se ti piace
volare, ricordati di stare alla larga
dall'[setfontcol blue]acqua[setfontcol none]!
HoneyBee000.EuSpanish:
Eres una abeja nueva, ¿no? Si te
gusta revolotear, ¡evita el [setfontcol blue]agua[setfontcol none]!
HoneyBee000.JpJapanese: [setfontcol blue]<ruby>水<rt>みず</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]には<ruby>気<rt>き</rt></ruby>をつけるであります!
HoneyBee000.UsEnglish:
You're a New Bee, huh? If you like
flying, be sure to avoid any [setfontcol blue]water[setfontcol none]!
HoneyBee000.UsFrench:
Tu es une nouvelle abeille, non? Si tu
aimes voler, assure-toi d'éviter l'[setfontcol blue]eau[setfontcol none]
à tout prix!
HoneyBee000.UsSpanish:
¿Eres una abeja nueva, eh? ¡Si te
gusta volar, debes evitar el [setfontcol blue]agua[setfontcol none]!

HoneyBee000_Flow000.EuDutch:
The buzz is that you're pretty good
at flying! Good luck up ahead!
HoneyBee000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
The buzz is that you're pretty good
at flying! Good luck up ahead!
HoneyBee000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Eh bien, je n'ai qu'une chose à te
dire, bzzz: bon courage pour la
suite! Bzzz!
HoneyBee000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Ich habe gehört, dass du ein
Naturtalent in der Luft bist!
Weiterhin gutes Gelingen!
HoneyBee000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Si ronza in giro che sei in gamba a
volare! Allora buon proseguimento!
HoneyBee000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Dicen que se te da muy bien volar!
¡Mucha suerte!
HoneyBee000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
この<ruby>先<rt>さき</rt></ruby> きちんと <ruby>飛<rt>と</rt></ruby>べないと
<ruby>進<rt>すす</rt></ruby>むのは <ruby>困難<rt>こんなん</rt></ruby>であります!
HoneyBee000_Flow000.UsEnglish:
The buzz is that you're pretty good
at flying! Good luck up ahead!
HoneyBee000_Flow000.UsFrench:
Woah, tu butines comme un pro!
Bonne chance là-haut!
HoneyBee000_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Dicen que se te da muy bien volar!
¡Mucha suerte!

HoneyBee000_Flow001.EuDutch: Press and hold [setfontcol black][icon Abtn]![setfontcol none]
HoneyBee000_Flow001.EuEnglish: Press and hold [setfontcol black][icon Abtn]![setfontcol none]
HoneyBee000_Flow001.EuFrench:
Appuie sur [setfontcol black][icon Abtn] et maintiens
le bouton enfoncé! Bzzz![setfontcol none]
HoneyBee000_Flow001.EuItalian: Devi tenere premuto [setfontcol black][icon Abtn]![setfontcol none]
HoneyBee000_Flow001.JpJapanese: [setfontcol black][icon Abtn]を<ruby>押<rt>お</rt></ruby>し<ruby>続<rt>つづ</rt></ruby>けるであります![setfontcol none]
HoneyBee000_Flow001.UsEnglish: Press and hold [setfontcol black][icon Abtn]![setfontcol none]

HoneyBee000_Flow002.EuFrench:
Bzzz! Jusqu'à quelle hauteur
penses-tu pouvoir voler?
HoneyBee000_Flow002.JpJapanese: <ruby>高<rt>たか</rt></ruby>～く<ruby>飛<rt>と</rt></ruby>べるでありますか?
HoneyBee000_Flow002.UsFrench:
Jusqu'à quelle hauteur
penses-tu pouvoir voler?

HoneyBee001.EuDutch:
We came here in search of a[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar] for
our queen!
HoneyBee001.EuEnglish:
We came here in search of a[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar] for
our queen!
HoneyBee001.EuFrench:
Nous sommes à la recherche d'une
[icon PowerStar] pour notre reine! Bzzz!
HoneyBee001.EuGerman:
Wir suchen nach einem
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern [setfontcol none]für unsere Königin!
Er muss hier irgendwo sein...
HoneyBee001.EuItalian:
Siamo venuti qui in cerca di una
[setfontcol yellow]Superstella [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar] per la nostra Regina!
HoneyBee001.EuSpanish:
Hemos venido aquí en busca
de una [icon PowerStar] para la reina.
HoneyBee001.JpJapanese:
<ruby>女王様<rt>じょおうさま</rt></ruby>の<ruby>命<rt>めい</rt></ruby>で [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol none]を
<ruby>探<rt>さが</rt></ruby>しにきたのであります!
HoneyBee001.UsEnglish:
We came here in search of a[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar] for
our queen!
HoneyBee001.UsFrench:
Nous cherchons une [icon PowerStar] à offrir à
notre reine! On nous a dit qu'il y en
avait une ici!
HoneyBee001.UsSpanish:
¡Llegamos hasta aquí en busca de
una[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar] para nuestra reina!

HoneyBee002.EuDutch:
No luck yet... Would you be so kind as
to help us find the [icon PowerStar]?
HoneyBee002.EuEnglish:
No luck yet... Would you be so kind as
to help us find the [icon PowerStar]?
HoneyBee002.EuFrench:
Mais où peut-elle bien être?...
Bzzz! Dis, tu ne voudrais pas nous
aider à trouver la [icon PowerStar]?
HoneyBee002.EuGerman:
Noch kein Glück bisher...
Wärst du so nett, uns bei der Suche
nach dem [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern[setfontcol none] zu helfen?
HoneyBee002.EuItalian:
Non riusciamo a trovarla... Saresti
così gentile da aiutarci a trovare la
[setfontcol yellow]Superstella [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]?
HoneyBee002.EuSpanish:
Aún no hemos tenido suerte...
¿Y si nos ayudas a encontrar la [icon PowerStar]?
HoneyBee002.JpJapanese:
なかなか<ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>つからないであります・・・
<ruby>一緒<rt>いっしょ</rt></ruby>に [icon PowerStar]<ruby>探<rt>さが</rt></ruby>してほしいであります!
HoneyBee002.UsEnglish:
No luck yet... Would you be so kind as
to help us find the [icon PowerStar]?
HoneyBee002.UsFrench:
Non, toujours rien... Hmmm...
Pourrais-tu nous aider à trouver
cette fameuse [icon PowerStar]?
HoneyBee002.UsSpanish:
Aún no hemos tenido suerte... ¿Nos
ayudarías a encontrar la [icon PowerStar]?

Dreamer050_Flow001.EuDutch:
Here's a tip[setfontcol black]! There's a [setfontcol red]trick to
digging [setfontcol black]here if you want to proceed.
[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]Want to see it?[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Dreamer050_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Here's a tip[setfontcol black]! There's a [setfontcol red]trick to
digging [setfontcol black]here if you want to proceed.
[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]Want to see it?[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Dreamer050_Flow001.EuFrench:
Astuce![wait 30] Utilise le [setfontcol red]foret [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]pour creuser
jusqu'aux antipodes d'une planète!
Tu veux voir comment ça marche?[setfontcol none]
Dreamer050_Flow001.EuGerman:
Kleiner Tipp: Nutze den [setfontcol red]Wirbelbohrer[setfontcol none],
um dich [setfontcol black]durch den Planeten zu wühlen!
Soll ich dir zeigen, wie's geht?[setfontcol none]
Dreamer050_Flow001.EuItalian:
Indizio! Puoi usare le [setfontcol red]trottole [setfontcol none]per
scavare il pianeta! Vuoi vedere come?
Dreamer050_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Un [setfontcol black]consejillo televisado[setfontcol none]: usa el
[setfontcol red]trompotaladro [setfontcol black]para [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]excavar hasta el
otro lado del planeta. ¿Te lo enseño?
Dreamer050_Flow001.JpJapanese:
ヒント! [setfontcol red]<ruby>工夫<rt>くふう</rt></ruby>して<ruby>掘<rt>ほ</rt></ruby>ると[setfontcol none]<ruby>先<rt>さき</rt></ruby>に<ruby>進<rt>すす</rt></ruby>めます!
どんな<ruby>感<rt>かん</rt></ruby>じか <ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>てみますか?
Dreamer050_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Here's a tip[setfontcol black]! There's a [setfontcol red]trick to
digging [setfontcol black]here if you want to proceed.
[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]Want to see it?[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Dreamer050_Flow001.UsFrench:
Astuce! Je connais un truc pour
[setfontcol red]percer la terre [setfontcol none]et progresser sur
cette planète![newpage]
Voulez-vous voir comment faire?
Dreamer050_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Un teleconsejo: hay una [setfontcol red]manera de
[setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol red]excavar[setfontcol red] [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]que te permitirá avanzar.
[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]¿Te muestro cómo hacerlo?[setfontcol none]

Dreamer050_Flow003.EuGerman:
Na gut, das schaffst
du auch allein!
Dreamer050_Flow003.JpJapanese: それでは がんばって!

Tico052.EuDutch:
Whoa! Where'd you come from?![newpage]
More [icon Luma] [setfontcol yellow]Lumas[setfontcol none] are waiting for you up
ahead!
Tico052.EuEnglish:
Whoa! Where'd you come from?![newpage]
More [icon Luma] [setfontcol yellow]Lumas[setfontcol none] are waiting for you up
ahead!
Tico052.EuFrench:
OUAH! Mais, comment tu as fait pour
arriver ici?! D'autres [icon Luma] t'attendent
plus loin!
Tico052.EuGerman:
Huch! Wo bist du bloß hergekommen?[newpage]
Noch mehr [icon Luma] [setfontcol yellow]Luma [setfontcol none]voraus!
Tico052.EuItalian:
Aaah! Da dove salti fuori?![newpage]
Ci sono altri [setfontcol yellow]Sfavillotti [setfontcol none][setfontcol black][icon Luma] [setfontcol none]più avanti
che ti aspettano!
Tico052.EuSpanish:
¡Huy! ¡¿De dónde sales tú?![newpage]
¡Hay más [setfontcol yellow]destellos [setfontcol none]esperándote
delante!
Tico052.JpJapanese:
あぁ! びっくりした!
<ruby>突然<rt>とつぜん</rt></ruby> <ruby>人<rt>ひと</rt></ruby>が<ruby>出<rt>で</rt></ruby>てくるなんて![newpage]
この<ruby>先<rt>さき</rt></ruby>でも、 <ruby>仲間<rt>なかま</rt></ruby>が<ruby>待<rt>ま</rt></ruby>っています!
Tico052.UsEnglish:
Whoa! Where'd you come from?![newpage]
More [icon Luma] [setfontcol yellow]Lumas[setfontcol none] are waiting for you up
ahead!
Tico052.UsFrench:
[setfontsize large]WOAAAAAAAAH![newpage]
[setfontsize normal]D'où est-ce que tu sors?! D'autres
[setfontcol yellow]Luma [setfontcol none][icon Luma] t'attendent plus loin!
Tico052.UsSpanish:
¡Huy! ¡¿De dónde saliste?![newpage]
¡Hay más [setfontcol yellow]destellos [setfontcol none][icon Luma] esperándote
adelante!

SignBoard000.EuGerman:
Schnapp sie
dir, [setfontcol orange]SP2[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard000.EuItalian: [setfontcol orange]G2[setfontcol none], fermali!
SignBoard000.EuSpanish: ¡Detenlos, [setfontcol red]J2[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard000.JpJapanese: [setfontcol orange]2P [setfontcol none]<ruby>止<rt>と</rt></ruby>めて!
