Il tesoro che c'è lì è... No, no, niente...
Io non ne so nulla!
Kinopio001_Flow011.EuSpanish:
[setfontcol black]El [setfontcol blue]mundo legendario [setfontcol black]oculta un tesoro
que es muy... Olvídalo, ¡yo no sé nada![setfontcol blue][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio001_Flow011.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue]<ruby>伝説<rt>でんせつ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>大銀河<rt>ワールド</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]･･･ お<ruby>宝<rt>たから</rt></ruby>のニオイ?!
･･･あ、 なんでもないです! なんでもっ!!
Kinopio001_Flow011.UsEnglish:
I heard about a [setfontcol black][setfontcol blue]legendary world
[setfontcol black]where the treasure is very--
Uh, never mind! I don't know anything![setfontcol none]
Kinopio001_Flow011.UsFrench:
Le [setfontcol blue]légendaire Monde spécial[setfontcol none]... les
trésors là-bas sont... Heu... Je n'ai
rien dit! Je ne sais rien!
Kinopio001_Flow011.UsSpanish:
Dicen por ahí que hay un [setfontcol blue]mundo
legendario [setfontcol black]que oculta tesoros muy...
Mejor o[setfontcol black]lvídalo, ¡yo no sé nada![setfontcol black][setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]

Kinopio001_Flow012.EuDutch:
It's a miracle in space! A[wait 5] MIR[wait 5]A[wait 5]CLE[wait 5]!
That was awesome!
Kinopio001_Flow012.EuEnglish:
It's a miracle in space! A[wait 5] MIR[wait 5]A[wait 5]CLE[wait 5]!
That was awesome!
Kinopio001_Flow012.EuFrench:
C'est un miracle intersidéral!
Un [wait 5]MI-[wait 5]RA-[wait 5]CLE[wait 5]!! Extraordinaire!
Kinopio001_Flow012.EuGerman:
Das ist ein Weltraumwunder!
Ein[wait 5] WELT-[wait 5]RAUM-[wait 5]WUN-[wait 5]DER!!!
Unglaublich!
Kinopio001_Flow012.EuItalian:
Un miracolo nello spazio!
Un [wait 5]MIRA[wait 5]CO[wait 5]LO[wait 5]!!! Incredibile!
Kinopio001_Flow012.EuSpanish:
¡Un milagro galáctico! Como lo oyes,
¡¡UN MI[wait 5]LA[wait 5]GRO[wait 5]!!
¡Seguro que mola tanto como yo!
Kinopio001_Flow012.JpJapanese:
<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>のキセキですよ!! キ [wait 5]・[wait 5] セ [wait 5]・[wait 5] キ!!
きっとワタシ<ruby>級<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby>のスゴさ!! [wait 15]ウフフ・・・・・・
Kinopio001_Flow012.UsEnglish:
It's a miracle in space! A[wait 5] MIR[wait 5]A[wait 5]CLE[wait 5]!!
That was awesome!
Kinopio001_Flow012.UsFrench:
C'est un miracle de l'espace! Un vrai
[wait 5]MI-[wait 5]RA-[wait 5]CLE[wait 5]!! C'était génial!
Kinopio001_Flow012.UsSpanish:
¡Es un auténtico milagro espacial!
¡Un[wait 5] MI-[wait 5]LA-[wait 5]GRO[wait 5]! ¡Fue algo increíble!

Kinopio002_Flow000.EuDutch:
It looks like a Luma named [setfontcol red]Lubba [setfontcol none]is
in charge here.[newpage]
Despite being a bit curt, this Luma
seems to be well regarded by
the crew!
Kinopio002_Flow000.EuEnglish:
It looks like a Luma named [setfontcol red]Lubba [setfontcol none]is
in charge here.[newpage]
Despite being a bit curt, this Luma
seems to be well regarded by
the crew!
Kinopio002_Flow000.EuFrench:
[setfontcol red]Lubba[setfontcol black]? Oui, c'est le [icon Luma] maître
d'équipage à bord du vaisseau[setfontcol red][setfontcol none].[newpage]
Bon, il est un peu brut de décoffrage,
mais tout le monde l'apprécie à bord!
Kinopio002_Flow000.EuGerman:
Soweit ich weiß, hat hier
ein [setfontcol purple]lila Luma [setfontcol none]namens
[setfontcol red]Lubba [setfontcol none]das Sagen![newpage]
Sie mag manchmal ein wenig schroff
wirken, aber die gesamte Crew hat
Respekt vor ihr!
Kinopio002_Flow000.EuItalian:
Sembra che lo [setfontcol red]Sfavillotto Lume [setfontcol none]sia
il capo qua...[newpage]
Può sembrare un po' scontroso,
ma gode del rispetto di tutto
l'equipaggio!
Kinopio002_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Parece que hay un destello
al mando de la astronave.
Se llama [setfontcol red]Destrella[setfontcol none].[newpage]
A veces se expresa de una forma
algo cortante, pero la tripulación
le tiene bastante aprecio.
Kinopio002_Flow000.JpJapanese:
どうやら ここは [setfontcol red]ルーバ[setfontcol none]というチコさんが
<ruby>仕切<rt>しき</rt></ruby>っているみたいです![newpage]
ぶっきらぼうに<ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>えますけど、
たくさんのチコさんに<ruby>慕<rt>した</rt></ruby>われているようですよ!
Kinopio002_Flow000.UsEnglish:
It looks like a Luma named [setfontcol red]Lubba [setfontcol none]is
in charge here.[newpage]
Despite being a bit curt, this Luma
seems to be well regarded by
the crew!
Kinopio002_Flow000.UsFrench:
Il paraît que le Luma nommé [setfontcol red]Lubba[setfontcol none]
est le chef d'équipe, ici.[newpage]
Il est parfois un peu brusque, mais
l'équipage semble le tenir en haute
estime!
Kinopio002_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Parece que hay un destello que
supervisa el funcionamiento de
aquella astronave.[newpage]
Puede parecer un tanto brusco,
pero la tripulación le tiene bastante
aprecio. Se llama [setfontcol red]Destrella[setfontcol none].

Kinopio002_Flow001.EuDutch:
If you get a [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol black], [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]you
can use its power to open up a [setfontcol blue]portal
through space and time[setfontcol none]![newpage]
You can use these portals to travel
to new worlds and search for even
more [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Keep that up, and I bet you'll be
able to figure out where [setfontcol blue]Bowser[setfontcol none] is!
Kinopio002_Flow001.EuEnglish:
If you get a [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol black], [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]you
can use its power to open up a [setfontcol blue]portal
through space and time[setfontcol none]![newpage]
You can use these portals to travel
to new worlds and search for even
more [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Keep that up, and I bet you'll be
able to figure out where [setfontcol blue]Bowser[setfontcol none] is!
Kinopio002_Flow001.EuFrench:
Si tu trouves une [icon GrandStar][setfontcol black], tu peux utiliser[setfontcol none]
son pouvoir pour ouvrir un [setfontcol blue]portail
vers un nouveau monde[setfontcol none].[newpage]
Ainsi, tu pourras aller explorer un
monde inconnu et trouver d'autres [icon PowerStar].[newpage]
Continue comme ça, et je suis sûr
que tu finiras par attraper [icon Bowser]!
Kinopio002_Flow001.EuGerman:
Wenn du einen [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Großen Stern
[setfontcol black]findest, kannst du mit seiner Kraft
ein neues [setfontcol blue]Weltentor [setfontcol black]öffnen[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black][setfontcol red][setfontcol none].[newpage]
So gelangst du in eine neue Welt und
kannst dich auch dort auf die Suche 
nach [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Sternen [setfontcol none]machen.[newpage]
Lass dich nur nicht unterkriegen!
Du wirst mit Sicherheit herausfinden,
wo [setfontcol blue]Bowser[setfontcol none] sich versteckt hält!
Kinopio002_Flow001.EuItalian:
Se ottieni una [setfontcol red]Megastella [setfontcol none][icon GrandStar], puoi
usare il suo potere per aprire un
nuovo [setfontcol blue]varco spazio-temporale[setfontcol none].[newpage]
Potrai così viaggiare in nuovi Mondi
e cercare altre [setfontcol yellow]Superstelle[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar].[newpage]
Se prosegui, scommetto che riuscirai
a scoprire dove si nasconde
[setfontcol blue]Bowser[setfontcol black] [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black][icon Bowser]![setfontcol none]
Kinopio002_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Si consigues una [icon GrandStar][setfontcol black], podrás abrir
un [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]portal a un nuevo mundo [setfontcol black]y viajar
a través del tiempo y del espacio[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none].[newpage]
Cruzando estos portales viajarás a
nuevos mundos y encontrarás más [icon PowerStar].
¡Tarde o temprano darás con [setfontcol blue]Bowser[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio002_Flow001.JpJapanese:
[icon GrandStar][setfontcol red]グランドスター[setfontcol none]をゲットすれば
[setfontcol yellow][icon GrandStar]グランドスター[setfontcol none]の<ruby>力<rt>ちから</rt></ruby>で [setfontcol blue]<ruby>時空<rt>じくう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>扉<rt>とびら</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]が<ruby>開<rt>ひら</rt></ruby>く・・・[newpage]
そうなれば <ruby>新<rt>あら</rt></ruby>たな<ruby>大銀河<rt>ワールド</rt></ruby>にいける･･･
さらに [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol none]を<ruby>探<rt>さが</rt></ruby>せる・・・・・・・・・・・・[newpage]
そうやって どんどん<ruby>先<rt>さき</rt></ruby>にすすんだら
[setfontcol blue][icon Bowser]クッパ[setfontcol none]の<ruby>居場所<rt>いばしょ</rt></ruby>を つかめるかも!
Kinopio002_Flow001.UsEnglish:
If you get a [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol black], [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]you
can use its power to open up a [setfontcol blue]portal
to a new world[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Then you'll be able to travel to new
worlds and search for even more
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Keep that up, and I bet you'll be
able to figure out where [setfontcol blue]Bowser[setfontcol none] is!
Kinopio002_Flow001.UsFrench:
Si tu trouves une[setfontcol red] grande étoile [setfontcol none][icon GrandStar], tu
pourras utiliser son énergie pour
ouvrir un [setfontcol blue]portail de téléportation[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Le portail te permettra de voyager
vers d'autres mondes et de trouver
encore plus de [setfontcol yellow]super étoiles [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar].[newpage]
Continue ta recherche, et je suis
certain que tu découvriras où se
cache ce [setfontcol blue]monstre[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio002_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Si obtienes una [setfontcol red]Maxiestrella [setfontcol black][icon GrandStar],
[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]podrás usar su poder para abrir un
[setfontcol blue]portal estelar [setfontcol none]nuevo.[newpage]
Allí podrás viajar a nuevos mundos
y buscar más [setfontcol yellow]Superestrellas[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar].[newpage]
¡Sigue así y estoy seguro de que
encontraremos la guarida de [setfontcol blue]Bowser[setfontcol none]!

Kinopio002_Flow002.EuDutch:
When a [setfontcol red]Prankster Comet [setfontcol none]comes along,
you may see some [setfontcol blue]strange [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]changes[setfontcol none].
Even in places you've already been!
Kinopio002_Flow002.EuEnglish:
When a [setfontcol red]Prankster Comet [setfontcol none]comes along,
you may see some [setfontcol blue]strange [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]changes[setfontcol none].
Even in places you've already been!
Kinopio002_Flow002.EuFrench:
Lorsque qu'une [setfontcol black][icon Comet] [setfontcol none]apparaît, elle
[setfontcol blue]chamboule [setfontcol none]une des galaxies que
tu as déjà visitées!
Kinopio002_Flow002.EuGerman:
Erscheint ein [setfontcol red]Schabernack-Komet[setfontcol none],
wirst du [setfontcol blue]sonderbare Veränderungen [setfontcol none]an
bereits besuchten Orten wahrnehmen!
Kinopio002_Flow002.EuItalian:
Quando una [setfontcol red]Cometa Burlona [setfontcol none]si
avvicina, potresti notare [setfontcol blue]strani
cambiamenti[setfontcol black] nei[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black] [setfontcol none]posti già visitati.
Kinopio002_Flow002.EuSpanish:
Cuando pasa un [setfontcol red]Cometa Pícaro[setfontcol none],
notarás [setfontcol blue]cambios peculiares[setfontcol black] incluso[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
en los sitios que ya has visitado.
Kinopio002_Flow002.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red]いたずら<ruby>彗星<rt>すいせい</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]がくると、 かつて<ruby>訪<rt>おとず</rt></ruby>れた<ruby>場所<rt>ばしょ</rt></ruby>に
[setfontcol blue]<ruby>新<rt>あたら</rt></ruby>しい<ruby>変化<rt>へんか</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]が<ruby>起<rt>お</rt></ruby>きるようです!
Kinopio002_Flow002.UsEnglish:
When a [setfontcol red]Prankster Comet [setfontcol none]comes along,
you may see some [setfontcol blue]strange [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]changes[setfontcol none].
Even in places you've already been!
Kinopio002_Flow002.UsFrench:
Les [setfontcol red]comètes blagueuses [setfontcol none]provoquent
d'[setfontcol blue]étranges changements [setfontcol none]dans les
galaxies que tu as déjà visitées!
Kinopio002_Flow002.UsSpanish:
Cuando pasa un [setfontcol red]cometa[setfontcol none], puedes notar
algunos [setfontcol blue]cambios peculiares[setfontcol none] incluso en
los sitios que ya has visitado.

Kinopio002_Flow003.EuDutch:
This place sure is lively now![newpage]
I'm learning so much just from talking
to [setfontcol red]everyone here[setfontcol none].
Kinopio002_Flow003.EuEnglish:
This place sure is lively now![newpage]
I'm learning so much just from talking
to [setfontcol red]everyone here[setfontcol none].
Kinopio002_Flow003.EuFrench:
Cet endroit est devenu très animé![newpage]
J'en apprends beaucoup en discutant
avec les [setfontcol red]divers passagers[setfontcol none].
Kinopio002_Flow003.EuGerman:
Wir haben wirklich Leben an Bord![newpage]
Von [setfontcol red]unseren Passagieren [setfontcol none]habe ich
bereits viel Nützliches lernen können.
Kinopio002_Flow003.EuItalian:
Questo posto è di sicuro molto
variegato![newpage]
Sto imparando così tante cose da
[setfontcol red]tutti quelli che si trovano qui[setfontcol none]...
Kinopio002_Flow003.EuSpanish:
Vaya, ¡la astronave se ha vuelto
un lugar muy animado![newpage]
Estoy aprendiendo muchas cosas
de [setfontcol red]toda la gente [setfontcol none]con la que hablo.
Kinopio002_Flow003.JpJapanese:
<ruby>星船<rt>ほしぶね</rt></ruby>に<ruby>来<rt>き</rt></ruby>た[setfontcol red]みなさん[setfontcol none]が
<ruby>色々<rt>いろいろ</rt></ruby>おしえてくれるので とても<ruby>勉強<rt>べんきょう</rt></ruby>になります!
Kinopio002_Flow003.UsEnglish:
This place sure has gotten lively![newpage]
I'm learning so much just from talking
to everyone here.
Kinopio002_Flow003.UsFrench:
Le vaisseau déborde de vie![newpage]
J'en apprends beaucoup en allant
discuter avec les passagers!
Kinopio002_Flow003.UsSpanish:
¡Este lugar sí que está concurrido![newpage]
He aprendido muchísimo al conversar
con todo el mundo.

Kinopio002_Flow004.EuDutch:
I've been hearing rumours about a
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]mysterious spirit[setfontcol black] [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]somewhere
out there in the universe...[setfontcol none]
Kinopio002_Flow004.EuEnglish:
I've been hearing rumours about a
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]mysterious spirit[setfontcol black] [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]somewhere
out there in the universe...[setfontcol none]
Kinopio002_Flow004.EuFrench:
D'après la légende, il existerait un
[setfontcol red]esprit cosmique[setfontcol none] quelque part dans
cet univers...
Kinopio002_Flow004.EuGerman:
Mir kam zu Ohren, dass es im Weltall
eine [setfontcol red]k[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]osmische Erscheinung [setfontcol none]gibt, die
überaus hilfreich sein soll...
Kinopio002_Flow004.EuItalian:
Ho sentito dire che esiste uno
[setfontcol red]spirito [setfontcol none]misterioso da qualche parte
nell'universo...
Kinopio002_Flow004.EuSpanish:
Dicen por ahí que un [setfontcol red]espíritu
misterioso [setfontcol none]vaga por el universo.
Kinopio002_Flow004.JpJapanese:
なんでも
<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>には[setfontcol red]<ruby>魔女<rt>まじょ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]がいるってウワサですよ
Kinopio002_Flow004.UsEnglish:
I've been hearing rumors about a
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]mysterious spirit[setfontcol black] [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]somewhere
out there in the universe...[setfontcol none]
Kinopio002_Flow004.UsFrench:
J'ai entendu dire qu'il existait un
[setfontcol red]mystérieux esprit[setfontcol none] quelque part dans
l'univers.
Kinopio002_Flow004.UsSpanish:
Dicen por ahí que un [setfontcol red]espíritu
misterioso [setfontcol none]vaga por el universo.

Kinopio002_Flow005.EuDutch: I hope it's a [setfontcol red]helpful spirit[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio002_Flow005.EuEnglish: I hope it's a [setfontcol red]helpful spirit[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio002_Flow005.EuFrench:
[setfontcol black]Mais [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]au fait... [setfontcol none]c'est quoi,
un [setfontcol red]esprit[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] cosmique[setfontcol black]?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Kinopio002_Flow005.EuGerman:
Was aber genau ist bloß eine
[setfontcol red]k[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]osmische Erscheinung[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]
Kinopio002_Flow005.EuItalian:
Spero che sia uno
[setfontcol red]spirito[setfontcol black]... utile![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Kinopio002_Flow005.EuSpanish:
¡Ojalá sea un [setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]espíritu
bondadoso[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Kinopio002_Flow005.JpJapanese: [setfontcol red]<ruby>魔女<rt>まじょ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]とはいったい…
Kinopio002_Flow005.UsEnglish: I hope it's a [setfontcol red]helpful spirit[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio002_Flow005.UsFrench:
Il paraît que c'est un
esprit très [setfontcol red]amical[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio002_Flow005.UsSpanish: ¡Ojalá sea un [setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]espíritu bondadoso[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]

Kinopio002_Flow006.EuDutch:
You can't just plough straight on
through, you know![newpage]
Go back and visit some galaxies,
take a break every once in a while,
and think out your strategy!
Kinopio002_Flow006.EuEnglish:
You can't just plough straight on
through, you know![newpage]
Go back and visit some galaxies,
take a break every once in a while,
and think out your strategy!
Kinopio002_Flow006.EuFrench:
Tu ne peux pas continuer à avancer
sans rencontrer d'obstacle, tu sais![newpage]
Parfois, il faut retourner dans une
galaxie déjà visitée, faire une pause,
réfléchir à un plan d'attaque...
Kinopio002_Flow006.EuGerman:
Du kannst leider nicht so schnell
weitermachen, wie bisher![newpage]
Wie wäre es, statt dessen in bereits
besuchte Galaxien zurückzukehren?[newpage]
Sicherlich gibt es dort
noch etwas zu erledigen!
Kinopio002_Flow006.EuItalian:
Non puoi sempre andare avanti come
meglio ti pare, lo sai![newpage]
Devi tornare indietro a visitare
qualche Galassia, fermarti di tanto in
tanto, e meditare una strategia!
Kinopio002_Flow006.EuSpanish:
No hace falta que visites cada galaxia
en cuanto la descubras, ¿lo sabías?[newpage]
Puedes pensar tu estrategia y volver
luego a cualquier galaxia. ¡También
es bueno tomarse algún descanso!
Kinopio002_Flow006.JpJapanese:
<ruby>前<rt>まえ</rt></ruby>にすすむだけが <ruby>戦<rt>たたか</rt></ruby>いじゃないですよ![newpage]
<ruby>以前<rt>いぜん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>大銀河<rt>ワールド</rt></ruby>にもどったり、 じっくり<ruby>休<rt>やす</rt></ruby>むのも、
リッパな<ruby>作戦<rt>さくせん</rt></ruby>だとおもいます!
Kinopio002_Flow006.UsEnglish:
You can't just plow straight on
through, you know![newpage]
Go back and visit some galaxies,
take a break every once in a while,
and think out your strategy!
Kinopio002_Flow006.UsFrench:
Tu ne peux pas vraiment passer d'une
galaxie à l'autre sans t'arrêter, tu
sais![newpage]
Tu dois revenir sur tes pas et
revisiter certains lieux, et prendre
des pauses de temps en temps![newpage]
C'est une question de stratégie!
Kinopio002_Flow006.UsSpanish:
No hace falta que intentes completar
cada galaxia en cuanto la descubras,
¿lo sabías?[newpage]
Puedes pensar tu estrategia y volver
luego a cualquier galaxia. ¡También es
bueno tomar algún descanso!

Kinopio002_Flow007.EuDutch:
[setfontcol red]Bowser [setfontcol none]wants to collect [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power
Stars [setfontcol none]to make himself [setfontcol blue]king of the
universe[setfontcol none]![newpage]
We can't let that happen! Bowser
would make the worst king of the
universe EVER!
Kinopio002_Flow007.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Bowser [setfontcol none]wants to collect [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power
Stars [setfontcol none]to make himself [setfontcol blue]king of the
universe[setfontcol none]![newpage]
We can't let that happen! Bowser
would make the worst king of the
universe EVER!
Kinopio002_Flow007.EuFrench:
[icon Bowser] veut amasser toutes les [icon PowerStar] pour
devenir le [setfontcol blue]roi de l'univers[setfontcol none]![newpage]
On ne peut pas le laisser faire! [icon Bowser]
serait le roi le plus infâme de tous
les temps!
Kinopio002_Flow007.EuGerman:
[setfontcol red]Bowser [setfontcol none]benötigt die [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Sterne[setfontcol none],
um sich zum [setfontcol blue]Herrscher des Universums
[setfontcol none]aufzuschwingen![wait 15] So ein Dickkopf![newpage]
Wir dürfen es nicht so weit kommen
lassen, egal was auch passiert!
Kinopio002_Flow007.EuItalian:
[setfontcol red]Bowser[setfontcol none] vuole raccogliere tutte le
[setfontcol yellow]Superstelle[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar] per diventare il [setfontcol blue]re
dell'universo[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Non possiamo permetterglielo!
Sarebbe il peggior re dell'universo...
di tutti i tempi!
Kinopio002_Flow007.EuSpanish:
¡[setfontcol red]Bowser [setfontcol none]necesita todas las [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none]para
ser el [setfontcol blue]rey del universo[setfontcol none]![newpage]
¡No podemos dejar que eso ocurra!
¡Sería el peor rey de la historia
del universo!
Kinopio002_Flow007.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red]クッパ[setfontcol none]は [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol none]を<ruby>集<rt>あつ</rt></ruby>めて
[setfontcol blue]<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]に なろうとしています![newpage]
そんなこと ゼッタイゼッタイ <ruby>許<rt>ゆる</rt></ruby>されません!
Kinopio002_Flow007.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Bowser [setfontcol none]wants to collect [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power
Stars [setfontcol none]to make himself [setfontcol blue]king of the
universe[setfontcol none]![newpage]
We can't let that happen! Bowser
would make the worst king of the
universe EVER!
Kinopio002_Flow007.UsFrench:
[setfontcol red]Bowser [setfontcol none]veut s'emparer de toutes les 
[setfontcol yellow]super étoiles [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar] pour devenir le [setfontcol blue]roi
de l'univers[setfontcol none]![newpage]
On ne peut pas le laisser faire!
Bowser serait le PIRE roi de
l'univers au MONDE!
Kinopio002_Flow007.UsSpanish:
¡[setfontcol red]Bowser [setfontcol none]necesita todas las [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none]para
ser el [setfontcol blue]rey del universo[setfontcol none]![newpage]
¡No podemos dejar que eso ocurra!
¡Sería el peor rey de la historia
del universo!

Kinopio002_Flow008.EuFrench:
Va donner une bonne
leçon à Bowser!
Kinopio002_Flow008.EuItalian: Vai a dare una bella lezione a Bowser!
Kinopio002_Flow008.UsFrench:
Donne une bonne
leçon à Bowser!

Kinopio002_Flow009.EuDutch:
I've been hearing this rumour that
[setfontcol red]a ghost[setfontcol none] [setfontcol red]Luigi keeps showing up [setfontcol none]in
some galaxies!
Kinopio002_Flow009.EuEnglish:
I've been hearing this rumour that
[setfontcol red]a ghost[setfontcol none] [setfontcol red]Luigi keeps showing up [setfontcol none]in
some galaxies!
Kinopio002_Flow009.EuFrench:
Il paraît qu'on peut voir [setfontcol red]apparaître[setfontcol none]
[setfontcol red]un fantôme de [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol black][icon LuigiFace][setfontcol red] [setfontcol black]dans certaines
galaxies...[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Kinopio002_Flow009.EuGerman:
Mir kam zu Ohren, dass in einigen
Galaxien [setfontcol red]ein Geist mit Luigis
Aussehen [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]aufgetaucht ist[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio002_Flow009.EuItalian:
Continuo a sentir dire in giro che in
qualche Galassia [setfontcol red]appare un
[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]fantasma[setfontcol black]... [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]che somiglia a [setfontcol red]Luigi[setfontcol none]...
Kinopio002_Flow009.EuSpanish:
Me han dicho que en algunas
galaxias se aparece una especie
de [setfontcol red]fantasma de Luigi[setfontcol none]...
Kinopio002_Flow009.JpJapanese:
なんでも、 いろいろな<ruby>銀河<rt>ギャラクシー</rt></ruby>で
[setfontcol red]ルイージさんの<ruby>幽霊<rt>ゆうれい</rt></ruby>が<ruby>出現<rt>しゅつげん</rt></ruby>?! [setfontcol none]というウワサです
Kinopio002_Flow009.UsEnglish:
I've been hearing this rumor that
[setfontcol red]a ghost [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]Luigi keeps showing up [setfontcol none]in
some galaxies!
Kinopio002_Flow009.UsFrench:
Apparemment, on aurait [setfontcol red]aperçu
un fantôme de Luigi [setfontcol black]dans plusieurs
galaxies[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]...[setfontcol none]
Kinopio002_Flow009.UsSpanish:
¿Sabes? Me dicen que [setfontcol red]un fantasma
de Luigi está apareciendo [setfontcol black]en [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]algunas
galaxias. ¿Será posible?

Kinopio002_Flow011.EuDutch:
Those [icon GreenComet] [setfontcol green]Green Stars [setfontcol none]are scattered
all over the cosmos![newpage]
Just make sure you [setfontcol blue]move your
camera around [setfontcol none]and look at everything
from a different angle...[newpage]
But you're a pro, [Mario/Luigi]! I'm sure
you'll find them all, no problem.
Kinopio002_Flow011.EuEnglish:
Those [icon GreenComet] [setfontcol green]Green Stars [setfontcol none]are scattered
all over the cosmos![newpage]
Just make sure you [setfontcol blue]move your
camera around [setfontcol none]and look at everything
from a different angle...[newpage]
But you're a pro, [Mario/Luigi]! I'm sure
you'll find them all, no problem.
Kinopio002_Flow011.EuFrench:
Les [setfontcol green]étoiles vertes [setfontcol none][icon GreenComet] sont éparpillées
de par le cosmos![newpage]
Le secret, c'est de bien [setfontcol blue]scruter les
alentours grâce à la caméra [setfontcol none]pour
voir les lieux sous un nouvel angle...[newpage]
Enfin, pourquoi je te dis tout ça, moi?
Tu es un vrai crack, [Mario/Luigi]! Je suis
sûr que tu trouveras toutes les [icon GreenComet]!
Kinopio002_Flow011.EuGerman:
[icon GreenComet] [setfontcol green]Grünsterne [setfontcol none]sind im ganzen
Universum verstreut![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Suche alles gründlich mit deiner
Kamera ab [setfontcol none]und setze jede verfügbare
[setfontcol blue]Technik[setfontcol black] ein, [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]um sie zu finden![newpage]
Ach, wem erzähl ich das? Du bist hier
der Profi, [Mario/Luigi]! Ich bin mir sicher,
dass du sie finden wirst!
Kinopio002_Flow011.EuItalian:
Quelle [setfontcol green]Stelle Verdi [setfontcol none][icon GreenComet] sono sparse
per tutto il cosmo![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Muovi la telecamera[setfontcol none] e guardati in giro
usando diverse prospettive...[newpage]
Ma tu sei in gamba, [Mario/Luigi]! Sono certo
che le troverai tutte senza problemi.
Kinopio002_Flow011.EuSpanish:
Las [setfontcol green]Estrellas Verdes [setfontcol none][icon GreenComet] están
repartidas por todo el universo.[newpage]
No te olvides de [setfontcol blue]mirar con la cámara
por todos lados[setfontcol none]...[newpage]
No sé por qué te digo esto, [Mario/Luigi], ¡si
tú eres un profesional de la búsqueda
de estrellas!
Kinopio002_Flow011.JpJapanese:
[icon GreenComet][setfontcol green]グリーンスター[setfontcol none]は
<ruby>色々<rt>いろいろ</rt></ruby>なところに <ruby>散<rt>ち</rt></ruby>らばっているそうです![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]カメラを<ruby>回<rt>まわ</rt></ruby>したり、 テクニックをつかったり[setfontcol none]・・・
<ruby>今<rt>いま</rt></ruby>の[Mario/Luigi]さんなら きっと<ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>つけられますね
Kinopio002_Flow011.UsEnglish:
Those [icon GreenComet] [setfontcol green]Green Stars [setfontcol none]are scattered
all over the cosmos![newpage]
Just make sure you [setfontcol blue]move your
camera around [setfontcol none]and look at everything
from a different angle...[newpage]
But you're a pro, [Mario/Luigi]! I'm sure
you'll find them all, no problem.
Kinopio002_Flow011.UsFrench:
Les [setfontcol green]étoiles vertes [icon GreenComet] [setfontcol none]sont éparpillées
un peu partout dans le cosmos![newpage]
Assure-toi de [setfontcol blue]regarder autour de
toi [setfontcol none]en changeant l'angle de la caméra![newpage]
Mais je suis sûr que tu vas toutes
les trouver. Après tout, tu es un pro,
M. [Mario/Luigi]!
Kinopio002_Flow011.UsSpanish:
Las [setfontcol green]Estrellas Verdes [setfontcol none][icon GreenComet] están
repartidas por todo el universo.[newpage]
No te olvides de [setfontcol blue]mirar con la cámara
por todos lados[setfontcol none]...[newpage]
No sé por qué te digo esto, [Mario/Luigi], ¡si
tú eres un profesional de la búsqueda
de estrellas!

Kinopio003_Flow000.EuDutch:
[setfontcol black]The [icon Luma] [setfontcol yellow]Lumas [setfontcol black]made us a ship that
[setfontcol blue]looks just like a mushroom[setfontcol black]![newpage]
How amazing is that?! Plus, it actually
worked and got us here safely![setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol black]The [icon Luma] [setfontcol yellow]Lumas [setfontcol black]made us a ship that
[setfontcol blue]looks just like a mushroom[setfontcol black]![newpage]
How amazing is that?! Plus, it actually
worked and got us here safely![setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.EuFrench:
[setfontcol black]Les [icon Luma] nous ont aidés à construire
un vaisseau qui [setfontcol blue]ressemble à un
champignon[setfontcol black]![newpage]
Grâce à lui, nous avons pu arriver ici
sains et saufs! [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]Que dis-tu de ça?![setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.EuGerman:
[setfontcol black]Die [icon Luma] [setfontcol yellow]Luma [setfontcol black]haben mit uns
ein Raumschiff gebaut, das
[setfontcol blue]wie ein Pilz aussieht[setfontcol black]![newpage]
Dank ihrer Hilfe haben wir
es sicher hierher geschafft![setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.EuItalian:
Gli [setfontcol yellow]Sfavillotti[setfontcol none] [setfontcol black][icon Luma] ci [setfontcol none]hanno costruito
un'[setfontcol blue]astronave che sembra un fungo[setfontcol none]![setfontcol black][newpage]
Non è incredibile?! E per giunta
ci ha portati fin qui sani e salvi![setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Los[setfontcol black] [icon Luma] nos han hecho una nave
que [setfontcol blue]parece un champiñón[setfontcol black]![newpage]
¿A que mola? Además, ¡vuela
que no veas![setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol yellow][icon Luma]チコ[setfontcol none]さんが わたし<ruby>達<rt>たち</rt></ruby>そっくりな
[setfontcol blue]キノコ<ruby>型<rt>がた</rt></ruby>の<ruby>宇宙船<rt>うちゅうせん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]を <ruby>作<rt>つく</rt></ruby>ってくれました![newpage]
そのおかげで<ruby>無事<rt>ぶじ</rt></ruby>に 
ここまで<ruby>来<rt>こ</rt></ruby>られたんです!
Kinopio003_Flow000.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol black]The [icon Luma] [setfontcol yellow]Lumas [setfontcol black]made us a ship that
[setfontcol blue]looks just like a mushroom[setfontcol black]![newpage]
How amazing is that?! Plus, it actually
worked and got us back here safely![setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.UsFrench:
Les [setfontcol yellow]Luma [setfontcol none][setfontcol black][icon Luma] [setfontcol none]nous ont construit un
vaisseau [setfontcol blue]qui ressemble à un gros
champignon[setfontcol none]![newpage]
C'est génial, non?! En plus, ça nous
a permis de revenir ici sains et saufs!
Kinopio003_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Los[setfontcol black] [icon Luma] nos ayudaron a hacer una
nave [setfontcol blue]que parece un champiñón[setfontcol black]![newpage]
¿Verdad que es hermosa?
Además, ¡es segura y veloz![setfontcol none]

Kinopio004_Flow011.EuDutch:
Hey - everyone's waiting for you on
the [setfontcol red]Starshroom[setfontcol none]! We found a [icon 1UpMushroom],
so we're keeping it there for you.
Kinopio004_Flow011.EuEnglish:
Hey - everyone's waiting for you on
the [setfontcol red]Starshroom[setfontcol none]! We found a [icon 1UpMushroom],
so we're keeping it there for you.
Kinopio004_Flow011.EuFrench:
Hé, tout le monde t'attend à bord
du [setfontcol red]vaisseau champignon[setfontcol none]! On a trouvé
un [icon 1UpMushroom], alors on te le garde au chaud!
Kinopio004_Flow011.EuGerman:
Die anderen Toads erwarten dich beim
[setfontcol red]Pilz-Raumschiff[setfontcol none]! Wir haben dort auch
einen [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-UP-Pilz[setfontcol none] für dich!
Kinopio004_Flow011.EuItalian:
Ti aspettano tutti sull'[setfontcol red]Ufo Fungo[setfontcol none]!
Abbiamo trovato un [setfontcol green]Fungo 1-Up [setfontcol none][icon 1UpMushroom].
Lo terremo per te!
Kinopio004_Flow011.EuSpanish:
Oye, te esperamos en nuestra
[setfontcol red]Champinave[setfontcol none]. ¡Hemos encontrado [setfontcol green]un[setfontcol none] [icon 1UpMushroom]
y te lo estamos guardando!
Kinopio004_Flow011.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red]キノコ<ruby>船<rt>せん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]で みんなが<ruby>待<rt>ま</rt></ruby>ってます!
[icon 1UpMushroom][setfontcol green]1UP[setfontcol none]も<ruby>確保<rt>かくほ</rt></ruby>したので、 <ruby>置<rt>お</rt></ruby>いておきました!
Kinopio004_Flow011.UsEnglish:
Hey--everyone's waiting for you on
the [setfontcol red]Starshroom[setfontcol none]! We found a [icon 1UpMushroom],
so we're keeping it there for you.
Kinopio004_Flow011.UsFrench:
Hé, tout le monde t'attend sur le
[setfontcol red]S.S. Champignon[setfontcol none]! Nous avons trouvé
un [icon 1UpMushroom] pour toi!
Kinopio004_Flow011.UsSpanish:
Oye, te esperamos en nuestra
[setfontcol red]Champinave[setfontcol none]. ¡Hemos encontrado un [icon 1UpMushroom]
y te lo estamos guardando!

Kinopio004_Flow012.JpJapanese: [setfontcol green][setfontcol black]そこの[setfontcol green]ポッド[setfontcol black]から![setfontcol green][setfontcol none]

Kinopio005_Flow000.EuDutch:
That spaceship is supposed to [setfontcol red]look
like Mario[setfontcol none], but if you ask me, it looks
more like [icon LuigiFace] [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol none].[newpage]
[setfontcol black]I wonder how [setfontcol green]Luigi [setfontcol black]is doing... He's still
back in the [setfontcol red]Mushroom Kingdom[setfontcol black], right[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio005_Flow000.EuEnglish:
That spaceship is supposed to [setfontcol red]look
like Mario[setfontcol none], but if you ask me, it looks
more like [icon LuigiFace] [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol none].[newpage]
[setfontcol black]I wonder how [setfontcol green]Luigi [setfontcol black]is doing... He's still
back in the [setfontcol red]Mushroom Kingdom[setfontcol black], right[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio005_Flow000.EuFrench:
En théorie, ce vaisseau est censé
[setfontcol red]ressembler à [setfontcol none][icon MarioFace], mais selon moi, il
ressemble plus à [icon LuigiFace].[newpage]
[setfontcol black]D'ailleurs, comment va-t-il, [setfontcol green][icon LuigiFace][setfontcol black]? Il est
toujours au [setfontcol green][setfontcol black][setfontcol red]royaume Champignon[setfontcol black],
pas vrai[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio005_Flow000.EuGerman:
Sie haben wohl versucht,
dieses Raumschiff wie Mario
aussehen zu lassen.[newpage]
Aber wenn du mich fragst, sieht
es eher [icon LuigiFace] [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol none] ähnlich.[newpage]
[setfontcol black]Ich frage mich, was [setfontcol green]Luigi [setfontcol black]wohl
gerade macht... Ob er immer
noch im [setfontcol red]Pilz-Königreich[setfontcol black][setfontcol black] ist?[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio005_Flow000.EuItalian:
Sembra che l'[setfontcol red]Astronave Mario [setfontcol none]sia
stata costruita [setfontcol red]a tua somiglianza[setfontcol none], ma
a me veramente sembra più [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol none] [icon LuigiFace]![newpage]
Mi chiedo cosa stia facendo [setfontcol green]Luigi [setfontcol none][icon LuigiFace],
adesso... Sarà nel [setfontcol red]Regno dei Funghi[setfontcol none]?
Kinopio005_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Tenía entendido que aquella
astronave se [setfontcol red]parecía a ti[setfontcol black],[setfontcol red] Mario[setfontcol none],
aunque a mí me recuerda más a [icon LuigiFace].[newpage]
Ah, [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol black]... Me pregunto qué
será de él[setfontcol green][setfontcol none]. ¿Seguirá en el
[setfontcol red]Reino Champiñón[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]
Kinopio005_Flow000.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]あの<ruby>星船<rt>ほしぶね</rt></ruby>[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]マリオさんに<ruby>似<rt>に</rt></ruby>せてる[setfontcol black]と[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>うのですが
わたしには [icon LuigiFace][setfontcol green]ルイージ[setfontcol none]さんに<ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>えます[newpage]
[setfontcol red]キノコ<ruby>王国<rt>おうこく</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]にいる[setfontcol green]ルイージ[setfontcol none]さん
・・・<ruby>元気<rt>げんき</rt></ruby>かな?
Kinopio005_Flow000.UsEnglish:
That spaceship is supposed to look
like Mario, but if you ask me, it looks
more like [icon LuigiFace] [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol none].[newpage]
[setfontcol black]I wonder how [setfontcol green]Luigi [setfontcol black]is doing... He's still
back in the [setfontcol red]Mushroom Kingdom[setfontcol black], right[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio005_Flow000.UsFrench:
Je pense que ton vaisseau est censé
te ressembler, Mario, mais à mon
avis, il ressemble plus à [setfontcol green]Luigi [setfontcol none][icon LuigiFace].[newpage]
D'ailleurs, je me demande comment
va [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol none]... Il est encore au [setfontcol red]Royaume
Champignon[setfontcol none], non?
Kinopio005_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Esa astronave debería parecerse a
Mario, pero a mí me recuerda más
a [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol none] [icon LuigiFace].[newpage]
[setfontcol black]Me pregunto qué será de [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]...
¿Seguirá en el [setfontcol red]Reino Champiñón[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]

Kinopio005_Flow001.EuDutch:
You can never have too many
[icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up Mushrooms[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio005_Flow001.EuEnglish:
You can never have too many
[icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up Mushrooms[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio005_Flow001.EuFrench:
On a gardé ce [icon 1UpMushroom] juste pour toi!
Ça nous fait plaisir de pouvoir
t'être utiles!
Kinopio005_Flow001.EuGerman:
Von [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up-Pilzen[setfontcol none] kann man
nie genug dabei haben. ♪
Kinopio005_Flow001.EuItalian: I [setfontcol green]Funghi 1-Up [setfontcol none][icon 1UpMushroom] non bastano mai!
Kinopio005_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Los [icon 1UpMushroom] siempre vienen bien!
¡Me encanta ser de utilidad!
Kinopio005_Flow001.JpJapanese:
[icon 1UpMushroom][setfontcol green]1UPキノコ[setfontcol black]をどうぞ[setfontcol green][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]!
[setfontcol none]お<ruby>役<rt>やく</rt></ruby>にたてれば<ruby>嬉<rt>うれ</rt></ruby>しいです
Kinopio005_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Here--have a [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up Mushroom[setfontcol none]!
Hope it's useful!
Kinopio005_Flow001.UsFrench:
Tiens, prends un [setfontcol green]champignon 1UP [setfontcol none][icon 1UpMushroom]!
Tu en as plus besoin que moi!
Kinopio005_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡Toma un [setfontcol green]champiñón de vida extra [setfontcol none][icon 1UpMushroom]!
¡Me encanta ser de utilidad!

KinopioPostmanLetterNormal_Flow001.EuGerman: [setfontcol black]Dem [setfontcol red]Brief [setfontcol black]lag etwas bei: [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green][var integer 1 0]-UP[setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]

galaxies, [setfontcol red]say hello[setfontcol none]! If anyone [setfontcol blue]saves
the universe[setfontcol none], it's gonna be me!

ボクも
[setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar]パワースター[setfontcol none]を<ruby>探<rt>さが</rt></ruby>すことにしたんだ[newpage]

[setfontcol blue]<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>を<ruby>救<rt>すく</rt></ruby>う[setfontcol black]のは[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]、 このボクさ!

LuigiTalkNpc001.EuDutch:
Hey, Bro! I'm all over the place these
days, exploring the universe![newpage]
Next time you see me out there,
talk to me and let [setfontcol green]me [setfontcol none]leap into action,
OK? Catch you later, Bro!
LuigiTalkNpc001.EuEnglish:
Hey, Bro! I'm all over the place these
days, exploring the universe![newpage]
Next time you see me out there,
talk to me and let [setfontcol green]me [setfontcol none]leap into action,
OK? Catch you later, Bro!
LuigiTalkNpc001.EuFrench:
Salut frangin! Figure-toi que [setfontcol green]moi
aussi[setfontcol none], je me suis lancé dans
l'exploration galactique![newpage]
Alors si tu me croises au cours
de tes aventures, viens me parler
pour que [setfontcol green]je[setfontcol none] prenne ta place, O.K.?[newpage]
A plus tard, frangin!
LuigiTalkNpc001.EuGerman:
Bruderherz! Lange nicht gesehen!
[setfontcol black]Ich [setfontcol none]brenne darauf, neue
Abenteuer zu erleben![newpage]
Also lass [setfontcol green]mich [setfontcol none]dir ruhig helfen,
wenn du mich das nächste Mal
da draußen siehst![newpage]
Bis später, Bruderherz!
LuigiTalkNpc001.EuItalian:
Ehi, fratello! Sono sempre in giro ad
esplorare l'universo![newpage]
La prossima volta che mi incontri,
parlami e [setfontcol green]fammi partecipare[setfontcol none]!
Va bene?[newpage]
Ci vediamo, fratello!
LuigiTalkNpc001.EuSpanish:
¡Hola, hermanito! Últimamente estoy
que no paro de explorar el universo.[newpage]
La próxima vez que me veas, ¡habla
[setfontcol green]conmigo [setfontcol none]si quieres que [setfontcol black]te sustituya[setfontcol none]!
¡Hasta luego!
LuigiTalkNpc001.JpJapanese:
<ruby>兄<rt>にい</rt></ruby>さん! [setfontcol black][setfontcol green]ボク[setfontcol black]の<ruby>活躍<rt>かつやく</rt></ruby>、 <ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>ててくれたかい?[setfontcol none][newpage]
また <ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>のどこかで<ruby>出会<rt>であ</rt></ruby>ったら
[setfontcol green]ボク[setfontcol none]にまかせておくれよ![newpage]
じゃあ またね! <ruby>兄<rt>にい</rt></ruby>さん
LuigiTalkNpc001.UsEnglish:
Hey, Bro! I'm all over the place these
days, exploring the universe![newpage]
Next time you see me out there,
talk to me and let [setfontcol green]me [setfontcol none]leap into action,
OK? Catch you later, Bro!
LuigiTalkNpc001.UsFrench:
Hé, Mario! Je me promène un peu
partout dans l'univers, ces jours-ci![newpage]
La prochaine fois que tu me croises,
viens [setfontcol black]me [setfontcol none]parler et [setfontcol green]laisse-[setfontcol none][setfontcol green]moi [setfontcol none]prendre
la relève, d'accord? À plus tard!
LuigiTalkNpc001.UsSpanish:
¡Hola hermanito! ¡Ahora me dedico a
explorar los rincones del universo![newpage]
¡La próxima vez que me veas, puedes
hablar conmigo si quieres que [setfontcol green]me
encargue [setfontcol none]yo un rato! ¡Hasta pronto!

So you're this [setfontcol red][Mario/Luigi] [setfontcol black]guy my little
[setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] [setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow]Lumas[setfontcol black] won't stop blabbing
about, am I right?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]

you had with that [icon Bowser] [setfontcol blue]monster[setfontcol none] down

I sure appreciate you bringing us
this [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol none], though! We need

The name's [setfontcol red]Lubba[setfontcol none], by the by. I'm the
[setfontcol blue]head honcho [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]of this [setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] Luma [setfontcol black]crew[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol black].[setfontcol none]

Sorry to hear about the excitement
you had with that [icon Bowser] [setfontcol blue]monster[setfontcol none] down
in the Mushroom Kingdom.[newpage]
I sure appreciate you bringing us
this [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol none], though! We need
as many of these as we can get![newpage]
The name's [setfontcol red]Lubba[setfontcol none], by the by. I'm the
[setfontcol blue]head honcho [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]of this [setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] Luma [setfontcol black]crew[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol black].[setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow000.EuFrench:
Holà, moussaillon! Tu dois être ce
[setfontcol red][Mario/Luigi][setfontcol black] dont les[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black] [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] [setfontcol black]n'arrêtent pas
[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]de[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol black]me parler![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][newpage]
Dis donc, on dirait bien que ce [setfontcol blue]pirate
[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]de[setfontcol none] [setfontcol black][icon Bowser] t'en a fait voir de belles, au
royaume Champignon![newpage]
Mais bon, merci de t'être décarcassé
et de m'avoir rapporté cette [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar], on
peut dire que j'en avais besoin![newpage]
Au fait, moi c'est [setfontcol red]Lubba[setfontcol none]. Je suis le
[setfontcol blue]maître d'équipage [setfontcol black]de ces[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black] braves [setfontcol yellow][icon Luma][setfontcol none][setfontcol black].[setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow000.EuGerman:
Hallo. Du musst... [setfontcol red][Mario/Luigi] [setfontcol black]sein[setfontcol red][setfontcol black].[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
Meine [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] Luma[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol black]haben mir berichtet,
was im Pilz-Königreich vorgefallen ist.[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][newpage]
Dieser [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red][setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern [setfontcol red][setfontcol black]gehört uns,
danke fürs Zurückbringen.[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
Zu schade, dass der [setfontcol blue][icon Bowser] [setfontcol red]Unhold[setfontcol blue]
[setfontcol none]entwischt ist...[newpage]
Übrigens, mein Name ist [setfontcol purple]Lubba[setfontcol none].
Ich wache über [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]diese [setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] Luma [setfontcol black]hier[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol black].[setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow000.EuItalian:
Ma tu... devi essere... [setfontcol black][setfontcol red][Mario/Luigi][setfontcol black]!
Gli [setfontcol yellow]Sfavillotti[setfontcol black] [setfontcol black][icon Luma] non fanno che
parlare di te![setfontcol black][newpage]
Mi dispiace per quello che è successo
nel Regno dei Funghi con quel [setfontcol blue]tipo [setfontcol black][icon Bowser].[setfontcol none][newpage]
Grazie per averci riportato questa
[setfontcol red]Superstella [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! Ce ne servono tante![newpage]
A proposito, io sono [setfontcol red]Sfavillotto Lume[setfontcol none].
Sono il [setfontcol blue]capo[setfontcol none] di questi [setfontcol yellow]Sfavillotti[setfontcol none] [setfontcol black][icon Luma]![setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Hola! Me llamo [setfontcol red]Destrella[setfontcol none] y estoy
[setfontcol blue]al mando[setfontcol none] de todos estos[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black] [setfontcol yellow][icon Luma][setfontcol none].[newpage]
Tú debes de ser [setfontcol red][Mario/Luigi][setfontcol black], ¿no?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Los [setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] [setfontcol black]no paran de hablar de ti.[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][newpage]
Parece que [setfontcol blue]Bowser [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][icon Bowser][setfontcol none] la ha armado
en el Reino Champiñón. Por cierto,
¡gracias por traernos esta [icon PowerStar]![newpage]
¡Nos hacen falta todas las
[setfontcol yellow]Superestrellas [setfontcol none]posibles!
Meister002_Flow000.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red][Mario/Luigi][setfontcol none]さん ・・・だね?[newpage]
<ruby>下<rt>した</rt></ruby>のキノコ<ruby>王国<rt>おうこく</rt></ruby>でのことは、
[setfontcol yellow][icon Luma]このコたち[setfontcol black]から[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]<ruby>聞<rt>き</rt></ruby>いている[newpage]
この[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol black]は わたしらのものなんだ
<ruby>取<rt>と</rt></ruby>り<ruby>戻<rt>もど</rt></ruby>してくれて[setfontcol red][setfontcol none] アリガトよ[newpage]
だが・・・ [setfontcol blue][icon Bowser]カイブツ[setfontcol none]は<ruby>取<rt>と</rt></ruby>り<ruby>逃<rt>のが</rt></ruby>したようだね[newpage]
わたしの<ruby>名<rt>な</rt></ruby>は、 [setfontcol red]ルーバ[setfontcol none]
[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]こいつら[setfontcol yellow][icon Luma]チコ[setfontcol none]の[setfontcol blue]<ruby>親分<rt>おやぶん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]みたいなものさ
Meister002_Flow000.UsEnglish:
So you're this [setfontcol red][Mario/Luigi] [setfontcol black]guy my little
[setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] [setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow]Lumas[setfontcol black] won't stop blabbing
about, am I right?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
Sorry to hear about the excitement
you had with that [icon Bowser] [setfontcol blue]monster[setfontcol none] down
in the Mushroom Kingdom.[newpage]
I sure appreciate you bringing us

The name's [setfontcol red]Lubba[setfontcol none], by the by. I'm the
[setfontcol blue]head honcho [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]of this [setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] Luma [setfontcol black]crew[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol black].[setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow000.UsFrench:
Bateau de bateau! Alors, c'est toi
le matelot nommé [setfontcol red][Mario/Luigi] [setfontcol none]dont mes
[setfontcol yellow]Luma [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] [setfontcol none]n'arrêtent pas de parler?[newpage]
J'ai entendu dire que tu as eu des
problèmes avec un gros [setfontcol blue]monstre [setfontcol none][icon Bowser]

Oh, et merci beaucoup de nous avoir
ramené cette [setfontcol red]super étoile [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! Nous

Mon nom est [setfontcol red]Lubba[setfontcol none]. Je suis le [setfontcol blue]chef

Meister002_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Hola! Me llamo [setfontcol red]Destrella[setfontcol none] y [setfontcol blue]me
ocupo[setfontcol none] de todos estos[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black] [setfontcol yellow]destellos[setfontcol black] [setfontcol yellow][icon Luma][setfontcol none].[newpage]
Tú debes de ser [setfontcol red][Mario/Luigi][setfontcol black], ¿no?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Meister002_Flow001.EuDutch:
See, believe it or not, we're on a
[setfontcol blue]spaceship [setfontcol black]right now[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black].[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black][newpage]

convert this little planetoid into a

[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]May not look like much...[wait 15]but it's home.[setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow001.EuEnglish:
See, believe it or not, we're on a

[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]May not look like much...[wait 15]but it's home.[setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow001.EuFrench:
Bon, je sais, c'est dur à croire... mais
ce gros truc rond sur lequel t'as posé
les pattes est un [setfontcol blue]vaisseau spatial[setfontcol none].[newpage]
Nous, les [setfontcol red][icon Luma][setfontcol black], on a réussi l'exploit
de transformer une petite planète
en [setfontcol blue]vaisseau[setfontcol black].[setfontcol blue][newpage]
[setfontcol black]Ça n'en a pas l'air, mais c'est notre
petit chez-nous, maintenant! [setfontcol blue][setfontcol black][setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]T'en
restes baba, hein, petit gars?[setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow001.EuGerman:
Ob du es glaubst oder nicht, du
stehst gerade auf einem [setfontcol blue]Raumschiff[setfontcol none].[newpage]
Wir [icon Luma] [setfontcol yellow]Luma [setfontcol none]haben diesen kleinen
Planeten in ein [setfontcol blue]Schiff [setfontcol black]verwandelt,
um [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]durch das Weltall zu reisen.
Meister002_Flow001.EuItalian:
Beh, credici oppure no, ma adesso tu
sei a bordo di un'[setfontcol blue]astronave[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Noi [setfontcol red]Sfavillotti[setfontcol none] abbiamo trasformato
un piccolo pianeta in un'[setfontcol blue]astronave[setfontcol none] per
viaggiare nello spazio. Geniale, no?
Meister002_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Aunque no te lo parezca, ahora mismo
estás a bordo de una [setfontcol blue]astronave[setfontcol none].[newpage]
¡Los [setfontcol red]destellos [setfontcol none]hemos convertido este
planetoide en una [setfontcol blue]astronave [setfontcol none]capaz de
surcar el universo! Está guay, ¿eh?
Meister002_Flow001.JpJapanese:
<ruby>信<rt>しん</rt></ruby>じられないかもしれないが
アンタは [setfontcol blue]<ruby>宇宙船<rt>うちゅうせん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]の<ruby>上<rt>うえ</rt></ruby>にいるんだよ[newpage]
わたしら[setfontcol red]チコ[setfontcol none]は、 <ruby>小<rt>ちい</rt></ruby>さな<ruby>惑星<rt>わくせい</rt></ruby>を[setfontcol blue]<ruby>船<rt>ふね</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]にして
<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>を<ruby>旅<rt>たび</rt></ruby>してるんだ
Meister002_Flow001.UsEnglish:
See, believe it or not, we're on a

Car vois-tu, crois-le ou non, nous nous

Nous, les [setfontcol red]Luma[setfontcol black], avons travaillé très
fort pour transformer cette mini

Ce n'est pas grand-chose, [setfontcol black][wait 15][setfontcol black]mais c'est
notre chez-nous.[setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Aunque no te lo parezca, ahora mismo

¡Los [setfontcol red]destellos [setfontcol none]hemos convertido este
planetoide en una [setfontcol blue]nave [setfontcol none]capaz de
surcar el universo! Es linda, ¿verdad?

Meister002_Flow002.EuDutch:
Truth be told, the [setfontcol blue]ship[setfontcol none]...[wait 15]she's not in
such hot shape right now[setfontcol black].[setfontcol none][newpage]
We ran into that [setfontcol red][icon Bowser] monster[setfontcol black] too! He
blasted us with meteors, and [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]some of
my [setfontcol yellow]crew[setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none]were thrown overboard!
Meister002_Flow002.EuEnglish:
Truth be told, the [setfontcol blue]ship[setfontcol none]...[wait 15]she's not in
such hot shape right now[setfontcol black].[setfontcol none][newpage]
We ran into that [setfontcol red][icon Bowser] monster[setfontcol black] too! He
blasted us with meteors, and [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]some of
my [setfontcol yellow]crew[setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none]were thrown overboard!
Meister002_Flow002.EuFrench:
Mais t'as vu ce qui est arrivé à notre
beau [setfontcol blue]vaisseau[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none][newpage]
On a eu le malheur de croiser la route
de ce [setfontcol red]pirate de [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Bowser][setfontcol black]![setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
Il[setfontcol red] [setfontcol none]nous a balancé des météores et le
[setfontcol blue]vaisseau [setfontcol black]en a pris un sacré coup![newpage]
Une partie de mon [setfontcol yellow]équipage [setfontcol black][setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]a été
éjectée par-dessus bord!
Meister002_Flow002.EuGerman:
Siehst du, was mit unserem
[setfontcol blue]Raumschiff [setfontcol black]passiert ist?[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][newpage]
Dieser [setfontcol red][icon Bowser] Unhold [setfontcol black]hat [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]Meteoriten
auf uns geschleudert und dabei
wurde das [setfontcol blue]Schiff [setfontcol none]zerstört.[newpage]
Durch die Erschütterungen sind auch
einige Mitglieder meiner [setfontcol yellow]Mannschaft[setfontcol none]
über Bord geschleudert worden...
Meister002_Flow002.EuItalian:
Ma in questo momento la nostra
[setfontcol blue]astronave[setfontcol none] è in condizioni discutibili...[newpage]
Quel [setfontcol red]mostro [setfontcol none][setfontcol black][icon Bowser] [setfontcol none]ci ha colpiti con delle
meteoriti e alcuni dei nostri [setfontcol yellow]amici
[setfontcol none]sono stati scagliati fuori bordo.
Meister002_Flow002.EuSpanish:
Aunque a decir verdad...[wait 15] la [setfontcol blue]astronave[setfontcol none]
ha visto tiempos mejores.[newpage]
¡[setfontcol red][icon Bowser] [setfontcol black]nos [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]atacó[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol none]con meteoritos y parte
de mi [setfontcol yellow]tripulación [setfontcol black]cayó[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol black]por la borda[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]!
Meister002_Flow002.JpJapanese:
その[setfontcol blue]<ruby>宇宙船<rt>うちゅうせん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]が、 このザマさ[newpage]
[setfontcol red][icon Bowser]カイブツ[setfontcol none]に <ruby>隕石<rt>いんせき</rt></ruby>をぶつけられて
[setfontcol blue]<ruby>船<rt>ふね</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]はこわれ、 [setfontcol yellow]<ruby>仲間<rt>なかま</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]はチリヂリに・・・
Meister002_Flow002.UsEnglish:
Truth be told, the [setfontcol blue]ship[setfontcol none]...[wait 15]she's not in
such hot shape right now[setfontcol black].[setfontcol none][newpage]
We ran into that [setfontcol red][icon Bowser] monster[setfontcol black] too! He
blasted us with meteors, and [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]some of
my [setfontcol yellow]crew[setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none]were thrown overboard!
Meister002_Flow002.UsFrench:
Mais... heu... notre [setfontcol blue]vaisseau[setfontcol none]... n'est
plus ce qu'il était, comme tu peux le
voir.[newpage]
Nous avons eu droit à la colère de ce
gros [setfontcol red]monstre [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Bowser][setfontcol none], nous aussi! Ils nous
a lancé des météorites...[newpage]
...et une partie de mon [setfontcol yellow]équipage [setfontcol none]est
passée par-dessus bord!
Meister002_Flow002.UsSpanish:
¿Te has fijado en lo que le ha
ocurrido a nuestra [setfontcol blue]astronave[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none][newpage]
¡El [setfontcol red]monstruo [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Bowser] [setfontcol none]nos tiró un meteoro,
la [setfontcol blue]nave[setfontcol none] se rompió y nuestros [setfontcol yellow]amigos
[setfontcol none]se dispersaron por todo el universo!

Meister002_Flow003.EuDutch:
So that [icon Bowser] [setfontcol red]monster [setfontcol none]kidnapped
your [setfontcol blue][icon Peach] princess[setfontcol black], eh[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]? That's cold...
Deep-space cold, if ya ask me.[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow003.EuEnglish:
So that [icon Bowser] [setfontcol red]monster [setfontcol none]kidnapped
your [setfontcol blue][icon Peach] princess[setfontcol black], eh[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]? That's cold...
Deep-space cold, if ya ask me.[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow003.EuFrench:
D'après ce qu'on m'a dit, ce [setfontcol red]pirate
de[setfontcol none] [icon Bowser] s'est invité à la fête et a
kidnappé [setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]ta chère[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]princesse [setfontcol black][setfontcol blue][icon Peach][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow003.EuGerman:
[Mario/Luigi], soweit ich das verstanden
habe, hat der [icon Bowser] [setfontcol red]Unhold [setfontcol black]also[setfontcol red]
[setfontcol none]deine [setfontcol blue][icon Peach] Prinzessin [setfontcol black]entführt[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]?
Meister002_Flow003.EuItalian:
E così, quel [setfontcol red]mostro[setfontcol none] [icon Bowser] ha
rapito la tua bella [setfontcol blue]Principessa [setfontcol none][setfontcol black][icon Peach]...[setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow003.EuSpanish:
Ha sido ese [setfontcol red]cobarde [setfontcol black]de [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][icon Bowser][setfontcol red] [setfontcol none]quien
ha secuestrado a la [setfontcol blue]princesa [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][icon Peach][setfontcol black], ¿no?[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow003.JpJapanese:
[Mario/Luigi]さんも [icon Bowser]あの[setfontcol red]カイブツ[setfontcol none]に
[setfontcol blue][icon Peach]<ruby>大切<rt>たいせつ</rt></ruby>なお<ruby>姫様<rt>ひめさま</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]をさらわれたんだろ?!
Meister002_Flow003.UsEnglish:
So that [icon Bowser] [setfontcol red]monster [setfontcol none]kidnapped
your [setfontcol blue][icon Peach] princess[setfontcol black], eh[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]? That's cold...
Deep-space cold, if ya ask me.[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Meister002_Flow003.UsFrench:
Alors ce [setfontcol red]monstre [setfontcol none][icon Bowser] a kidnappé ta
[setfontcol blue]princesse [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][icon Peach][setfontcol none], c'est ça? Mouette de
mouette, c'est terrible...
Meister002_Flow003.UsSpanish:
A ver si lo he entendido bien, [Mario/Luigi].
¿Dices que ese [setfontcol red]monstruo [setfontcol none]de [icon Bowser][setfontcol red] [setfontcol none]ha
secuestrado a tu [setfontcol blue]princesa [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][icon Peach][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]

Meister002_Flow004.EuDutch:
Ya know what else is cold? That
[icon Bowser] [setfontcol red]monster [setfontcol none]stealing every last one of
our [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol none]![newpage]
See, that's our fuel. Our [setfontcol blue]spaceship
[setfontcol black]runs on[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol red]energy from [setfontcol blue][setfontcol red][icon PowerStar][setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]! Without
that, we're stranded here!
Meister002_Flow004.EuEnglish:
Ya know what else is cold? That
[icon Bowser] [setfontcol red]monster [setfontcol none]stealing every last one of
our [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol none]![newpage]
See, that's our fuel. Our [setfontcol blue]spaceship
[setfontcol black]runs on[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol red]energy from [setfontcol blue][setfontcol red][icon PowerStar][setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]! Without
that, we're stranded here!
Meister002_Flow004.EuFrench:
Il m'a dérobé des trucs précieux, à
moi aussi! Ce [setfontcol red]pirate [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]de [setfontcol none][icon Bowser] m'a piqué
absolument toutes mes [icon PowerStar]![newpage]
Notre [setfontcol black][setfontcol blue]vaisseau [setfontcol black]se sert justement du
pouvoir de ces [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol black]comme [setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]carburant[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]![newpage]
Sans [icon PowerStar], on est coincés à quai. Tu
vois le topo, mon gars?
Meister002_Flow004.EuGerman:
Aber er hat auch vor uns nicht
haltgemacht. Dieser [icon Bowser] [setfontcol red]Unhold [setfontcol none]hat
all unsere [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]Power-Sterne [setfontcol black]entwendet![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][newpage]
Unser [setfontcol blue]Raumschiff [setfontcol black]benötigt die
[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol red]Energie [setfontcol black]der [setfontcol red][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Sterne[setfontcol red][setfontcol none],
um fliegen zu können.[newpage]
Ohne [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Sterne
[setfontcol none]stecken wir also fest!
Meister002_Flow004.EuItalian:
Sappi che ha preso qualcosa di
speciale anche a noi! Quel [setfontcol red]mostro[setfontcol none] [icon Bowser]
ci ha portato via le [setfontcol yellow]Superstelle[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar]![newpage]
La nostra [setfontcol blue]astronave[setfontcol black] ha bisogno della
[setfontcol red]loro [setfontcol black][setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]energia[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol none]per volare! Senza
[setfontcol yellow]Superstelle [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar] non ci si muove da qui!
Meister002_Flow004.EuSpanish:
Pues también se ha llevado algo
muy especial para nosotros... ¡Todas
nuestras [icon PowerStar]! ¡Menudo [setfontcol red]villano[setfontcol none], [setfontcol black]ese [setfontcol none][icon Bowser]![setfontcol red][newpage]
[setfontcol black]La [setfontcol blue]astronave [setfontcol black]se propulsa gracias a
las [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]. ¡Sin ellas no nos podemos
mover!
Meister002_Flow004.JpJapanese:

Penguin000.EuDutch:
Shake [icon WiiRemote] when you're in the water
for a [setfontcol red]burst of speed[setfontcol none]! A lot of
penguins don't know that...
Penguin000.EuEnglish:
Shake [icon WiiRemote] when you're in the water
for a [setfontcol red]burst of speed[setfontcol none]! A lot of
penguins don't know that...
Penguin000.EuFrench:
Fatigué de nager comme une pierre?
Alors agite la [icon WiiRemote] sous l'eau pour
[setfontcol blue]accélérer [setfontcol black]comme un vrai pingouin![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Penguin000.EuGerman:
Schüttele die [icon WiiRemote] Wii-Fernbedienung
für einen [setfontcol red]Geschwindigkeitsschub[setfontcol none],
wenn du unter Wasser bist!
Penguin000.EuItalian:
Puoi scuotere il [setfontcol blue]telecomando Wii [setfontcol none][icon WiiRemote],
quando sei sott'acqua, per [setfontcol red]accelerare[setfontcol none]!
Tanti pinguini non lo sanno neanche!
Penguin000.EuSpanish:
¡Agita el [icon WiiRemote] cuando estés bajo
el agua para [setfontcol red]dar un acelerón[setfontcol none]!
Penguin000.JpJapanese:
<ruby>最近<rt>さいきん</rt></ruby> <ruby>泳<rt>およ</rt></ruby>いでる? <ruby>水中<rt>すいちゅう</rt></ruby>で
[setfontcol blue][icon WiiRemote]Wiiリモコン[setfontcol none]ふったら [setfontcol red]ちょっと<ruby>速<rt>はや</rt></ruby>い[setfontcol black]んだ[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]!
Penguin000.UsEnglish:
Shake [icon WiiRemote] when you're in the water
for a [setfontcol blue]burst of speed[setfontcol none]! A lot of
penguins don't know that...
Penguin000.UsFrench:
Secoue [icon WiiRemote] lorsque tu es dans l'eau
pour une petite [setfontcol blue]poussée de vitesse[setfontcol none]!
Peu de pingouins savent ça...
Penguin000.UsSpanish:
¡Agita el [icon WiiRemote] cuando estés bajo
el agua para [setfontcol red]dar un acelerón[setfontcol none]!

Pichan000_Flow000.EuDutch:
Listen up! Listen up! There's a trick
to going fast with Fluzzard![newpage]
Point [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]down to dive[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol blue]Keep diving [setfontcol black]to
go fast[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]! [setfontcol blue]Dive[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol blue]Dive [setfontcol none]whenever you can!
Fast! Fast!
Pichan000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Listen up! Listen up! There's a trick
to going fast with Fluzzard![newpage]
Point [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]down to dive[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol blue]Keep diving [setfontcol black]to
go fast[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]! [setfontcol blue]Dive[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol blue]Dive [setfontcol none]whenever you can!
Fast! Fast!
Pichan000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Ecoute! Il y a un truc pour aller plus
vite avec Araplane! Truc! Truc![newpage]
Incline la [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]vers le bas pour piquer[setfontcol none]!
Faut [setfontcol blue]piquer [setfontcol none]pour foncer! [setfontcol blue]Piquer[setfontcol none]!
[setfontcol blue]Piquer[setfontcol none]! Yark!
Pichan000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Hör gut zu! Hör gut zu! Es gibt da
einen Kniff, um schnell zu fliegen![newpage]
Richte die [icon WiiRemote] nach [setfontcol red]unten, um zu
sinken[setfontcol none]! Je steiler du sinkst, umso
schneller wirst du dabei![newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Sinkflug! Sinkflug![setfontcol none] Überall, wo möglich!
Schnell! Schnell!
Pichan000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Attenzione! Attenzione! C'è un
trucchetto per andare più
velocemente con Alapinta![newpage]
Punta il telecomando Wii [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]in basso
per scendere in picchiata[setfontcol none]! Continua a
scendere per [setfontcol blue]andare più [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]velocemente[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Dove puoi, vai giù in [setfontcol blue]picchiata[setfontcol none]!
Veloce! Veloce!
Pichan000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Oye! ¡Escúchame bien!
¡Volar rápido tiene su truco![newpage]
¡Apunta con el [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]hacia abajo[setfontcol black] para[setfontcol red]
lanzarte en picado[setfontcol none]! ¡Así [setfontcol blue]planearás[setfontcol none]
a toda pastilla![newpage]
¡Recuerda: [setfontcol blue]en picado[setfontcol none]! ¡Intenta hacerlo
cuando puedas para ir más rápido!
Pichan000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
オボエテ! オボエテ! 
はやく とぶコツ![newpage]
[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol blue]Wiiリモコン[setfontcol none]を[setfontcol red]<ruby>下<rt>した</rt></ruby>に<ruby>向<rt>む</rt></ruby>けて <ruby>急降下<rt>きゅうこうか</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]!
ズット! ズット! [setfontcol blue]かたむけつづける[setfontcol none]![newpage]
ズーット! ズーット! 
[setfontcol blue]かたむけられる[setfontcol none]ところを とんで! とんで!
Pichan000_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Listen up! Listen up! There's a trick
to going fast with Fluzzard![newpage]
Point [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]down to dive[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol blue]Keep diving [setfontcol black]to
go fast[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]! Dive! Dive whenever you can!
Fast! Fast!
Pichan000_Flow000.UsFrench:
Écoute-moi! Écoute! Je connais un
truc pour planer rapidement avec
Araplane![newpage]
Pointe [icon WiiRemote] vers le bas pour faire
[setfontcol red]un piqué[setfontcol none]! Fais des [setfontcol blue]piqués [setfontcol none]pour aller
vite! Dès que tu le peux! Vite, vite!
Pichan000_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Oye! ¡Escúchame bien!
¡Volar rápido tiene su truco![newpage]
¡Apunta con el [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol red]hacia abajo[setfontcol black] para[setfontcol red]
lanzarte en picada[setfontcol none]! ¡Así [setfontcol blue]planearás[setfontcol none]
a toda velocidad![newpage]
¡Recuerda: [setfontcol blue]en picada[setfontcol none]! ¡Intenta hacerlo
cuando puedas para ir más rápido!

Rabbit001.EuDutch:
Shake [icon WiiRemote] when you're in mid-jump!
[setfontcol red]Spinning[setfontcol none] will give you just a little
more [setfontcol blue]OOMPH[setfontcol none]![newpage]
How do you think I jump so high,
boiyoing? Try it with me!
Rabbit001.EuEnglish:
Shake [icon WiiRemote] when you're in mid-jump!
[setfontcol red]Spinning[setfontcol none] will give you just a little
more [setfontcol blue]OOMPH[setfontcol none]![newpage]
How do you think I jump so high,
boiyoing? Try it with me!
Rabbit001.EuFrench:
Agite la [icon WiiRemote] en plein saut! En
[setfontcol red]tournoyant[setfontcol black], tu gagnes un petit peu
de [setfontcol black]boïng [setfontcol black]en hauteur et en longueur[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]![newpage]
Comment tu crois que je fais pour
bondir si haut, moi? Allez, saute
avec moi! Boïng!
Rabbit001.EuGerman:
Schüttele die [icon WiiRemote] Wii-Fernbedienung,
während du in der Luft bist! [setfontcol red]Dreh
[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]dich [setfontcol none]für einen extra Satz in die Höhe![newpage]
Wie sonst, denkst du, komme ich so
elegant so hoch hinaus?
Hoppelhopphopp!
Rabbit001.EuItalian:
Scuoti il telecomando Wii [icon WiiRemote] quando
ti trovi in aria! Una [setfontcol red]piroetta[setfontcol none] ti darà
una piccola [setfontcol blue]spinta[setfontcol none] in alto![newpage]
Come credi che io riesca a saltare
così in alto? PION-PION?
Rabbit001.EuSpanish:
¡Agita el [icon WiiRemote] en medio de un salto
y harás un [setfontcol red]Giro[setfontcol none] que te dará un poco
más de [setfontcol blue]impulso[setfontcol none]![newpage]
¿Por qué te crees que yo salto tan
alto? ¡Boing! ¡Venga, pruébalo!
Rabbit001.JpJapanese:
ジャ～ンプ<ruby>中<rt>ちゅう</rt></ruby>に[icon WiiRemote][setfontcol blue]Wiiリモコン[setfontcol none]をふって!
あと<ruby>少<rt>すこ</rt></ruby>しで<ruby>届<rt>とど</rt></ruby>きそうな<ruby>所<rt>ところ</rt></ruby>も <ruby>迷<rt>まよ</rt></ruby>わず[setfontcol red]スピ～ン[setfontcol none]![newpage]
ボクらは、 そうやって<ruby>高<rt>たか</rt></ruby>い<ruby>所<rt>ところ</rt></ruby>にも
ジャンプできるんだピョン![newpage]
ほら! <ruby>一緒<rt>いっしょ</rt></ruby>にやってみるピョン!
Rabbit001.UsEnglish:
Shake [icon WiiRemote] when you're in midjump!
[setfontcol red]Spinning[setfontcol none] will give you just a little
more [setfontcol blue]OOMPH[setfontcol none]![newpage]
How do you think I jump so high,
boiyoing? Try it with me!
Rabbit001.UsFrench:
Si tu as besoin d'aller un peu plus
haut, secoue [icon WiiRemote] lorsque tu es dans
les airs pour [setfontcol red]tourbillonner[setfontcol none]![newpage]
C'est notre petit secret à nous, les
lapins de l'espace. Allez, saute et
tourbillonne avec moi! BOÏ-YONG!
Rabbit001.UsSpanish:
¡Agita el [icon WiiRemote] en medio de un salto
y harás un [setfontcol red]Giro[setfontcol none] que te dará un poco
más de [setfontcol blue]impulso[setfontcol none]![newpage]
¿Por qué crees que yo salto tan
alto? ¡Boing! ¡Vamos, pruébalo!

SignBoard002.EuDutch:

If you [setfontcol blue]jump [setfontcol none]while crouching with [icon Zbtn],

If you [setfontcol blue]jump [setfontcol none]while crouching with [icon Zbtn],

If you run and then press [icon Zbtn] right
before a [setfontcol blue]jump[setfontcol none], you'll do a [setfontcol red]long jump[setfontcol none]!
Try it! It feels pretty great!

If you run and then press [icon Zbtn] right

Tico060.EuDutch:

down [setfontcol black][icon MinusBtn] or [icon PlusBtn] and choose

 Les émeraudes seront révélées."[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]

Tico063_Flow000.EuDutch:
Oh wow, you've got them all now! I'm
going to have to brag to everyone!

Oh wow, you've got them all now! I'm
going to have to brag to everyone!

orgoglioso di te!
Tico063_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Los has conseguido todos!
¡Se lo voy a contar a todo el mundo!
Tico063_Flow000.JpJapanese:
ついに<ruby>全部<rt>ぜんぶ</rt></ruby>そろいましたね!
みんなにも <ruby>自慢<rt>じまん</rt></ruby>しますよ!
Tico063_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Oh wow, you've got them all now! I'm
going to have to brag to everyone!
Tico063_Flow000.UsFrench:
Oh wow! Ta collection d'objets
spéciaux est complète! Bravo!

Tico064.EuDutch: This has turned out to be a fine ship!
Tico064.EuEnglish: This has turned out to be a fine ship!
Tico064.EuFrench:
Au bout du compte, ce vaisseau
n'est pas mal du tout!
Tico064.EuGerman: Ich mag unser Raumschiff wirklich gerne!
Tico064.EuItalian:
È diventata proprio
una bella astronave!
Tico064.JpJapanese: いい<ruby>船<rt>ふね</rt></ruby>になりましたね
Tico064.UsEnglish: This has turned out to be a fine ship!
Tico064.UsFrench:
Nous nous sommes vraiment surpassés
en construisant ce vaisseau! Je l'adore!
Tico064.UsSpanish: ¡Al final nos quedó una nave decente!

Meister_100EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Oh! One of my [setfontcol blue][setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] [setfontcol blue][setfontcol yellow]little guys[setfontcol black] is back[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]!
[setfontcol none]I was wondering what happened to
the little feller after he fell off...
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Oh! One of my [setfontcol blue][setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] [setfontcol blue][setfontcol yellow]little guys[setfontcol black] is back[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]!
[setfontcol none]I was wondering what happened to
the little feller after he fell off...
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Oh, revoilà un de mes [setfontcol blue][setfontcol yellow]petiots [setfontcol blue][setfontcol black][icon Luma]!
Je me demandais ce qu'il lui était
arrivé! Ça alors![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Sieh mal einer an! Einer meiner
[icon Luma] [setfontcol blue][setfontcol yellow]kleinen Freunde[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol black]ist wieder da[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]!
Hatte ihn schon vermisst...
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
Oh! Uno dei miei [setfontcol yellow]piccoli [setfontcol black][icon Luma] è tornato!
[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]Mi chiedevo proprio che fine avesse
fatto...
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Vaya! ¡Si ha regresado uno de mis
[setfontcol yellow]grumetes [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][icon Luma][setfontcol none] perdidos! No sabes la
preocupación que tenía encima...
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese:
お! [setfontcol blue][setfontcol yellow][icon Luma]うちの<ruby>若<rt>わか</rt></ruby>いの[setfontcol black]が[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]<ruby>帰<rt>かえ</rt></ruby>ってきたじゃないか[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]!
<ruby>落<rt>お</rt></ruby>っこちてから、 どうなったかと<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>ってたが…
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Oh! One of my [setfontcol blue][setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] [setfontcol blue][setfontcol yellow]little guys[setfontcol black] is back[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]!
[setfontcol none]I was wondering what happened to
the little feller after he fell off...
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Par tous les océans galactiques! Un
de mes [setfontcol yellow]moussaillons [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][icon Luma][setfontcol none] est revenu![newpage]
Je me demandais ce qui lui était
arrivé après être tombé du vaisseau...
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Mira eso! ¡Uno de mis [setfontcol yellow]pequeñines
[setfontcol none]ha vuelto! No sabes la preocupación
que tenía por él...

Meister_100EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
He built a ship to get back, huh?
That's [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]my [setfontcol yellow]crew [setfontcol none]for you!
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
He built a ship to get back, huh?
That's [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]my [setfontcol yellow]crew [setfontcol none]for you!
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
Il[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none]a construit un vaisseau pour
revenir ici, hein? Hé hé! [setfontcol black]B[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]rave
[setfontcol black]petit gars! [setfontcol black][setfontcol none]Non mais [setfontcol yellow]quel [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][setfontcol yellow]équipage[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Das ist aber was![wait 15] Ist er wirklich mit
dem Pilz-Raumschiff zurückgekehrt?
So ein [setfontcol yellow]kluges Kerlchen[setfontcol none]!
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
E guarda! Il mio [setfontcol yellow]equipaggio [setfontcol none]ha
costruito questa navicella per tornare
qui! Sono in gamba, i miei [setfontcol yellow]piccoli[setfontcol none]!
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Anda, [wait 15]pero si ha construido
una nave para volver aquí!
¡Qué majos son mis [setfontcol yellow]destellos[setfontcol none]!
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese:
<ruby>船<rt>ふね</rt></ruby>を<ruby>作<rt>つく</rt></ruby>って <ruby>戻<rt>もど</rt></ruby>ってくるたぁ
さすがは [setfontcol yellow]うち[setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow]のコたち[setfontcol none]だねえ
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
He built a ship to get back, huh?
That's [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]my [setfontcol yellow]crew [setfontcol none]for you!
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
Oh! Il a construit un vaisseau pour
revenir ici! Un vrai petit loup de
mer galactique, ce [setfontcol yellow]Luma[setfontcol none]!
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡Anda, [wait 15]pero si ha construido
una nave para volver aquí!
¡Qué hábiles son mis [setfontcol yellow]destellos[setfontcol none]!

Meister_100EventNotice_Flow002.EuDutch:
Uh... [setfontcol red]Those [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol red]guys[setfontcol red] [setfontcol black]are all friends of
yours, right[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]?
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow002.EuEnglish:
Uh... [setfontcol red]Those [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol red]guys[setfontcol red] [setfontcol black]are all friends of
yours, right[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]?
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow002.EuFrench: Heu... Tu connais [setfontcol red]c[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]es [setfontcol red]gars[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol red]-là[setfontcol none], matelot?
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow002.EuGerman:
[setfontcol red]Diese kleinen Frohnaturen [setfontcol none]sind

Meister_100EventNotice_Flow002.EuItalian:
Ma... [setfontcol red]quei tipi [setfontcol none][setfontcol black][icon Toad][setfontcol none]... sono tutti

Meister_100EventNotice_Flow002.JpJapanese:
しかし、 [setfontcol red][icon Toad]あの<ruby>連中<rt>れんちゅう</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]は だれだい?! 
アンタの<ruby>知<rt>し</rt></ruby>り<ruby>合<rt>あ</rt></ruby>いかい?

Uh... [setfontcol red]Those [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol red]guys[setfontcol red] [setfontcol black]are all friends of
yours, right[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]?
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow002.UsFrench:
Ah? [setfontcol red]Ces personnes [setfontcol none]sont des amis
à toi? Bâbord de bâbord, tu es
populaire!
Meister_100EventNotice_Flow002.UsSpanish:
Eh... [setfontcol red]Todos esos[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] [setfontcol black]son amigos tuyos,
¿verdad?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Meister_100EventNotice_Flow003.EuEnglish:

Meister_100EventNotice_Flow003.UsSpanish:
