Meister_101EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Say, I don't mean to pry or anything...
but what is that thing over there?
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Say, I don't mean to pry or anything...
but what is that thing over there?
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Dis, moussaillon, je veux pas
m'occuper de tes oignons...
Mais, c'est quoi, ce truc là-bas?
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Es geht mich ja nichts an, aber...
Was ist das da für ein Ding?
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
Senti, non voglio ficcare il naso
dappertutto... Ma che cos'è quella
cosa?
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
No es que quiera entrometerme,
pero tenemos un polizón a bordo.
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Say, I don't mean to pry or anything...
but what is that thing over there?
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Heu, je ne veux pas faire de vagues,
mais... C'est quoi cette chose là-bas?
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Oye, no quiero entrometerme ni nada,
pero... ¿qué es esa cosa de allí?

Meister_101EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
[setfontcol black]I mean, be straight with me, pal. You
hatching [setfontcol green]alien eggs [setfontcol black]now? Har har![setfontcol none]
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol black]I mean, be straight with me, pal. You
hatching [setfontcol green]alien eggs [setfontcol black]now? Har har![setfontcol none]
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
[setfontcol black]La confiance, c'est essentiel sur un
navire! Alors, entre nous, tu ferais
pas du trafic d'[setfontcol green]œufs extraterrestres[setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
[setfontcol black]Du weißt doch, dass wir hier auf dem
Schiff keine Geheimnisse voreinander
haben sollten, stimmt's?[newpage]
Dann mal ehrlich: Du fängst doch wohl
nicht an, uns [setfontcol green]Eier von Außerirdischen
[setfontcol black]in den Garten zu legen, oder?[wait 30] [setfontsize small]Hahaha![setfontcol none]
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Sappiamo tutti quanto sia importante
l'onestà, quindi sii sincero con me!
Hai portato uno [setfontcol green]strano uovo[setfontcol none]?
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
A mí no tienes por qué mentirme.
¿No estarás incubando [setfontcol green]huevos
extraterrestres[setfontcol none]? ¡Ja, ja!
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol green][setfontcol green]<ruby>変<rt>へん</rt></ruby>なタマゴ[setfontcol green][setfontcol none]を<ruby>持<rt>も</rt></ruby>ち<ruby>込<rt>こ</rt></ruby>んで
こっそり<ruby>遊<rt>あそ</rt></ruby>ぶコンタンだね?
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol black]I mean, be straight with me, pal. You
hatching [setfontcol green]alien eggs [setfontcol black]now? Har har![setfontcol none]
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
N'essaie pas de me monter un bateau!
Tu transportes des [setfontcol green]œufs d'extrater-
restres [setfontcol none]à bord, c'est ça? Har, har!
Meister_101EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
N[setfontcol black]o me engañes, amigo. ¿No estarás
incubando [setfontcol green]huevos alienígenas[setfontcol black]? ¡Ja, ja![setfontcol none]

Meister_102EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
[setfontcol black]You brought back a [setfontcol red]Star Bunny[setfontcol black]?!
Heh heh... Know the one thing in the
galaxy cuter than one o' those?[setfontcol none][newpage]
Nothing, that's what! Har har har!
Did I get ya on that one?
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol black]You brought back a [setfontcol red]Star Bunny[setfontcol black]?!
Heh heh... Know the one thing in the
galaxy cuter than one o' those?[setfontcol none][newpage]
Nothing, that's what! Har har har!
Did I get ya on that one?
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
[setfontcol black]T'as ramené un [setfontcol red]Lapin stellaire[setfontcol black]?!
Hé hé, petit gars... Tu sais ce qui est
encore plus mignon que ces bêtes-là?[setfontcol none][newpage]
Ben, en fait... rien! Arf, arf! Allons, te
vexe pas, matelot, c'était pour rire...
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
[setfontcol black]Du hast einen [setfontcol red]Sternenhasen
[setfontcol black]mitgebracht?!? Wie schön... 
Hast du je etwas Süßeres gesehen?[setfontcol none][newpage]
Siehst du, ich auch nicht! Hahaha!
Es gibt eben im ganzen Universum
nichts Knuddeligeres. Ganz sicher!
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
Hai portato un [setfontcol red]Astroniglio[setfontcol none]?!
Vuoi sapere cosa c'è di più carino di
questi conigli in tutto l'universo?[newpage]
Niente! Eh, sì! Ahahah! Bella questa!
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Veo que has traído un [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]conejo estelar[setfontcol black].
Es uno de los bichos más lindos que
hay en todo el universo... [setfontcol none]¡Ja, ja!
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese: [setfontcol red]<ruby>星<rt>ほし</rt></ruby>ウサギ[setfontcol none]を <ruby>連<rt>つ</rt></ruby>れてきたのかい?
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol black]You brought back a [setfontcol red]Star Bunny[setfontcol black]?!
Heh heh... Know the one thing in the
galaxy cuter than one o' those?[setfontcol none][newpage]
Nothing, that's what! Har har har!
Did I get ya on that one?
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Tu as rapporté un [setfontcol red]Lapin Stellaire[setfontcol none]?!
Har, har... Sais-tu ce qui est plus
mignon que ces boules de poil?[newpage]
Eh ben, rien, évidemment! Har, har,
har... Har... Ahem. T'inquiète pas, j'en
ai des meilleures...
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡¿Has traido un [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]conejo estelar[setfontcol black]?!
¡Je, je!... Solo hay una cosa más linda
que estas criaturas, ¿sabes qué es?[setfontcol none][newpage]
¡Nada! ¡Eso es, nada! ¡Jo, jo, jo! ¡No
existe nada más lindo!

Meister_102EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
Well, it looks to me like that cute
critter wants to tell you something.
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Well, it looks to me like that cute
critter wants to tell you something.
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
Bon, corrige-moi si je me trompe,
mais on dirait qu'il a quelque
chose à te dire, matelot...
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Ich kann mich auch irren, aber es
sieht fast so aus, als hätte dieses
kleine Ding etwas auf dem Herzen...
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Beh, forse mi sbaglierò, ma ho
l'impressione che quella dolce
creatura abbia qualcosa da dire...
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Puede que me equivoque, pero
me parece que quiere decirte algo...
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese: アンタに<ruby>話<rt>はな</rt></ruby>したいことがあるみたいだよ
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Well, it looks to me like that cute
critter wants to tell you something.
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
Mais sans rire, on dirait qu'il a
quelque chose à te dire! Va le voir!
Meister_102EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Me parece que ese conejito 
quiere decirte algo...

Meister_103EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
I see you brought us back a really
[setfontcol red]LOUD[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] bird[setfontcol none] this time. Har har!
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
I see you brought us back a really
[setfontcol red]LOUD[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] bird[setfontcol none] this time. Har har!
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Tu nous as ramené un [setfontcol red]volatile très
criard[setfontcol none] cette fois! Si son bavardage se
rapporte à son plumage, je m'en vais!
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Oha, dieses Mal hast du also einen
[setfontcol red]PLAPPER-Flattermann [setfontcol none]mitgebracht?!?[wait 15]
Gab es nichts Leiseres? Hahaha!
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
Vedo che hai portato un [setfontcol red]uccello
[setfontcol black]veramente [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol red]chiassoso[setfontcol none]! Ahahah!
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Vaya, veo que esta vez has traído un
[setfontcol red]pájaro muy ruidoso[setfontcol none]... Hum...
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese:
アンタ
[setfontcol red]うるさい<ruby>鳥<rt>とり</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]を<ruby>連<rt>つ</rt></ruby>れてきたね
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
I see you brought us back a really
[setfontcol red]LOUD[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] bird[setfontcol none] this time. Har har!
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Bateau de bateau! Tu as rapporté un
[setfontcol red]oiseau [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]criard[setfontcol none], cette fois? Har, har!
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Vaya, veo que esta vez has traído un
[setfontcol red]pájaro RUIDOSO[setfontcol none]... ¿No pudiste hallar
algo más latoso? ¡Jo, jo, jo!

Meister_103EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
Ya hear the tranquil song of the
stars? [wait 15]No? [wait 15]Well, it's tough to hear
over that yappin' [setfontcol red]Jibberjay[setfontcol none]![newpage]
How about going over there and
trying to get it to pipe down for a
bit?
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Ya hear the tranquil song of the
stars? [wait 15]No? [wait 15]Well, it's tough to hear
over that yappin' [setfontcol red]Jibberjay[setfontcol none]![newpage]
How about going over there and
trying to get it to pipe down for a
bit?
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
D'ailleurs, t'entends le chant des
étoiles, petit gars?[wait 15] Non?[newpage]
[setfontsize large]Normal[setfontsize normal], avec ce fichu [setfontcol red]Jacoco[setfontcol none] qui
n'arrête pas de s'égosiller![newpage]
Entre nous, tu pourrais pas aller
lui clouer le bec deux minutes?
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Hörst du das leise Lied der Sterne?[wait 30]
Nicht?[wait 15] Nun, das könnte wohl am
turbulenten [setfontcol red]Tuku-Tukan[setfontcol none] liegen![newpage]
Geh doch mal zu ihm rüber und sorge
dafür, dass er Ruhe gibt! Danke.
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Senti la dolce melodia delle stelle?
No? Beh, è per colpa di tutto
il rumore che fa quel [setfontcol red]Lollorito[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Perché non cerchi di farlo star zitto
un pochino?
Meister_103EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¿No oyes la dulce melodía de las
estrellas? ¡Normal! ¡Qué vas a oír con
el jaleo que mete ese [setfontcol red]Periquín[setfontcol none]![newpage]
¿Por qué no vas a verle para
que se calle un rato?

Meister_200EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
You know that [setfontcol purple]Toad [setfontcol none]you brought

as some kind of cosmic postman now.
Meister_200EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:

back? It looks like he's moonlighting
as some kind of cosmic postman now.

¿Te acuerdas de ese [setfontcol purple]Toad [setfontcol none]que vino

[setfontcol none]さっきから 【[setfontcol red]<ruby>手紙<rt>てがみ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]】【[setfontcol red]<ruby>手紙<rt>てがみ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]】と ウルさいねえ
Meister_200EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:

He sure loves delivering [setfontcol red]mail[setfontcol none]!
Meister_200EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:

Il n'arrête pas de parler de
« [setfontcol red]courrier [setfontcol none]» et de « [setfontcol red]lettres [setfontcol none]».

Ese [setfontcol purple]Toad[setfontcol none] regresó contigo, ¿verdad?
¡No para de hablar sobre las virtudes

Meister_200EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
Go ahead and humour him. Maybe
he's got something for you!
Meister_200EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Go ahead and humour him. Maybe
he's got something for you!
Meister_200EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
Tiens, tu voudrais pas aller lui coller
un timbre sur le clapet de ma part?
Meister_200EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Geh mal rüber und sprich ihn an, dann

Meister_200EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Vai da lui e vedi se riesci a calmarlo!
Forse ha persino qualcosa per te!
Meister_200EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:

Meister_200EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese: <ruby>話<rt>はなし</rt></ruby>を<ruby>聞<rt>き</rt></ruby>いて さっさと<ruby>静<rt>しず</rt></ruby>めておくれよ
Meister_200EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Go ahead and humor him. Maybe
he's got something for you!

Meister_201EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:

Meister_202EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Oh boy - tell me you didn't bring back

Meister_202EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch: Maybe it'll wanna relax for a bit...?
Meister_202EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish: Maybe it'll wanna relax for a bit...?

Well, looks like we got the room for

[setfontcol red][icon CometMedal] [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]Comet Medals[setfontcol black].[setfontcol red][setfontcol none] Go give him a
listen. Shouldn't take long.
Meister_300EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
Je pense qu'il veut te parler des
[setfontcol red]médailles comète [setfontcol none][icon CometMedal]. Va le voir, ça
ne devrait pas être très long.
Meister_300EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Creo que quiere hablar contigo sobre 
las [setfontcol red]medallas de cometa [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon CometMedal][setfontcol none][setfontcol black].[setfontcol none] ¡Adelante,
ve a hablar con él!

Meister_301EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Hey, weren't you just wearing
[setfontcol green]green clothes[setfontcol none] a second ago?
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Hey, weren't you just wearing
[setfontcol green]green clothes[setfontcol none] a second ago?
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Hé, je vois double ou quoi? Je t'ai
vu discuter avec un [setfontcol black]type [setfontcol none]qui te
ressemble... Enfin, [setfontcol green]habillé en vert[setfontcol none]...
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Huch?!? Hattest du bis eben gerade
nicht noch [setfontcol green]grüne Kleidung [setfontcol none]an?
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
Ehi, ma non avevi degli [setfontcol green]abiti verdi[setfontcol none]
fino a pochi secondi fa?!
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Oye, ¿tú no ibas de [setfontcol green]verde[setfontcol none]
hace un segundo?
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese:
アンタ、 さっき[setfontcol green]
<ruby>緑色<rt>みどりいろ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>服<rt>ふく</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]を<ruby>着<rt>き</rt></ruby>てなかったかい?
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Hey, weren't you just wearing
[setfontcol green]green clothes[setfontcol none] a second ago?
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Bâbord de bâbord... Tu ne portais pas
des [setfontcol green]salopettes vertes [setfontcol none]il y a à peine
cinq minutes?!
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Eh! ¿Pero tú no llevabas [setfontcol green]ropa verde[setfontcol none]
hace tan solo un segundo?

Meister_301EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench: Bah! Ça doit être le mal de l'espace...
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Na, vielleicht hab ich
mich auch vertan...
Meister_301EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese: わたしの<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>い<ruby>違<rt>ちが</rt></ruby>いかねえ・・・

Meister_302EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Hrm. A sassy [setfontcol red]penguin [setfontcol black]on board a
spaceship...? That's a new one on me![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Hrm. A sassy [setfontcol red]penguin [setfontcol black]on board a
spaceship...? That's a new one on me![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Que dites-vous de ça? Un [setfontcol red]pingouin
[setfontcol black]à bord du navire. Original...[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Aha. Jetzt haben wir also einen frechen
[setfontcol red]Pinguin [setfontcol black]an Bord. Das ist wirklich neu![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
E così... ora abbiamo anche un
[setfontcol red]pinguino[setfontcol none] insolente a bordo!
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Un [setfontcol red]pingüino [setfontcol none]descarado a bordo de la
astronave... ¡Lo que nos faltaba!
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese: <ruby>生意気<rt>なまいき</rt></ruby>そうな[setfontcol red]ペンギン[setfontcol black]を<ruby>連<rt>つ</rt></ruby>れてきたね[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Hrm. A sassy [setfontcol red]penguin [setfontcol black]on board a
spaceship...? That's a new one on me![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Un [setfontcol red]pingouin [setfontcol none]à bord d'un vaisseau
spatial... Du jamais vu! Et il a l'air
heureux comme un poisson dans l'eau!
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Un [setfontcol red]pingüino [setfontcol none]presumido a bordo de
la astronave... ¡Lo que nos faltaba!

Meister_302EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
Well, he seems to want a word with
you. I wouldn't keep that one waiting.
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Well, he seems to want a word with
you. I wouldn't keep that one waiting.
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
Il a l'air de vouloir jacasser avec toi,
va donc le voir...
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Er scheint etwas loswerden zu wollen!
Also sprich ihn doch mal an...
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Sembra che voglia scambiare qualche
parola con te... Perché non ti avvicini
a sentire?
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Además, parece que quiere que vayas
a hablar con él. ¿A qué esperas?
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese:
アンタと<ruby>話<rt>はなし</rt></ruby>がしたいんだってさ
<ruby>聞<rt>き</rt></ruby>いておやりよ
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Well, he seems to want a word with
you. I wouldn't keep that one waiting.
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
Je crois qu'il a quelque chose à te
dire. Tu sais quoi faire! Har, har!
Meister_302EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Además, parece que quiere que vayas
a hablar con él. ¿Qué esperas?

Meister_303EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
What's that? A striped [setfontcol red]mushroom[setfontcol none]?[wait 15]
I've never seen one of those before!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
What's that? A striped [setfontcol red]mushroom[setfontcol none]?[wait 15]
I've never seen one of those before!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Qu'est-ce que... Un [setfontcol red]champignon
[setfontcol black]à rayures[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]?[wait 15] C'est désespérant...
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Was ist das? Ein [setfontcol red][setfontcol black]gestreifter[setfontcol red] [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]Pilz[setfontcol none]?
So etwas sehe ich zum ersten Mal...
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
Oh! Hai portato un [setfontcol red]fungo
[setfontcol none]a strisce? Oh, poveri noi!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¿Has traído un [setfontcol red]champiñón[setfontcol none] a rayas?[wait 15]
¡Es la primera vez que veo uno!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese:
しま<ruby>模様<rt>もよう</rt></ruby>の[setfontcol red]キノコ[setfontcol black]か[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
うーん・・・
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
What's that? A striped [setfontcol red]mushroom[setfontcol none]?[wait 15]
I've never seen one of those before!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Qu'est-ce c'est? Un [setfontcol red]champignon [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]rayé[setfontcol none]?
C'est la première fois que j'en vois
un comme ça!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¿Y esto? ¿Un [setfontcol red]champiñón [setfontcol none]con rayas?
¡Nunca en mi vida vi algo semejante!

Meister_303EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
You, uhh... Yeah. Have fun with your
[setfontcol red]unusual[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] toy [setfontcol black]there[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]. [wait 15]I ain't judging!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
You, uhh... Yeah. Have fun with your
[setfontcol red]unusual[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] toy [setfontcol black]there[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]. [wait 15]I ain't judging!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
Bon, super... Amuse-toi bien avec ton
nouveau [setfontcol red]joujou bizarroïde[setfontcol none].
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Du hast schon ein sonderbares
Hobby...[wait 15] Viel Spaß dann noch mit
deinem [setfontcol red]neuen[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] Spielzeug[setfontcol none]!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Oh! Ti piace collezionare le [setfontcol red]cose più
strane [setfontcol none]dell'universo!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Bueno, yo no digo nada, ¿eh?
Diviértete con tu nuevo [setfontcol red]juguetito[setfontcol none]...
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese:
アンタ・・・
<ruby>本当<rt>ほんとう</rt></ruby>に[setfontcol red]ヘンなもの[setfontcol none]<ruby>集<rt>あつ</rt></ruby>めてくるねえ・・・
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
You, uhh... Yeah. Have fun with your
[setfontcol red]unusual[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] toy [setfontcol black]there[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]. [wait 15]I ain't judging!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
Bon... Heu... Je ne poserai même pas
de questions.[wait 15] Je ne suis pas ici pour
juger tes goûts en [setfontcol red]décoration[setfontcol none]!
Meister_303EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Bueno, yo no digo nada, ¿eh?
Diviértete con tu nuevo [setfontcol red]juguetito[setfontcol none]...

Meister_400EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Looks like we've got another [setfontcol red]hungry
mouth to feed here[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Looks like we've got another [setfontcol red]hungry
mouth to feed here[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
On dirait qu'une nouvelle [setfontcol red]bouche [setfontcol red]à
nourrir[setfontcol red][setfontcol none] est montée à bord. Et elle a
l'air vorace, avec ça.
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Noch ein [setfontcol red]hungriges Maul
mehr zu stopfen[setfontcol none]!
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
E così arrivano altre [setfontcol red]bocche da
sfamare[setfontcol none]!
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Di que sí, ¡más [setfontcol red]bocas hambrientas
que alimentar[setfontcol none]!
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red]ハラをすかせたヤツ[setfontcol none]が
まよいこんできてね
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Looks like we've got another [setfontcol red]hungry
mouth to feed here[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Une autre [setfontcol red]bouche à nourrir [setfontcol none]s'est
jointe à nous, on dirait.
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
No me digas, ¡trajiste otra [setfontcol red]boca
hambrienta que alimentar[setfontcol none]!

Meister_400EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
You've got a new friend here... A
friend with something special for ya![newpage]
If you want to check it out, just head
down that [setfontcol green]pipe [setfontcol none]over there.
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
You've got a new friend here... A
friend with something special for ya![newpage]
If you want to check it out, just head
down that [setfontcol green]pipe [setfontcol none]over there.
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
J'imagine qu'on peut lui faire une
place dans la cale mais je te laisse
le soin de la nourrir, petit mousse.[newpage]
Si tu veux aller la voir, passe donc
par ce [setfontcol green]tuyau[setfontcol none].
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Du solltest dich darum kümmern,
ihn zu füttern, schließlich bist du
der Boss auf diesem Schiff.[newpage]
Steige dafür einfach
in die [setfontcol green]Röhre[setfontcol black] dort drüben[setfontcol green][setfontcol none].
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Hai un nuovo amico... Un amico
con qualcosa di speciale per te![setfontcol black][newpage]
[setfontcol none]Se vuoi sapere di più, entra nel [setfontcol green]tubo[setfontcol none].
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Anda, tu nuevo amigo tiene
algo para ti.[newpage]
Si quieres hablar con él, solo tienes
que bajar por aquella [setfontcol green]tubería [setfontcol none]de allí.
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese:
とりあえず [setfontcol blue]うち[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][setfontcol blue]で[setfontcol blue]あずかる[setfontcol black]ことにしたんだ
よろしくたのんだよ、 <ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>[newpage]
<ruby>会<rt>あ</rt></ruby>ってみたけりゃ 
あそこの[setfontcol green]<ruby>土管<rt>どかん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol black]に<ruby>入<rt>はい</rt></ruby>っておくれ[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
You've got a new friend here... A
friend with something special for ya![newpage]
If you want to check it out, just head
down that [setfontcol green]pipe [setfontcol none]over there.
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
On peut bien garder ton nouvel ami,
mais c'est toi qui t'occupes de le
nourrir, capitaine![newpage]
Si tu veux aller le voir, descends par
ce [setfontcol green]tuyau[setfontcol none].
Meister_400EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Oye, parece que tu nuevo amigo
tiene algo para ti.[newpage]
Si quieres hablar con él, solo tienes
que bajar por aquella [setfontcol green]tubería [setfontcol none]de allí.

Meister_401EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Well, well... What do we have here?
A [setfontcol red]Spin Drill[setfontcol none], huh? That's for digging?!
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Well, well... What do we have here?
A [setfontcol red]Spin Drill[setfontcol none], huh? That's for digging?!
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Tu nous ramènes quoi de beau cette
fois, moussaillon? C'est un [setfontcol red]foret[setfontcol none],
c'est ça?
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Was haben wir denn da?
Einen [setfontcol red]Bohrer [setfontcol black]zum [setfontcol red]Wirbeln[setfontcol none]?
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
E cos'abbiamo stavolta?
Un [setfontcol red]arnese per scavare[setfontcol none]?
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¿Pero qué tenemos aquí?
¡Un [setfontcol red]trompotaladro[setfontcol black]![setfontcol red][setfontcol none] Eso sirve
para excavar, ¿no?
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese:
また、 お<ruby>持<rt>も</rt></ruby>ち<ruby>帰<rt>かえ</rt></ruby>りかい
[setfontcol red]<ruby>穴掘<rt>あなほ</rt></ruby>りの<ruby>道具<rt>どうぐ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]だね?
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Well, well... What do we have here?
A [setfontcol red]Spin Drill[setfontcol none], huh? That's for digging?!
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Par la voile des étoiles! Qu'est-ce que
tu as trouvé là? Une [setfontcol red]vrille[setfontcol none], tu dis? Ça
sert à percer le sol?
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¿Qué me traes? ¡Un[setfontcol red] trompotaladro[setfontcol none]! 
¿Y dices que sirve para excavar?

Meister_401EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
Just don't go digging through the
centre of your faceship! Might get a
headache! Har har!
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Just don't go digging through the
centre of your faceship! Might get a
headache! Har har!
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
Hé! Tu vas pas nous faire des trous
dans la coque, quand même?!
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Wie [setfontcol red]s[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]onderbar[setfontcol none]...
Aber er könnte sich vielleicht
als nützlich erweisen...
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Un'altra delle tue [setfontcol red]stranezze[setfontcol none]...
Basta che non ti metti a scavare
in giro per l'astronave!
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
No excaves en la astronave...
¡o acabarás con dolor de cabeza!
¡Ja, ja! ¿Lo pillas?
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese: アンタ、 [setfontcol red]ヘンなもの[setfontcol none]<ruby>集<rt>あつ</rt></ruby>めてくるねえ・・・
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Just don't go digging through the
center of your faceship! Might get a
headache! Har har!
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
Ne va surtout pas creuser dans le
vaisseau facial! Ça pourrait te donner
mal à la tête! Har, har, har!
Meister_401EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡No vayas a excavar en la astronave!
¡O acabarás con dolor de cabeza!
¡Ja, ja, ja![wait 15] ¿Lo captaste?

Meister_402EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Looks like we have a [setfontcol red]bee [setfontcol none]on board.
Keep it away from me! I'm allergic!
If I get stung, I'll swell right up.
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Looks like we have a [setfontcol red]bee [setfontcol none]on board.
Keep it away from me! I'm allergic!
If I get stung, I'll swell right up.
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Oh oh, ta ménagerie galactique vient
d'accueillir un nouveau phénomène...
Une [setfontcol red]abeille [setfontcol none]à bord... On aura tout vu!
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Sieht fast so aus, als hätten wir
jetzt eine [setfontcol red]Biene [setfontcol none]an Bord!
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian: Ora abbiamo anche un'[setfontcol red]ape[setfontcol none] a bordo!
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Aaah! ¡Una [setfontcol red]abeja [setfontcol none]a bordo! ¡Que no se
me acerque, que les tengo alergia! Me
hincharía como un globo si me picara.
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese: この<ruby>船<rt>ふね</rt></ruby>に[setfontcol red]ハチ[setfontcol none]がやってきたみたいだね
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Looks like we have a [setfontcol red]bee [setfontcol none]on board.
Keep it away from me! I'm allergic!
If I get stung, I'll swell right up.
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Une [setfontcol red]abeille [setfontcol none]t'a suivi jusqu'ici. Tiens-la
loin de moi, je suis allergique! Je vais
gonfler si elle me pique!
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Aah! ¡Una [setfontcol red]abeja [setfontcol none]a bordo! ¡Qué no se
me acerque! ¡Tengo alergia a su
picadura! Me hincharía como un globo.

Meister_402EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
I do like watching him, though. Think
he knows any good bee tricks?
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
I do like watching him, though. Think
he knows any good bee tricks?
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
Tu crois qu'elle pourrait m'apprendre
à voler "dard-dard"? Ouarf arf!
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Ob sie mir wohl ein paar coole
Bienentricks beibringen kann?
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Chissà se potrà insegnarmi qualche
trucchetto per volare... Eheheh!
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Aun así, me gusta mirarlas revolotear.
¿Sabrá hacer alguna pirueta?
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese: <ruby>飛<rt>と</rt></ruby>び<ruby>方<rt>かた</rt></ruby>のコツでも<ruby>教<rt>おし</rt></ruby>えてもらおうかね?
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
I do like watching him, though. Think
he knows any good bee tricks?
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
J'aime bien les regarder butiner, par
contre. Peut-être qu'elle va
t'enseigner des trucs d'abeille?
Meister_402EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Aun así, me gusta mirarlas revolotear.
¿Sabrá hacer algún truco?

Meister_403EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Wait, wait, wait. This is a...uhh...[wait 15]
A [setfontcol red]spring[setfontcol black], huh[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]? So you wear that?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Wait, wait, wait. This is a...uhh...[wait 15]
A [setfontcol red]spring[setfontcol black], huh[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]? So you wear that?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Holà, une minute, petit mousse. C'est
quoi ça maintenant?... Un [setfontcol red]ressort[setfontcol none]?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Nun mal ganz langsam. Das ist eine...[wait 30]
Na, was schon?[wait 15] Eine [setfontcol red]Sprungfeder[setfontcol none]?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
Aspetta un attimino... E questa cosa
sarebbe?! Una [setfontcol red]molla[setfontcol none]? E come si usa?!
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Déjame que lo adivine... ¡Un [setfontcol red]muelle[setfontcol none]!
¡No me digas que te metes ahí!
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese:
なんなんだい
こりゃあ・・・ [setfontcol red]バネ[setfontcol none]?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Wait, wait, wait. This is a...uhh...[wait 15]
A [setfontcol red]spring[setfontcol black], huh[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]? So you wear that?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Attends, laisse-moi deviner. C'est...
hmm... un [setfontcol red]ressort[setfontcol none]?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Déjame que adivine...[wait 15] ¡un [setfontcol red]resorte[setfontcol none]!
¿Y eso cómo se usa? ¡No me digas
que te metes ahí dentro!

Meister_403EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
Does it make a big BOING sound
when you poke it? Har har!
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Does it make a big BOING sound
when you poke it? Har har!
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
Tu entends ça? Il fait "boïng" comme
un Lapin stellaire!
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Wie dieses Ding, das „Boijoijoijoing“
macht, wenn du draufschlägst?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Se la tocchi fa BOING-BOING?
Ahahah!
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Entonces, ¿todo ese "boing, boing" de
antes lo producía ese chisme?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese: さわったら ボヨヨーンってするのかい?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Does it make a big BOING sound
when you poke it? Har har!
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
C'est cette chose-là qui fait
BOÏ-YONG quand tu la touches?
Meister_403EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Entonces, ¿todo ese "boing, boing" de
antes lo producía esa cosa? ¡Y yo
pensaba que era un conejo estelar!...

Meister_404EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Got yourself a pretty cool[setfontcol red] cloud
thingie [setfontcol black]there! Looks like some fun![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Got yourself a pretty cool[setfontcol red] cloud
thingie [setfontcol black]there! Looks like some fun![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Alors, qu'avons-nous là? Tu veux
faire joujou avec ton [setfontcol red][setfontcol black]petit [setfontcol red]nuage[setfontcol none]?
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Was hast du denn da sonderbares
mitgebracht? Eine [setfontcol red]wolkige Blume[setfontcol none]?!?
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
Hai trovato anche una [setfontcol red]bella nuvoletta[setfontcol black]!
Sembra divertente![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Vaya [setfontcol red]nube [setfontcol none]más mona que tienes ahí!
¡Qué chula[setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese:
なんだい <ruby>結局<rt>けっきょく</rt></ruby>
[setfontcol red]あのヘンな<ruby>雲<rt>くも</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]で <ruby>遊<rt>あそ</rt></ruby>びたくなっちまったのかい?
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Got yourself a pretty cool[setfontcol red] cloud
thingie [setfontcol black]there! Looks like some fun![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Je vois que tu as rapporté un [setfontcol red]nuage
bizarre[setfontcol none]! Hmmm... Il a l'air amusant!
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Vaya, has encontrado una[setfontcol red] nube [setfontcol black]muy
esponjosa! ¡Y hasta parece divertida![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Meister_404EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch: Try to stay grounded! Har har!
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish: Try to stay grounded! Har har!
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
D'accord, amuse-toi bien! Tâche juste
de garder les pieds sur terre! Arf!
Arf!
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Aber naja...[wait 15] Jetzt, wo sie schon
einmal hier ist, sollten wir sie wohl
auch Wurzeln schlagen lassen...
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Beh, buon divertimento! Cerca solo
di tenere i piedi per terra! Eheheh!
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Diviértete con ella si quieres.
¡Aunque yo procuraría tener
los pies en la tierra! ¡Ja, ja!
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese: <ruby>気<rt>き</rt></ruby>がすむまで <ruby>飛<rt>と</rt></ruby>び<ruby>回<rt>まわ</rt></ruby>るといいさ
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish: Try to stay grounded! Har har!
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
Allez, va jouer avec! Mais garde les
pieds sur terre, matelot! Har, har!
Meister_404EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Diviértete con ella en la astronave
si quieres. ¡Pero yo procuraría tener
los pies en tierra! ¡Ja, ja, ja!

Meister_501EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
Is that a [setfontcol red]Gearmo[setfontcol black]?! [wait 15]Well, I hope it
doesn't try to put everyone to work![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Is that a [setfontcol red]Gearmo[setfontcol black]?! [wait 15]Well, I hope it
doesn't try to put everyone to work![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Par la barbe de ma grand-mère, t'as
ramené une de ces vieilles [setfontcol red]Robby
[setfontcol black]rouillées[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]!
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Sag bloß, du hast dieses Mal einen
schrottigen [setfontcol red]Hausmeister [setfontcol none]mitgebracht...
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
Non posso crederci! Hai portato un
[setfontcol red]Tuttofare[setfontcol none]! Mi auguro che non
voglia dare qualcosa da fare a tutti!
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡¿Pero adónde vas con esa
[setfontcol red]Mecachacha[setfontcol none]?! Espero que
no se ponga en plan mandón...
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese: まさか [setfontcol red]パマタリアン[setfontcol none]を<ruby>連<rt>つ</rt></ruby>れてきたのかい?!
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Is that a [setfontcol red]Gearmo[setfontcol black]?! [wait 15]Well, I hope it
doesn't try to put everyone to work![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Par les profondeurs de l'hyperespace!
Dis-moi que tu n'as pas ramené une
[setfontcol red]Roberta[setfontcol none] sur le vaisseau!
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Oh no! ¡No me digas que has traído
una [setfontcol red]Cybernana[setfontcol none]! Bueno, espero que no
trate de ponernos a hacer la limpieza.

Meister_501EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
Maybe it will finally want to relax
for a change...?
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Maybe it will finally want to relax
for a change...?
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Hoffentlich entspannt er sich, anstatt
hier alle herumzukommandieren...
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Forse finalmente avrà la possibilità
di riposarsi un pochino?
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish: Bueno, quizá en esta nave se relaje...
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese: こりゃまた、 <ruby>騒<rt>さわ</rt></ruby>がしくなるねえ・・・
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Maybe it will finally want to relax
for a change...?
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
J'espère qu'elle ne se mettra pas à
donner des ordres à tout le monde...
Meister_501EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish: Quizás en esta nave se relaje...

Meister_502EventNotice_Flow000.EuDutch:
What do we have here...? [wait 15]Looks like a
soft, white [setfontcol red]mushroom[setfontcol none], eh?
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow000.EuEnglish:
What do we have here...? [wait 15]Looks like a
soft, white [setfontcol red]mushroom[setfontcol none], eh?
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow000.EuFrench:
Bon, là, si tu veux mon avis, c'est
juste un [setfontcol red]champignon [setfontcol none]blanc...
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow000.EuGerman:
Nun gut, was haben wir denn da?
Sieht mir fast aus wie ein
[setfontcol red]geistweißer Pilz mit Eckzähnen[setfontcol none]...
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow000.EuItalian:
Oh, ma cos'abbiamo qui? Sembra un
[setfontcol red]fungo [setfontcol none]bianco...
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¿Pero qué tenemos aquí?... 
¡Ese [setfontcol red]champiñón [setfontcol none]da miedo verlo!
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow000.JpJapanese:
ありゃ なんだい?
<ruby>真<rt>ま</rt></ruby>っ<ruby>白<rt>しろ</rt></ruby>い[setfontcol red]キノコ[setfontcol none]だけど…
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow000.UsEnglish:
What do we have here...? [wait 15]Looks like a
soft, white [setfontcol red]mushroom[setfontcol none], eh?
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow000.UsFrench:
Qu'est-ce que c'est? Un [setfontcol red]champignon[setfontcol none]
blanc? Il fait vraiment peur...
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¿Pero qué tenemos aquí?...[wait 15]
¿Un [setfontcol red]champiñón [setfontcol none]blando y blanco?

Meister_502EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
You know, the stuff you're finding
is pretty [setfontcol red]weird[setfontcol none]... [wait 15]But I guess that's
just the universe we live in, right?
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow001.EuEnglish:
You know, the stuff you're finding
is pretty [setfontcol red]weird[setfontcol none]... [wait 15]But I guess that's
just the universe we live in, right?
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow001.EuFrench:
Maintenant, si tu trouves un intérêt
quelconque à ce [setfontcol red]truc bizarroïde[setfontcol none]...
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow001.EuGerman:
Wenn ich bloß wüsste, aus welchem
Grund wir diesen ganzen [setfontcol red]sonderbaren
Krempel [setfontcol black]unter Deck aufbewahren[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]...
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow001.EuItalian:
Chissà perché hai la mania di
collezionare [setfontcol red]cose tanto strane[setfontcol none]...
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Me parece que los chismes esos que
encuentras por ahí son un poco [setfontcol red]raros[setfontcol none].[wait 15]
¡Qué cosas se ven por el universo!
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow001.JpJapanese: アンタ、 [setfontcol red]ヘンなもの[setfontcol none]<ruby>集<rt>あつ</rt></ruby>めてくるねえ・・・
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow001.UsEnglish:
You know, the stuff you're finding
is pretty [setfontcol red]weird[setfontcol none]... [wait 15]But I guess that's
just the universe we live in, right?
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow001.UsFrench:
Mouette de mouette, pourquoi
ramasses-tu toutes ces [setfontcol red]bizarreries[setfontcol none]? [wait 15]
Bah, tant que tu es heureux...
Meister_502EventNotice_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Creo que todas esas cosas que
encuentras por ahí son un [setfontcol red]poco raras[setfontcol none].
¡Qué cosas se ven por el universo!

Medals [setfontcol black]makes more [setfontcol red]comets [setfontcol black]appear![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black][newpage]

from every [setfontcol red]comet[setfontcol black]! [wait 15]Go for it, Captain![setfontcol none]

au tout![newpage]

[setfontcol blue]médailles comète [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][icon CometMedal][setfontcol none]...[setfontcol black][newpage]

[setfontcol black][icon Comet]! [setfontcol black][setfontcol none][setfontcol black][wait 15]On compte sur toi, petit mousse![setfontcol none]

Ein [setfontcol red]Schabernack-[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]Komet
[setfontcol none]ist aufgetaucht![newpage]

[setfontcol blue]Galaxien[setfontcol none], so dass du sie teilweise
gar nicht wiedererkennst...[newpage]
Aber klar doch! Du hast ja auch
schon fleißig [setfontcol blue][icon CometMedal] Kometenmünzen
gesammelt[setfontcol black], nicht wahr?[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black][newpage]
[setfontcol none]Je mehr dieser [setfontcol blue][icon CometMedal] Kometenmünzen
[setfontcol black]du findest, desto mehr der ominösen
[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black][setfontcol red]Schabernack-Kometen [setfontcol black]tauchen auf...[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black][newpage]

Meister_51EventTalk_Flow000.EuItalian:
È stata individuata una [setfontcol red]Cometa
Burlona[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Il potere di una [setfontcol red]Co[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]meta[setfontcol none] è quello di
poter mutare completamente
l'atmosfera di una Galassia...[newpage]
Hai già [setfontcol blue]raccolto[setfontcol none] delle [setfontcol blue]Medaglie
Cometa [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][icon CometMedal][setfontcol none], vero?[setfontcol black][newpage]
Raccogliendo [setfontcol blue]Medaglie Cometa [setfontcol black][setfontcol black][icon CometMedal]
[setfontcol black]appariranno le [setfontcol red]Comete Burlone[setfontcol black].[newpage]
Ora, [setfontcol black]grazie alle [setfontcol red]C[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]omete[setfontcol black], [setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]puoi cercare
di ottenere altre [setfontcol yellow]Superstelle[setfontcol black] [setfontcol none][setfontcol black][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]![setfontcol black][setfontcol black][newpage]
[setfontcol black][setfontcol black][wait 15][setfontcol black]Contiamo su di te, Comandante![setfontcol none]

una[setfontcol none][setfontcol black][setfontcol black][setfontcol black] [setfontcol black][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]. [setfontcol none][setfontcol black][wait 15]¡Contamos contigo![setfontcol none]

Another [setfontcol red]hungry mouth to feed[setfontcol black]?

I bet he's got some interesting tales

I bet he's got some interesting tales

Meister_800EventNotice_Flow001.EuDutch:
Feels like forever since we've seen

Feels like forever since we've seen
