mettons les voiles, capitaine!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn4_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡Bien! ¡Lo que nos falte de energía
lo compensaremos con ganas!
¡Pongámonos en marcha, capitán!

Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow000.EuDutch:
That's the [setfontcol red]fifth [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] [setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow]Grand Star[setfontcol black]! I had
a feeling you could do it! [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]Next up is
the [setfontcol blue]sixth [setfontcol none]world.[newpage]
And you know that [setfontcol red][icon Bowser] monster[setfontcol black]'s going
to put up an even stronger fight now.[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_D_MEISTER_WE_HAVE_TO_GO]So let's get those [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars
[setfontcol none]and save [setfontcol blue]your special one[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow000.EuEnglish:
That's the [setfontcol red]fifth [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] [setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow]Grand Star[setfontcol black]! I had
a feeling you could do it! [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]Next up is
the [setfontcol blue]sixth [setfontcol none]world.[newpage]
And you know that [setfontcol red][icon Bowser] monster[setfontcol black]'s going
to put up an even stronger fight now.[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_D_MEISTER_WE_HAVE_TO_GO]So let's get those [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars
[setfontcol none]and save [setfontcol blue]your special one[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow000.EuFrench:
Tiens, c'est la [setfontcol red]cinquième[setfontcol none] [setfontcol red][icon GrandStar][setfontcol black]! Je savais
que t'en étais capable! Le [setfontcol blue]sixième
[setfontcol black]monde se dresse à l'horizon.[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
Bon, tu te doutes bien que ce [setfontcol red]pirate
de [setfontcol none][icon Bowser] voudra t'en mettre plein la
figure![newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_D_MEISTER_WE_HAVE_TO_GO]Allons donc chercher les [icon PowerStar] et sauver
[setfontcol blue]ta [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]princesse[setfontcol none]! En avant toute!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow000.EuGerman:
Das war der [setfontcol red]fünfte [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] [setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow]Große Stern[setfontcol black]!
Ich habe mir schon gedacht,
dass du es schaffen wirst![setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
Vor dir liegt die [setfontcol blue]sechste Welt[setfontcol none].
Wir können mit noch mehr Widerstand
vom riesigen [setfontcol red][icon Bowser] Unhold[setfontcol black] rechnen...[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_D_MEISTER_WE_HAVE_TO_GO]Holen wir doch einfach die übrigen
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Sterne [setfontcol none]und [setfontcol blue]retten die dir
kostbare Person[setfontcol none]! Volldampf voraus!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow000.EuItalian:
Hai trovato la [setfontcol red]quinta[setfontcol none] [setfontcol yellow]Megastella[setfontcol none] [setfontcol black][icon GrandStar]!
Sapevo che ce l'avresti fatta! Ora ti
aspetta il [setfontcol blue]sesto[setfontcol black] Mondo.[setfontcol black].[setfontcol black][setfontcol black].[setfontcol black][newpage]
E sai già che [setfontcol red]quel tipo[setfontcol black] [setfontcol black][icon Bowser] cercherà
[setfontcol black]di metter su un bel combattimento![setfontcol none][newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_D_MEISTER_WE_HAVE_TO_GO]Perciò ora cerchiamo di prendere
quelle [setfontcol yellow]Superstelle[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar] e salvare la
[setfontcol blue]persona che ti sta a cuore[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Esa es la [setfontcol red]quinta [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon GrandStar][setfontcol black]! ¡Sabía que la
conseguirías! El [setfontcol blue]mundo 6 [setfontcol black]nos aguarda[setfontcol red][setfontcol none].[newpage]
Y sabes que [setfontcol red][icon Bowser] [setfontcol black]va a ser muy
duro de pelar, ¿verdad?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_D_MEISTER_WE_HAVE_TO_GO]Venga, ¡consigamos todas las [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]
[setfontcol black]y salvemos a [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]tu princesa[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow000.JpJapanese:
これで[setfontcol red]5つ<ruby>目<rt>め</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]の[setfontcol red][icon GrandStar][setfontcol yellow]グランドスター[setfontcol black]だね[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
アンタなら やってくれると<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>ってたよ[newpage]
さあ、 <ruby>次<rt>つぎ</rt></ruby>は[setfontcol blue]6つ<ruby>目<rt>め</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]の<ruby>大銀河<rt>ワールド</rt></ruby>だ
[setfontcol red][icon Bowser]アイツ[setfontcol black]の[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]<ruby>抵抗<rt>ていこう</rt></ruby>もますます<ruby>激<rt>はげ</rt></ruby>しくなるだろうね[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_D_MEISTER_WE_HAVE_TO_GO]でも、 わたしらは <ruby>行<rt>い</rt></ruby>かなくちゃならないんだ
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol none]と[setfontcol blue]アンタの<ruby>大切<rt>たいせつ</rt></ruby>なヒト[setfontcol none]のために!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow000.UsEnglish:
That's the [setfontcol red]fifth [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon GrandStar] [setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow]Grand Star[setfontcol black]! I had
a feeling you could do it! [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]Next up is
the [setfontcol blue]sixth [setfontcol none]world.[newpage]
And you know that [setfontcol red][icon Bowser] monster[setfontcol black]'s going
to put up an even stronger fight now.[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_D_MEISTER_LETS_GO_DIALOG]So let's get those [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars
[setfontcol none]and save [setfontcol blue]your special one[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow000.UsFrench:
Par l'albatros du cosmos! C'est la
[setfontcol red]cinquième [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow]grande étoile [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon GrandStar][setfontcol none] que tu
trouves, matelot![newpage]
Le prochain monde est le [setfontcol blue]sixième[setfontcol none]. Le
[setfontcol red]monstre [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Bowser] [setfontcol none]doit s'y trouver, et il doit
être encore plus puissant qu'avant...[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_D_MEISTER_LETS_GO_DIALOG]Allez, partons à la recherche des
[setfontcol yellow]super étoiles [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar] et sauvons ta
[setfontcol blue]bien-aimée[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Cuásares cósmicos! ¡Es la [setfontcol red]quinta
[setfontcol yellow]Maxiestrella[setfontcol red] [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon GrandStar][setfontcol black]! ¡Sabía que lo
lograrías! Nos espera el [setfontcol blue]Mundo 6[setfontcol black][setfontcol red][setfontcol none].[newpage]
Y sabes que [setfontcol red]Bowser[setfontcol none] [setfontcol red][icon Bowser] [setfontcol black]va a ser un
rival muy difícil, ¿verdad?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
[playsfx SE_SV_D_MEISTER_WE_HAVE_TO_GO]¡Así que será mejor que consigamos
más [setfontcol yellow]Superestrellas[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol black]para salvar a
[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]tu ser querido[setfontcol none]!

Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow001.EuDutch:
The big fight awaits... The helm is
yours, Captain!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow001.EuEnglish:
The big fight awaits... The helm is
yours, Captain!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow001.EuFrench:
Alors, petit mousse, t'es fin prêt
pour l'ultime bagarre?
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow001.EuGerman:
Nun denn, Steuermann! Bist du
bereit für den großen Kampf?
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow001.EuItalian:
E va bene! Sei pronto per il grande
combattimento, Comandante?
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Estupendo! ¿Estás listo para
el gran combate, capitán?
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow001.JpJapanese:
さあ!
<ruby>気持<rt>きも</rt></ruby>ちの<ruby>準備<rt>じゅんび</rt></ruby>はできたかい? <ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow001.UsEnglish:
The big fight awaits... The helm is
yours, Captain!
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow001.UsFrench:
Alors, capitaine? Prêt pour le combat
du siècle?
Meister_AfterGrandStarReturn5_Flow001.UsSpanish:
El gran combate te espera...
¿Estás listo, capitán?

Meister_AfterIslandFleetGalaxy_Flow000.EuDutch:
All right then! Grab that wheel, and
let's head out, Captain!
Meister_AfterIslandFleetGalaxy_Flow000.EuEnglish:
All right then! Grab that wheel, and
let's head out, Captain!
Meister_AfterIslandFleetGalaxy_Flow000.EuFrench:
Allez, petit gars, prends donc la roue
du gouvernail, il est temps de mettre
les voiles!
Meister_AfterIslandFleetGalaxy_Flow000.EuGerman:
Nun denn! Ich sag dann mal:
Ran ans Steuerrad und Volldampf voraus!
Meister_AfterIslandFleetGalaxy_Flow000.EuItalian:
Dai! Afferra il timone e partiamo,
Comandante!
Meister_AfterIslandFleetGalaxy_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Estupendo! ¡Agarra el timón y
pongámonos en marcha, capitán!
Meister_AfterIslandFleetGalaxy_Flow000.JpJapanese: さ! <ruby>舵<rt>かじ</rt></ruby>をにぎって<ruby>出航<rt>しゅっこう</rt></ruby>だ!
Meister_AfterIslandFleetGalaxy_Flow000.UsEnglish:
All right then! Grab that wheel, and
let's head out, Captain!
Meister_AfterIslandFleetGalaxy_Flow000.UsFrench:
Allez, installe-toi devant la barre et
levons l'ancre, capitaine!

Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow000.EuDutch:
What-- You're back! I mean...[wait 15]
HEY! YOU'RE BACK![newpage]
I see you're [setfontcol blue]ready for[setfontcol none] [setfontcol blue]more[setfontcol black]. It's
[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]written all over your face![newpage]
Onwards, then! There are still more
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars [setfontcol none]out there, [setfontcol red]Captain[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow000.EuEnglish:
What-- You're back! I mean...[wait 15]
HEY! YOU'RE BACK![newpage]
I see you're [setfontcol blue]ready for[setfontcol none] [setfontcol blue]more[setfontcol black]. It's
[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]written all over your face![newpage]
Onwards, then! There are still more
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars [setfontcol none]out there, [setfontcol red]Captain[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow000.EuFrench:
Hein?... Tu es revenu?! Heu... enfin,
je savais bien que tu reviendrais,
petit mousse![newpage]
Je vois bien à ta trogne que [setfontcol blue]tu
en veux encore[setfontcol none]! On a des [icon PowerStar]
sur la planche, [setfontcol red]capitaine[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow000.EuGerman:
Du bist zurück?!?[wait 30] Ich meine natürlich...
HEY! Ich wusste doch, dass du das
schaffst![setfontsize small] Hab ich doch immer gesagt...[newpage]
[setfontsize normal]Ich sehe schon, dass du [setfontcol blue]noch nicht
genug hast[setfontcol none][setfontcol black], sonst hättest du nicht
diesen Schimmer in deinen Augen.[setfontcol none][newpage]
Ziehen wir also weiter! Dort draußen
sind noch einige [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Sterne
[setfontcol black]verborgen[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none], [setfontcol black]Steuermann[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow000.EuItalian:
Sei tornato! [wait 15]Voglio dire... Ero certo...
che saresti tornato...[wait 15] prima o poi...[newpage]
Vedo che sei [setfontcol blue]in cerca di altre
avventure[setfontcol none]! Ce l'hai scritto in faccia![newpage]
[setfontcol black]Avanti, allora! E guarda che ci sono
altre [setfontcol yellow]Superstelle[setfontcol black] [icon PowerStar] là fuori,
[setfontcol red]Comandante[setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Pero si has vuelto de una pieza!...
Esto... ¡Sabía que lo conseguirías![newpage]
¡Veo en tus ojos que te has quedado
[setfontcol blue]con ganas de más[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Entonces, ¡sigamos adelante! ¡Todavía
quedan [icon PowerStar] por descubrir, [setfontcol red]capitán[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow000.JpJapanese:
やっぱり<ruby>帰<rt>かえ</rt></ruby>ってきたね
どうせ<ruby>戻<rt>もど</rt></ruby>ってくると<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>ってたんだ[newpage]
[setfontcol blue]もっと<ruby>冒険<rt>ぼうけん</rt></ruby>したい[setfontcol black]んだろ?
アンタの<ruby>顔<rt>かお</rt></ruby>にそう<ruby>書<rt>か</rt></ruby>いてあるよ[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][newpage]
まだまだ<ruby>集<rt>あつ</rt></ruby>めきれていない
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol none]もあるんだ[newpage]
もうちょっとアンタには
がんばってもらわないとね[newpage]
[setfontcol red]この<ruby>星船<rt>ほしぶね</rt></ruby>の<ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]は[setfontcol black]アンタ[setfontcol none]なんだから!
よろしくたのんだよ! <ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow000.UsEnglish:
What-- You're back! I mean...[wait 15]
HEY! YOU'RE BACK![newpage]
I see you're [setfontcol blue]ready for[setfontcol none] [setfontcol blue]more[setfontcol black]. It's
[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]written all over your face![newpage]
Onward, then! There are still more
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars [setfontcol none]out there, [setfontcol red]Captain[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow000.UsFrench:
Par les mers scintillantes de l'univers,
tu es de retour![wait 15] Heu... Je veux dire...
Je savais que tu reviendrais![newpage]
Je vois que tu [setfontcol blue]cherches d'autres
aventures[setfontcol none], matelot! Un vrai vieux
loup de mer, comme moi![newpage]
Mettons les voiles, alors! D'autres
[setfontcol yellow]super étoiles[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar] nous attendent,
[setfontcol red]capitaine[setfontcol none]!
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Pulsar sideral! ¡Has regresado! ¡Eh!...[wait 15]
¡Sabía que lo conseguirías![newpage]
¡Veo por tu expresión que te has
quedado [setfontcol blue]con ganas de más[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Entonces, ¡sigamos adelante!
¡Todavía quedan [setfontcol yellow]Superestrellas[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar]
en el universo por descubrir, [setfontcol red]capitán[setfontcol none]!

Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow001.EuDutch:
You made it back![wait 15] I mean, uh, I knew
all along you would come back...[wait 15]
eventually. [setfontsize small]Heh heh...[newpage]
[setfontcol red][setfontsize normal][setfontcol black]Welcome back, Captain! It's a pleasure
to see you, and congratulations![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow001.EuEnglish:
You made it back![wait 15] I mean, uh, I knew
all along you would come back...[wait 15]
eventually. [setfontsize small]Heh heh...[newpage]
[setfontcol red][setfontsize normal][setfontcol black]Welcome back, Captain! It's a pleasure
to see you, and congratulations![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow001.EuFrench:
Incroyable, t'es revenu![wait 15] Enfin...
Je savais bien que tu reviendrais...[wait 15]
un jour... peut-être... [setfontsize small]Hé hé hé...[newpage]
[setfontcol red][setfontsize normal][setfontcol black]Enfin, félicitations pour tes exploits,
mon gars! C'est un plaisir de te
revoir à bord![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow001.EuGerman:
Du hast es echt geschafft?!?[wait 15] Ähm...
Ich meine natürlich: Wusste ich's doch,
[wait 15]bei deiner Verfassung... [setfontsize small]Ähem...[newpage]
[setfontcol red][setfontsize normal][setfontcol black]Willkommen zurück, Steuermann!
Wir freuen uns alle sehr, dass dir
nichts zugestoßen ist![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow001.EuItalian:
Sei tornato! [wait 15]Voglio dire... Ero certo...
che saresti tornato...[wait 15] prima o poi...
[setfontsize small]Eheh...[newpage]
[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontsize normal][setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]Bentornato[setfontcol black], Comandante! Che piacere
rivederti! E congratulazioni![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Pero si has vuelto de una pieza![wait 15]
Esto... Por supuesto que sabía que
volverías...[wait 15] algún día. [setfontsize small]¡Ji, ji![newpage]
[setfontcol red][setfontsize normal][setfontcol black]¡[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]Bienvenido, capitán! ¡Es un
honor volver a tenerte a bordo!
¡Enhorabuena, por cierto![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow001.JpJapanese:
やっぱり<ruby>帰<rt>かえ</rt></ruby>ってきたね
どうせ<ruby>戻<rt>もど</rt></ruby>ってくると<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>ってたんだ[newpage]
この<ruby>星船<rt>ほしぶね</rt></ruby>の<ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>は[setfontcol red]アンタ[setfontcol none]なんだから!
よろしくたのんだよ! <ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow001.UsEnglish:
You made it back![wait 15] I mean, uh, I knew
all along you would come back...[wait 15]
eventually. [setfontsize small]Heh heh...[newpage]
[setfontcol red][setfontsize normal][setfontcol black]Welcome back, Captain! It's a pleasure
to see you, and congratulations![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow001.UsFrench:
Incroyable! Tu es revenu![wait 15] Heu...
Je veux dire... Je savais que tu
reviendrais! [setfontsize small]Éventuellement...[newpage]
[setfontsize normal]Tout ton équipage est heureux de
te revoir, capitaine! Et toutes nos
félicitations!
Meister_AfterNormalEnding_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡Nébulas cósmicas! ¡Regresaste![wait 15]
Este... Por supuesto que sabía que
volverías...[wait 15] algún día. [setfontsize small]¡Ji, ji![newpage]
[setfontcol black][setfontsize normal]¡[setfontcol black]Bienvenido! ¡Es un verdadero honor
servir a un capitán [setfontcol red]como tú[setfontcol black]!
¡Muchas felicidades![setfontcol black][setfontcol none]

Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow000.EuDutch:
You've really done it now!
[setfontcol red]Prankster Comets[setfontcol none] are swarming all
over the universe! See for yourself!
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow000.EuEnglish:
You've really done it now!
[setfontcol red]Prankster Comets[setfontcol none] are swarming all
over the universe! See for yourself!
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow000.EuFrench:
Beau boulot, matelot! Les [setfontcol black][icon Comet]
[setfontcol none]commencent à pleuvoir un peu
partout! Jette donc un œil!
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow000.EuGerman:
Wie weit du gekommen bist![newpage]
Ich habe Neuigkeiten: Im ganzen
Universum wurden sonderbare
[setfontcol green][setfontcol red]Schabernack-Kometen[setfontcol green] [setfontcol none]gesichtet![newpage]
Das solltest du dir mal ansehen!
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow000.EuItalian:
Ora ce l'hai proprio fatta!
Sono apparse [setfontcol red]Comete Burlone [setfontcol none][setfontcol green][setfontcol black][icon GreenComet][setfontcol green] [setfontcol none]in
giro per l'universo! Dai un'occhiata!
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Mira la que has armado![newpage]
¡Hay [setfontcol red]Cometas Pícaros[setfontcol none] surcando
todo el universo! ¡Lo puedes ver
con tus propios ojos!
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow000.JpJapanese:
アンタ、 とんでもないことをしでかしたね[newpage]
<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>のあちこちに、
[setfontcol red]いたずら<ruby>彗星<rt>すいせい</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]が<ruby>現<rt>あらわ</rt></ruby>れたって<ruby>話<rt>はなし</rt></ruby>だよ![newpage]
アンタの<ruby>目<rt>め</rt></ruby>で<ruby>確<rt>たし</rt></ruby>かめてごらん
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow000.UsEnglish:
You've really done it now!
[setfontcol red]Prankster Comets[setfontcol none] are swarming all
over the universe! See for yourself!
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow000.UsFrench:
Par les profondeurs du cosmos!
Tu as réussi, capitaine![newpage]
Regarde! Des[setfontcol red] comètes blagueuses [setfontcol none]ont
pris d'assaut toutes les galaxies!
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Mira lo que has causado![newpage]
¡Hay [setfontcol red]Cometas Pícaros[setfontcol none] surcando
todo el universo! ¡Lo puedes ver
con tus propios ojos!

Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow001.EuDutch:
[setfontcol black]Hungry for [setfontcol blue]more adventure[setfontcol black], eh?
The helm is yours, Captain![setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow001.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol black]Hungry for [setfontcol blue]more adventure[setfontcol black], eh?
The helm is yours, Captain![setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow001.EuFrench:
[setfontcol black]On a [setfontcol blue]faim [setfontcol black][setfontcol blue]d'aventure[setfontcol black], hein, mon gars?
Ah, l'air du grand large nous appelle!
Largue les amarres, matelot![setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow001.EuGerman:
[setfontcol black]Immer noch hungrig auf [setfontcol blue]neue
Abenteuer[setfontcol black], wenn ich das richtig sehe?
Du bestimmst den Kurs, Steuermann![setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow001.EuItalian:
Sei in cerca di [setfontcol blue]altre avventure[setfontcol none], eh?
Il timone è tuo, Comandante!
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¿Estás ansioso por vivir [setfontcol blue]más
aventuras[setfontcol none]?[setfontcol black] ¡Pues agarra el timón,
capitán![setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow001.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue]もっと<ruby>冒険<rt>ぼうけん</rt></ruby>したい[setfontcol black]んだろ?[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
まかせたからね! <ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow001.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol black]Hungry for [setfontcol blue]more adventure[setfontcol black], eh?
The helm is yours, Captain![setfontcol none]
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow001.UsFrench:
L'[setfontcol blue]aventure[setfontcol none] t'appelle, capitaine?
Mettons les voiles!
Meister_AfterStar120Ending_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Quieres vivir [setfontcol blue]más aventuras[setfontcol none],
¿verdad? [setfontcol black]¡Pues solo necesitas
agarrar el timón, capitán![setfontcol none]

Meister_TicoFatIntroduce_Flow000.EuDutch:
Looks like you found a [setfontcol red][icon HungryLuma] Hungry
Luma[setfontcol black]. Hope you've got a stack of
Star Bits, 'cause those guys can EAT![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_TicoFatIntroduce_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Looks like you found a [setfontcol red][icon HungryLuma] Hungry
Luma[setfontcol black]. Hope you've got a stack of
Star Bits, 'cause those guys can EAT![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_TicoFatIntroduce_Flow000.EuFrench:
Tiens, on dirait bien que t'as trouvé
un [setfontcol red]goinfre Luma[setfontcol none] [setfontcol black][setfontcol red][icon HungryLuma][setfontcol black]. Il porte bien son
nom, prépare tes [icon StarBit]![setfontcol none]
Meister_TicoFatIntroduce_Flow000.EuGerman:
Oh! Ein [setfontcol red][icon HungryLuma] Gourmet-Luma [setfontcol black]ist an Bord!
Du solltest ihn besser füttern, 
bevor er zu quengeln anfängt![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_TicoFatIntroduce_Flow000.EuItalian:
Oh! Hai trovato uno [setfontcol red]Sfavillotto
Ghiotto [setfontcol none][setfontcol black][icon HungryLuma]... Mi auguro che tu abbia
tante [setfontcol purple]Astroschegge[setfontcol black]... Quelli mangiano![setfontcol none]
Meister_TicoFatIntroduce_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Vaya, ¡has encontrado
un [setfontcol red]Destello Glotón [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon HungryLuma][setfontcol black]![newpage]
Tendrás trozos de estrella, ¿no?
¡Estos destellos tienen un apetito
voraz![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_TicoFatIntroduce_Flow000.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red][icon HungryLuma]ハラペコチコ[setfontcol black]を<ruby>呼<rt>よ</rt></ruby>んだんだね[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
たーんと<ruby>食<rt>く</rt></ruby>わせてやんな!
Meister_TicoFatIntroduce_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Looks like you found a [setfontcol red][icon HungryLuma] Hungry
Luma[setfontcol black]. Hope you've got a stack of
Star Bits, 'cause those guys can EAT![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Meister_TicoFatIntroduce_Flow000.UsFrench:
Tu as trouvé une [setfontcol red]Luma gourmande [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon HungryLuma][setfontcol none]![newpage]
J'espère que tu as une bonne réserve
d'éclats d'étoile, parce qu'elle mange
comme une baleine! Har, har, har!
Meister_TicoFatIntroduce_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Vaya, vaya. ¡Conque has llamado a
un [setfontcol red]Destello Glotón [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon HungryLuma][setfontcol black]![newpage]
Más vale que tengas bastantes
trozos de estrella. ¡Estos destellos
tienen un apetito voraz![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow000.EuDutch:
OK! First things first! If ya wanna
fly, ya gotta learn how to steer! Grab
the helm and give her a spin!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow000.EuEnglish:
OK! First things first! If ya wanna
fly, ya gotta learn how to steer! Grab
the helm and give her a spin!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow000.EuFrench:
Bon, les bases avant tout!
Sers-toi de la roue du gouvernail
pour diriger ce vaisseau!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow000.EuGerman:
Beginnen wir mit dem Wichtigsten!
Du musst lernen, wie du
das Schiff steuerst![newpage]
Lege beide Hände ans Steuerrad und
schon schippert der Kahn sanft
durchs All! Probier's mal aus!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow000.EuItalian:
Dunque, la prima cosa da imparare è
come comandare quest'astronave!
Afferra il timone e prova!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Bien! Primero tienes que aprender
a navegar. ¡Agarra el timón a ver
qué tal te defiendes!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow000.JpJapanese: まずは<ruby>体<rt>からだ</rt></ruby>で、 この<ruby>船<rt>ふね</rt></ruby>の<ruby>操縦<rt>そうじゅう</rt></ruby>を<ruby>覚<rt>おぼ</rt></ruby>えな!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow000.UsEnglish:
OK! First things first! If ya wanna
fly, ya gotta learn how to steer! Grab
the helm and give her a spin!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow000.UsFrench:
Installe-toi derrière la barre
et explore un peu, matelot!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Bien! Primero tienes que aprender
a navegar. ¡Agarra el timón a ver
qué tal te defiendes!

Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow001.EuDutch:
Gettin' used to handling the ship?
Pretty smooth, am I right?
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Gettin' used to handling the ship?
Pretty smooth, am I right?
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow001.EuFrench:
Alors, petit gars! Le vaisseau obéit
au doigt et à l'œil, pas vrai, matelot?
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow001.EuGerman:
Hast du dich an die Steuerung des
Raumschiffs gewöhnt? Klappt prima
nach etwas Einarbeitungszeit, nicht?
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow001.EuItalian:
Ci stai prendendo la mano col timone,
eh? Non è poi così difficile, vero?
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Vas pillándole el tranquillo a controlar
la astronave, ¿eh? ¿A que mola?
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow001.JpJapanese:
この<ruby>船<rt>ふね</rt></ruby>のあつかいには<ruby>慣<rt>な</rt></ruby>れたかい?
<ruby>筋<rt>すじ</rt></ruby>は<ruby>悪<rt>わる</rt></ruby>くないようだね
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Gettin' used to handling the ship?
Pretty smooth, am I right?
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow001.UsFrench:
Commences-tu à avoir le pied marin,
matelot? Te sens-tu plus à l'aise avec
les commandes du vaisseau?
Meister_NormalTalkWorld1_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¿Te vas adaptando a los controles
de la nave? No es difícil, ¿verdad?

Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow000.EuDutch:
There's a lotta [icon HungryLuma] [setfontcol red]Hungry Lumas [setfontcol none]out
there in space.[newpage]
Those guys have [setfontcol red]huge appetites[setfontcol none], so
try to collect as many [setfontcol blue][icon StarBit] Star Bits [setfontcol black]as
you can[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]! You're gonna need 'em!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow000.EuEnglish:
There's a lotta [icon HungryLuma] [setfontcol red]Hungry Lumas [setfontcol none]out
there in space.[newpage]
Those guys have [setfontcol red]huge appetites[setfontcol none], so
try to collect as many [setfontcol blue][icon StarBit] Star Bits [setfontcol black]as
you can[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]! You're gonna need 'em!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow000.EuFrench:
Le cosmos est rempli de
[setfontcol red]goinfres Luma[setfontcol none] [icon HungryLuma].[newpage]
Ils ont l'[setfontcol red]estomac[setfontcol none] [setfontcol red]gros comme ce
vaisseau[setfontcol none], alors tâche d'avoir un
paquet de [setfontcol blue][icon StarBit][setfontcol none] sur toi!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow000.EuGerman:
Im Weltall gibt es eine Menge
[icon HungryLuma] [setfontcol red]Gourmet-Luma[setfontcol none].[newpage]
Sie zeichnen sich durch ihren [setfontcol red]enormen[setfontcol none]
[setfontcol red]Kohldampf[setfontcol none] aus, sammele also so viele
[icon StarBit] [setfontcol blue][setfontcol purple]Sternenteile[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black],[setfontcol blue] [setfontcol black]wie du kannst[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow000.EuItalian:
Ci sono molti [setfontcol red]Sfavillotti Ghiotti [setfontcol none][icon HungryLuma] là
fuori, nello spazio.[newpage]
Hanno un appetito incredibile, perciò
cerca di raccogliere tante
[setfontcol blue]Astroschegge[setfontcol none] [icon StarBit]! Ti serviranno!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Hay un montón de [icon HungryLuma] por el espacio.
Si algo tienen en común, es que todos
ellos tienen un [setfontcol red]hambre voraz[setfontcol none].[newpage]
¡Intenta conseguir todos los [icon StarBit]
[setfontcol black]que puedas de antemano![setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow000.JpJapanese:
<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>にはたくさんの
[icon HungryLuma][setfontcol red]ハラペコチコ[setfontcol none]がいるのさ[newpage]
あいつらは [setfontcol red]<ruby>大食<rt>おおぐ</rt></ruby>いなヤツ[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]ら[setfontcol none]ばっかりだから
[icon StarBit][setfontcol blue]スターピース[setfontcol black]は[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]<ruby>普段<rt>ふだん</rt></ruby>から<ruby>集<rt>あつ</rt></ruby>めときな
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow000.UsEnglish:
There's a lotta [icon HungryLuma] [setfontcol red]Hungry Lumas [setfontcol none]out
there in space.[newpage]
Those guys have [setfontcol red]huge appetites[setfontcol none], so
try to collect as many [setfontcol blue][icon StarBit] Star Bits [setfontcol black]as
you can[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]! You're gonna need 'em!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow000.UsFrench:
L'espace est rempli de [setfontcol red]Luma
Gourmandes [setfontcol none][icon HungryLuma]. Elles ont un [setfontcol red]appétit
féroce[setfontcol none], et c'est peu dire...[newpage]
Assure-toi de ramasser le plus
[setfontcol blue]d'éclats d'étoile [setfontcol none][icon StarBit] que tu peux, au
cas où tu en rencontrerais une!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Hay muchos [setfontcol red]destellos glotones [setfontcol none][icon HungryLuma]
repartidos por el universo.[newpage]
Todos tienen un [setfontcol red]hambre voraz[setfontcol none].
¡Así que intenta conseguir todos los
[setfontcol blue]trozos de estrella [setfontcol none][icon StarBit][setfontcol blue] [setfontcol black]que puedas![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]

Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow001.EuDutch:
Say, you been collecting [icon Coin] [setfontcol red]coins[setfontcol none]?[newpage]
I really like [setfontcol yellow][icon Coin] coins[setfontcol none]. I just love that
noise they make... That [playsfx SE_SY_COIN][setfontcol yellow]BA-DINGG[setfontcol none]!
Har har! I can't get enough![newpage]
Tell ya what - I'll give you a [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up
[setfontcol none]for every [setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol none]coins you collect. So
bring me as many as you can find!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Say, you been collecting [icon Coin] [setfontcol red]coins[setfontcol none]?[newpage]
I really like [setfontcol yellow][icon Coin] coins[setfontcol none]. I just love that
noise they make... That [playsfx SE_SY_COIN][setfontcol yellow]BA-DINGG[setfontcol none]!
Har har! I can't get enough![newpage]
Tell ya what - I'll give you a [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up
[setfontcol none]for every [setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol none]coins you collect. So
bring me as many as you can find!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow001.EuFrench:
Alors gamin, il paraît que tu as
ramassé des [icon Coin]...[newpage]
J'adore le bruit des [setfontcol yellow][icon Coin] [setfontcol none]dans les
poches de mon caleçon... [playsfx SE_SY_COIN][setfontcol yellow]Cliinnng[setfontcol none]!
Arf! Je ne m'en lasserai jamais![newpage]
Et tu sais quoi? A chaque fois que
tu en apporteras [setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol none]à ce bon vieux
Lubba, il te donnera un [icon 1UpMushroom].
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow001.EuGerman:
Du bist fleißig dabei, [icon Coin] [setfontcol red][setfontcol yellow]Münzen[setfontcol red]
[setfontcol none]zu sammeln, seh ich das richtig?[newpage]
Ich liebe [setfontcol yellow][icon Coin] Münzen[setfontcol none]. Dieses Geräusch,
das sie machen... [playsfx SE_SY_COIN][setfontcol yellow]BA-DING[setfontcol none]!
Hahaha! Davon krieg ich nicht genug![newpage]
Für je [setfontcol red]100[setfontcol none] [icon Coin] [setfontcol yellow]Münzen[setfontcol none], die du mir
bringst, gebe ich dir ein [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-UP[setfontcol black],
sammele also so viele wie möglich![setfontcol green][setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow001.EuItalian:
Dimmi, raccogli le [setfontcol red]Monete[setfontcol none] [icon Coin]?[newpage]
Io adoro le [setfontcol yellow]Monete[setfontcol none] [setfontcol black][icon Coin], [setfontcol none]soprattutto
per il tintinnio che fanno... [playsfx SE_SY_COIN][setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow]DIIING[setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]
Ah... Come mi piacciono![newpage]
Ho un'idea! Facciamo uno scambio! 
Ti darò [setfontcol green]1 Fungo 1-Up [setfontcol none][setfontcol black][icon 1UpMushroom] per ogni [setfontcol red]100[setfontcol black]
[setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow]Monete[setfontcol none] [setfontcol black][icon Coin][setfontcol none] che mi porti! Ci stai?
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¿Has conseguido ya unas cuantas [icon Coin]?[newpage]
¡A mí me encantan! Adoro el [setfontcol yellow]tintineo[setfontcol none][playsfx SE_SY_COIN]
tan especial que hacen las [setfontcol yellow][icon Coin][setfontcol black]...[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
¡Aaaah! ¡Cómo me gusta![newpage]
Hum... Te propongo un trato: por cada
[setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol none][icon Coin] que consigas, te daré [setfontcol green]un[setfontcol none] [icon 1UpMushroom].
¡Consigue tantas como puedas!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow001.JpJapanese:
ちなみに [icon Coin][setfontcol red]コイン[setfontcol none]は<ruby>集<rt>あつ</rt></ruby>めているかい?[newpage]
わたしは[setfontcol yellow][icon Coin]コイン[setfontcol none]が<ruby>好<rt>す</rt></ruby>きでねえ
あの[playsfx SE_SY_COIN][setfontcol yellow]コィ～ン[setfontcol none]って<ruby>音<rt>おと</rt></ruby>が たまらないのさ[newpage]
[setfontcol red]100<ruby>枚<rt>まい</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]たまるたびに [icon 1UpMushroom][setfontcol green]1UPキノコ[setfontcol none]あげるから
せっせと <ruby>持<rt>も</rt></ruby>って<ruby>帰<rt>かえ</rt></ruby>ってきておくれ!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Say, you been collecting [icon Coin] [setfontcol red]coins[setfontcol none]?[newpage]
I really like [setfontcol yellow][icon Coin] coins[setfontcol none]. I just love that
noise they make... That [playsfx SE_SY_COIN][setfontcol yellow]BA-DINGG[setfontcol none]!
Har har! I can't get enough![newpage]
Tell ya what--I'll give you a [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up
[setfontcol none]for every [setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol none]coins you collect. So
bring me as many as you can find!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow001.UsFrench:
Hé, matelot, tu ramasses beaucoup
de [setfontcol red]pièces [setfontcol none][icon Coin] durant tes aventures,
non?[newpage]
J'adore les pièces, surtout le son
qu'elles font... [playsfx SE_SY_COIN][setfontcol yellow]BA-DING[setfontcol none]! Har, har![newpage]
Je vais te donner un [setfontcol green]champignon[setfontcol none]
[setfontcol green]1UP[setfontcol none] [icon 1UpMushroom] pour chaque [setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol none]pièces que
tu ramasses. Trouves-en des tonnes!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld2_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¿Conseguiste algunas [setfontcol red]monedas[setfontcol none] [icon Coin]?[newpage]
Me encantan las [setfontcol yellow]monedas[setfontcol none] [setfontcol yellow][icon Coin] [setfontcol none]y adoro
el [setfontcol yellow]tintineo[setfontcol none][playsfx SE_SY_COIN] tan especial que hacen.[setfontcol black]..[setfontcol none]
¡Aaaah! ¡Me encantaaaaaaan![newpage]
Hum... Te propongo un trato: por cada
[setfontcol red]100 [setfontcol none][icon Coin] que consigas, te daré [setfontcol green]1[setfontcol none] [icon 1UpMushroom].
¡Consigue tantas como puedas!

Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow000.EuDutch:
Ya gettin' used to the helm?[newpage]
Don't get too comfortable! We're
[setfontcol blue]responsible[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue] for everybody's safety[setfontcol none]!
So stay sharp out there, Captain!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Ya gettin' used to the helm?[newpage]
Don't get too comfortable! We're
[setfontcol blue]responsible[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue] for everybody's safety[setfontcol none]!
So stay sharp out there, Captain!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow000.EuFrench:
Alors, tu te fais aux commandes du
vaisseau, mon gars?[newpage]
Oui, bah... Inutile de t'endormir sur
tes lauriers, la [setfontcol blue]sécurité de tout
l'équipage en dépend[setfontcol none]!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow000.EuGerman:
Hast du dich schon gut an das
Verhalten des Raumschiffs im
Sternenmeer gewöhnt?[newpage]
Werde ja nicht leichtsinnig!
Wir [setfontcol blue]alle vertrauen auf die
Flugkünste des Steuermanns[setfontcol black]![newpage]
Immerhin sind n[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]icht alle Passagiere
so schwindelfrei wie du und ich!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow000.EuItalian:
Ci stai prendendo la mano col timone,
eh?[newpage]
Ma non mostrare eccessiva
sicurezza e [setfontcol blue]mantieni l'attenzione
[setfontcol none]costante!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Le estás cogiendo el gustillo a
navegar con la astronave, ¿eh?[newpage]
¡Pues no te relajes! Debes [setfontcol blue]velar por
la seguridad de toda la tripulación[setfontcol none].
¡Así que estate muy atento, capitán!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow000.JpJapanese:
この<ruby>船<rt>ふね</rt></ruby>の<ruby>操縦<rt>そうじゅう</rt></ruby>には もう<ruby>慣<rt>な</rt></ruby>れたかい?[newpage]
でもね、 <ruby>慣<rt>な</rt></ruby>れてきたときこそ [setfontcol blue]<ruby>注意<rt>ちゅうい</rt></ruby>が<ruby>必要<rt>ひつよう</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]だよ!
<ruby>気<rt>き</rt></ruby>を<ruby>引<rt>ひ</rt></ruby>き<ruby>締<rt>し</rt></ruby>めな!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Ya gettin' used to the helm?[newpage]
Don't get too comfortable! We're
[setfontcol blue]responsible[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue] for everybody's safety[setfontcol none]!
So stay sharp out there, Captain!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow000.UsFrench:
Hé, matelot, tu es de plus en plus
confortable sur le vaisseau! C'est
très bien...[newpage]
Mais ne baisse pas la garde! Tu dois
[setfontcol blue]toujours t'assurer que ton équipage
est en sécurité[setfontcol none], capitaine!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¿Te vas adaptando a los controles
de la astronave?[newpage]
¡Pues no te relajes mucho! ¡[setfontcol blue]Siempre
debes tener presente la seguridad
de tus pasajeros[setfontcol none]! ¡No te distraigas!

Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow001.EuDutch:
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]Your special one[setfontcol black] is the [setfontcol blue]princess of
the Mushroom Kingdom[setfontcol black], am I right?[newpage]
I hope she's OK...[wait 15]
We're counting on you, Captain.[setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow001.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]Your special one[setfontcol black] is the [setfontcol blue]princess of
the Mushroom Kingdom[setfontcol black], am I right?[newpage]
I hope she's OK...[wait 15]
We're counting on you, Captain.[setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow001.EuFrench:
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]Ton amie[setfontcol black],[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black] [setfontcol black]c'est la [setfontcol blue]princesse du
royaume Champignon[setfontcol black], pas vrai?[newpage]
Bon, j'espère que tout ira bien pour
elle...[wait 15] On compte tous sur toi, matelot![setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow001.EuGerman:
[setfontcol red]Die dir kostbare Person[setfontcol none] ist die
[setfontcol blue]Prinzessin des [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]Pilz-Königreichs[setfontcol none], oder[setfontcol black]?[newpage]
Ich hoffe, dass es ihr gut geht...[wait 15]
Wir zählen auf dich, Steuermann.[setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow001.EuItalian:
La [setfontcol red]persona che ti sta a cuore [setfontcol none]è la
[setfontcol blue]Principessa del Regno dei Funghi[setfontcol none],
vero?[setfontcol black][newpage]
Spero che stia bene...[setfontcol black][wait 15][setfontcol black]
Contiamo su di te, Comandante![setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow001.EuSpanish:
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]A quien quieres salvar[setfontcol black] es a la
[setfontcol blue]princesa del Reino Champiñón[setfontcol black], ¿no?[newpage]
Espero que no le haya pasado nada...[wait 15]
Contamos contigo, capitán.[setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow001.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol red]アンタの<ruby>大切<rt>たいせつ</rt></ruby>なヒト[setfontcol none]は
[setfontcol blue]キノコ<ruby>王国<rt>おうこく</rt></ruby>のお<ruby>姫様<rt>ひめさま</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]なんだろ?[newpage]
<ruby>怖<rt>こわ</rt></ruby>がってないか、 <ruby>心配<rt>しんぱい</rt></ruby>だねえ・・・
<ruby>早<rt>はや</rt></ruby>く<ruby>助<rt>たす</rt></ruby>けてあげないとね! <ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow001.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]Your special one[setfontcol black] is the [setfontcol blue]princess of
the Mushroom Kingdom[setfontcol black], am I right?[newpage]
I hope she's OK...[wait 15]
We're counting on you, Captain.[setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow001.UsFrench:
Ta [setfontcol red]bien-aimée [setfontcol none]est la [setfontcol blue]princesse du
Royaume Champignon[setfontcol none], non?[setfontcol black][newpage]
J'espère qu'elle va bien...[setfontcol none][setfontcol black][wait 15] Nous
comptons tous sur toi, capitaine![setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld3_Flow001.UsSpanish:
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]Tu ser querido[setfontcol black] es la [setfontcol blue]princesa del

Meister_NormalTalkWorld4_Flow000.EuDutch:

back, the ship is turning into a pretty
[setfontcol blue]lively [setfontcol none]spot!

With the way you keep bringing stuff
back, the ship is turning into a pretty
[setfontcol blue]lively [setfontcol none]spot!

tu nous apportes, c'est vraiment la
[setfontcol blue]foire[setfontcol none] sur le vaisseau!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld4_Flow000.EuGerman:

deinen Ausflügen mitbringst, wird das

un'atmosfera davvero [setfontcol blue]allegra[setfontcol none]!

nave, ¡se está volviendo un sitio
bastante [setfontcol blue]animado[setfontcol none]!

アンタがいろいろ<ruby>持<rt>も</rt></ruby>って<ruby>帰<rt>かえ</rt></ruby>ってくるから

With the way you keep bringing stuff
back, the ship is turning into a pretty
[setfontcol blue]lively [setfontcol none]spot!

Meister_NormalTalkWorld4_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Con todas las cosas raras que traes
a la nave, ¡se está convirtiendo en un
sitio bastante [setfontcol blue]animado[setfontcol none]!

Dimmi un po', cosa fa ultimamente [setfontcol green]tuo

[setfontcol blue]ジャンプの<ruby>高<rt>たか</rt></ruby>さ[setfontcol black]に[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none] <ruby>自信<rt>じしん</rt></ruby>があるらしいじゃないか

Meister_NormalTalkWorld5_Flow000.EuDutch:
Have you been collecting those
[icon CometMedal][setfontcol red] Comet Medals[setfontcol none]?[newpage]

found one [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Star [setfontcol none]because

[icon PowerStar] dans une galaxie parce qu'[setfontcol blue]aucune
[setfontcol none][icon Comet] [setfontcol blue]n'y est encore apparue[setfontcol none]![setfontcol black][newpage]

Hast du bereits einige dieser
[icon CometMedal][setfontcol red] Kometenmünzen [setfontcol none]gesammelt?[newpage]

Cometa [setfontcol none][icon CometMedal]?[newpage]

trovato soltanto una [setfontcol yellow]Superstella [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]

[setfontcol red]Medaglie Cometa [setfontcol none][icon CometMedal]!

Have you been collecting those
[icon CometMedal][setfontcol red] Comet Medals[setfontcol none]?[newpage]

Matelot, est-ce que tu t'assures de

Si tu n'as trouvé qu'une seule [setfontcol yellow]super

compte sur toi, capitaine!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld5_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¿Has ido recogiendo esas [setfontcol red]medallas de
cometa [setfontcol none][icon CometMedal]?[newpage]
Si en algunas galaxias solo has 
podido hallar una [setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow]Superestrella[setfontcol black] [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar], 
es porque no han llegado cometas ahí.[newpage]
Es por ello que debes recoger cada
[setfontcol red][icon CometMedal][setfontcol black] que se encuentre a tu paso.
¡Contamos contigo, capitán[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]

Meister_NormalTalkWorld5_Flow001.EuDutch:

[setfontcol black]We need to get going and
save her! Come on, Captain![setfontcol none]

I wonder what [setfontcol red]your special one [setfontcol none]is

[setfontcol blue]オンナノコ[setfontcol none]ひとりじゃ <ruby>心細<rt>こころぼそ</rt></ruby>いだろうに・・・・・・

I wonder what [setfontcol red]your special one [setfontcol none]is

[setfontcol red]bien-aimée[setfontcol none] en ce moment.[newpage]

Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow000.EuDutch:
[setfontcol black]Well, buddy - looks like you know
what needs to be done. So get out
there and give it your best shot![setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow000.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol black]Well, buddy - looks like you know
what needs to be done. So get out
there and give it your best shot![setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow000.EuFrench:
Allez, mon gars, tu sais ce que tu
dois faire, alors vas-y et donne-toi
à fond!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow000.EuGerman:
[setfontcol black]Nun gut, Bürschchen. Weiter geht's!
Du hast mein volles Vertrauen, also
mach, was du für richtig hältst! [setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow000.EuItalian:
Beh, sembra che tu sappia cosa c'è

tuo meglio!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Bueno, parece que sabes lo que hay
que hacer. ¡Adelante, sin miedo!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow000.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol black]もう ナンも<ruby>言<rt>い</rt></ruby>うことはない
<ruby>気張<rt>きば</rt></ruby>って<ruby>行<rt>い</rt></ruby>きな![setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow000.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol black]Well, buddy--looks like you know what
needs to be done. So get out there
and give it your best shot![setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow000.UsFrench:
Eh bien, matelot, je crois que tu sais
quoi faire! Mets les voiles et jette-
toi à l'eau!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow000.UsSpanish:
[setfontcol black]Bien... parece que ya sabes lo que
debes hacer. ¡Adelante, sin miedo![setfontcol none]

Manger[setfontcol red] [setfontcol black]des [setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black][icon PowerStar] pour enfler comme ça[setfontcol black]!
Faut être un peu dérangé, non?[newpage]
Allez, moussaillon, il est temps de

Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow001.EuItalian:

Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow001.EuSpanish:

[setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar]パワースター[setfontcol none]を<ruby>食<rt>く</rt></ruby>って <ruby>大<rt>おお</rt></ruby>きくなるなんざ

わたしらも<ruby>腹<rt>はら</rt></ruby>が<ruby>立<rt>た</rt></ruby>ってんだ!
<ruby>怒<rt>いか</rt></ruby>りは<ruby>消<rt>き</rt></ruby>えちゃいないよ![newpage]
ゼッタイに<ruby>追<rt>お</rt></ruby>いついてやろう <ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>!

[setfontcol black]What was that [icon Bowser][setfontcol red] guy [setfontcol black]thinking, eating

Pas de temps à perdre, il faut

donner une bonne leçon![setfontcol none]
Meister_NormalTalkWorld6_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡¿Por qué querría ese[setfontcol red] monstruo [setfontcol none][setfontcol black][icon Bowser]

Meister_NormalTalkWorld7_Flow000.EuDutch:
I knew you had it in you! Now show
me what you can really do!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld7_Flow000.EuEnglish:
I knew you had it in you! Now show
me what you can really do!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld7_Flow000.EuFrench:
Je savais bien que t'avais la gagne!
Maintenant, montre-moi tout ton
potentiel, petit mousse!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld7_Flow000.EuGerman:
Es gibt noch viel zu entdecken!
Zeig mir, was in dir steckt!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld7_Flow000.EuItalian:
La tua avventura non è certo finita!
Fammi vedere cosa sai fare!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld7_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Tu aventura no ha terminado todavía!
Adelante, ¡demuéstrame de lo que
eres capaz!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld7_Flow000.JpJapanese:
わたしが <ruby>見込<rt>みこ</rt></ruby>んだだけはあるね!
<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>う<ruby>存分<rt>ぞんぶん</rt></ruby> <ruby>暴<rt>あば</rt></ruby>れてきな!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld7_Flow000.UsEnglish:
I knew you had it in you! Now show
me what you can really do!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld7_Flow000.UsFrench:
Je savais que tu avais l'étoffe d'un
vrai capitaine! Maintenant, montre-moi
ce que tu sais faire!
Meister_NormalTalkWorld7_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Sabía que lo lograrías! ¡Vamos, 
muéstrame de lo que eres capaz!

Meister_PriorityTalkAdvice2PSupport_Flow.EuDutch:
That place was rough, but you still
pulled through like a champ![newpage]
You know, if you had a [setfontcol orange]P2 [setfontcol none]to [setfontcol red]assist
[setfontcol none]you a bit, it might all be a little
easier...and more fun!
Meister_PriorityTalkAdvice2PSupport_Flow.EuEnglish:
That place was rough, but you still
pulled through like a champ![newpage]
You know, if you had a [setfontcol orange]P2 [setfontcol none]to [setfontcol red]assist

Meister_PriorityTalkAdvice2PSupport_Flow.EuFrench:
Par la barbe de ma grand-mère, tu
t'en es encore sorti comme un chef!
Pourtant, c'était pas simple![newpage]
Si tu jouais avec un [setfontcol orange]Joueur 2[setfontcol black], il

plus facile et plus... comique, hé hé![setfontcol orange][setfontcol none]

Das war eine harte Galaxie, aber du
hast dich meisterlich geschlagen![newpage]
Wenn du jemanden hättest, der dir
als [setfontcol orange]SP2 [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]zur Seite stünde[setfontcol none], wäre alles

Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.EuDutch:
You've been through a lot lately, huh?[newpage]
Maybe you should just take a break
for a little while, Captain.
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.EuEnglish:
You've been through a lot lately, huh?[newpage]
Maybe you should just take a break
for a little while, Captain.
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.EuFrench:
T'en as pas mal bavé ces derniers
temps, hein? Fais donc une petite
pause, va. Privilège de capitaine!
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.EuGerman:
Du hast da ganz schön was
mitgemacht, oder irre ich mich?[newpage]
Gönn dir ruhig mal
eine Auszeit, Steuermann.
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.EuItalian:
Ne hai passate tante ultimamente,
vero?[newpage]
Forse dovresti riposarti un pochino?
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.EuSpanish:
Quizá podrías parar un rato
para relajarte y volver con
energías renovadas, capitán.
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.JpJapanese:
だいぶ <ruby>苦労<rt>くろう</rt></ruby>しているようじゃないか?[newpage]
ここらでちょっと <ruby>休<rt>やす</rt></ruby>んでみたらどうだい
<ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.UsEnglish:
You've been through a lot lately, huh?[newpage]
Maybe you should just take a break
for a little while, Captain.
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.UsFrench:
Les temps sont durs, hein?[newpage]
Tu devrais peut-être te reposer.
Pourquoi ne pas prendre une petite
pause, capitaine?
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.UsSpanish:
Últimamente has pasado por galaxias
muy difíciles, ¿verdad?[newpage]
Quizás podrías parar un rato
para relajarte y volver con
energías renovadas, capitán.

Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.EuDutch:
Looks like that last galaxy was pretty
rough. But, good work toughing it out![newpage]
Ya know...I just want you to
remember that we all really
appreciate everything you're doing...[newpage]
We owe you a big thanks for
collecting all of these [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol none]!
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.EuEnglish:
Looks like that last galaxy was pretty
rough. But, good work toughing it out![newpage]

remember that we all really
appreciate everything you're doing...[newpage]
We owe you a big thanks for

n'était pas facile, hein? Mais tu t'en

Je voulais juste te dire qu'on t'est
tous très reconnaissants.[newpage]
Merci beaucoup de te décarcasser
pour trouver toutes ces [icon PowerStar]!
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.EuGerman:
Die letzte Galaxie war ganz schön
anspruchsvoll, nicht wahr? Aber du
hast dich wirklich gut geschlagen![newpage]

wir alle wirklich bewundern, was du die
ganze Zeit für eine Leistung zeigst...[newpage]
Immerhin bist du es, der hier
all die [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Sterne [setfontcol black]sammelt[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]!
Meister_PriorityTalkPreviousScenarioMiss.EuItalian:
Questa Galassia era dura! Nonostante

le [setfontcol yellow]Superstelle[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar], Comandante!

todos valoramos mucho lo que estás

¡Muchas gracias por recuperar
todas esas [icon PowerStar]!

さっきの<ruby>銀河<rt>ギャラクシー</rt></ruby>は <ruby>大変<rt>たいへん</rt></ruby>だったね

いいかい? アンタが [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol none]を

わたしは ほんとに <ruby>感謝<rt>かんしゃ</rt></ruby>してるんだ
これだけは おぼえておきな

Kinopio000.EuDutch:

just...couldn't...keep up... So tired...

just...couldn't...keep up... So tired...

Ma io... Puff... Non ce la faccio...

Nuestro [setfontcol red]jefe [setfontcol none]se largó persiguiendo a
un [setfontcol blue]mono[setfontcol none]. ¡No hubo forma de seguirle

[setfontcol red][setfontcol blue]<ruby>青<rt>あお</rt></ruby>いサル[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]は この<ruby>先<rt>さき</rt></ruby>にいます!
[setfontcol red][icon Toad]<ruby>隊長<rt>たいちょう</rt></ruby>[setfontcol black]も <ruby>必死<rt>ひっし</rt></ruby>で<ruby>追<rt>お</rt></ruby>いかけています![newpage]
しかし、 もう・・・・・・
わたしは・・・ これ<ruby>以上<rt>いじょう</rt></ruby>、 <ruby>走<rt>はし</rt></ruby>れませんっ![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Our [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]captain [setfontcol black]chased that [setfontcol blue]monkey[setfontcol black]! [setfontcol red][setfontcol black]I
just...couldn't...keep up... So tired... [setfontcol none]

[setfontcol blue]mono[setfontcol black]! ¡Yo no pude seguir su ritmo![setfontcol none]

[setfontcol red]ジャンプで <ruby>遠<rt>とお</rt></ruby>くまで<ruby>行<rt>い</rt></ruby>ってから[setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol red]スピン[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]! [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]で
<ruby>雲<rt>くも</rt></ruby>を<ruby>作<rt>つく</rt></ruby>れば かなり<ruby>遠<rt>とお</rt></ruby>くまで<ruby>行<rt>い</rt></ruby>けます
DreamerEnd010.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol red]Jump as far as you can before you
spin[setfontcol none]. If you do that when making
clouds, you'll reach new heights!
DreamerEnd010.UsFrench:
[setfontcol red]Sautez aussi loin que possible avant
de tourbillonner[setfontcol none]. Utilisez ce truc
lorsque vous faites des nuages!
DreamerEnd010.UsSpanish:
[setfontcol red]Salta tan lejos como puedas antes de
girar[setfontcol none]. ¡Si lo haces cuando estés
creando nubes llegarás muy alto!

Kinopio004_Flow001.EuDutch:
Some crazy-looking monkey grabbed
the [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol black][newpage]
Our [setfontcol blue]captain [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]chased him [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]up that [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]wall
[setfontcol black]by jumping off the sides until he
reached the top! I couldn't keep up![setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio004_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Some crazy-looking monkey grabbed
the [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol black][newpage]
Our [setfontcol blue]captain [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]chased him [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]up that [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]wall
[setfontcol black]by jumping off the sides until he
reached the top! I couldn't keep up![setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio004_Flow001.EuFrench:
[setfontcol black]Un drôle de singe a pris la [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black][setfontcol black][newpage]
[setfontcol black][setfontcol black]Notre [setfontcol blue]capitaine [setfontcol black]est parti à sa
poursuite! Il a[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black] [setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]escaladé [setfontcol black]ce [setfontcol red]mur[setfontcol black][setfontcol red][setfontcol blue][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]
en sautant d'une paroi à une autre! [setfontcol black][newpage]
J'ai essayé de le suivre,
mais je n'y suis pas arrivé![setfontcol black][setfontcol black][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio004_Flow001.EuGerman:
So ein verrückter Klammeraffe hat
sich den [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] Power-Stern [setfontcol black]gegriffen![setfontcol black][newpage]
[setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]Unser [setfontcol blue]Kapitän [setfontcol black]ist hinter ihm die [setfontcol red]Wand
[setfontcol black][setfontcol blue][setfontcol black][setfontcol red]hoch[setfontcol black], indem er von einer Seite zur
anderen gesprungen ist! Irre schnell![setfontcol none]
Kinopio004_Flow001.EuItalian:
Una strana scimmia si è presa la
[setfontcol yellow]Superstella[setfontcol none][setfontcol black] [icon PowerStar]![setfontcol none][newpage]
Il nostro [setfontcol blue]Capitano[setfontcol none] l'ha [setfontcol red]seguita in cima[setfontcol none]
al [setfontcol red]muro[setfontcol none] saltando da un lato all'altro!
Non ce l'ho fatta a stargli dietro...
Kinopio004_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Un mono con gafas de sol cogió la [icon PowerStar]
y n[setfontcol black]uestro [setfontcol blue]jefe [setfontcol black]salió detrás de él![newpage]
No veas lo rápido que [setfontcol red]escaló [setfontcol black]esas
[setfontcol red]paredes [setfontcol black]saltando de una a otra hasta
llegar arriba. ¡Cualquiera lo imita![setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio004_Flow001.JpJapanese:
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol none]を<ruby>発見<rt>はっけん</rt></ruby>したのですが
[setfontcol blue]<ruby>怪<rt>あや</rt></ruby>しげなサル[setfontcol none]に<ruby>奪<rt>うば</rt></ruby>われてしまいました![setfontcol blue][newpage]
[setfontcol red][icon Toad]<ruby>隊長<rt>たいちょう</rt></ruby>[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]が この[setfontcol blue]カベを<ruby>登<rt>のぼ</rt></ruby>って[setfontcol none][setfontcol black] <ruby>後<rt>あと</rt></ruby>を<ruby>追<rt>お</rt></ruby>っています!
わたしは・・・ついて<ruby>行<rt>い</rt></ruby>けませんでした [setfontsize small]・・・・・・ぜぇぜぇ[setfontcol none]
Kinopio004_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Some crazy-looking monkey grabbed
the [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] Power Star[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol black][newpage]
Our [setfontcol blue]captain [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]chased him [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]up that [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]wall
[setfontcol black]by jumping off the sides until he
reached the top! I couldn't keep up![setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio004_Flow001.UsFrench:
Un singe fou s'est emparé de la [setfontcol yellow]super
étoile [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol none]![newpage]
Le [setfontcol blue]capitaine [setfontcol none]s'est lancé à sa
poursuite et a [setfontcol red]escaladé le mur[setfontcol none]
en sautant d'un côté à l'autre.[newpage]
Je n'ai pas été capable de les suivre...
Kinopio004_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Un mono de aspecto muy raro se llevó
la [setfontcol yellow]Superestrella[setfontcol none] [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol none].[setfontcol black][newpage]
Nuestro [setfontcol blue]jefe [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]salió tras él y subió por
esa pared [setfontcol black][setfontcol black]rebotando de un lado a
otro hasta llegar arriba. ¡Yo no pude![setfontcol black][setfontcol none]

Kinopio006_Flow001.EuDutch:
We have located the [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow]Power Star[setfontcol black].
Our new [setfontcol red][setfontcol red][icon Toad] [setfontcol red]captain [setfontcol black]is homing in on it![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
Kinopio006_Flow001.EuEnglish:
We have located the [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow]Power Star[setfontcol black].
Our new [setfontcol red][setfontcol red][icon Toad] [setfontcol red]captain [setfontcol black]is homing in on it![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
Kinopio006_Flow001.EuFrench:
[setfontcol black]Notre mission: remettre la main
sur la [icon PowerStar]![newpage]
Le [setfontcol red]capitaine[setfontcol black] de la [setfontcol black]brigade Toad[setfontcol black]
appréhendera sûrement le voleur.
Aucun doute là-dessus![setfontcol none]
Kinopio006_Flow001.EuGerman:
[setfontcol black]Unsere Mission war es, einen
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern [setfontcol black]zu bergen...[newpage]
Aber, äääh...[setfontcol none][wait 15] Dabei ist leider der
[setfontcol red][setfontcol red][icon Toad] [setfontcol red][setfontcol red]Kapitän [setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol red]des [setfontcol black][setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]Suchtrupps[setfontcol blue]
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red][setfontcol black]abhanden gekommen! [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontsize small]Irgendwie...
Kinopio006_Flow001.EuItalian:
La nostra missione consiste nel
recupero della [setfontcol yellow]Superstella[setfontcol none] [setfontcol black][icon PowerStar]...
Il [setfontcol red]C[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]apitano [setfontcol black][icon Toad] è già alla ricerca.[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio006_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Hemos localizado la [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol black] ¡El [setfontcol red]jefe
de la Cuadrilla [setfontcol black][setfontcol red][icon Toad] [setfontcol black]va tras ella![setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
Kinopio006_Flow001.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar]パワースター[setfontcol black]の<ruby>行方<rt>ゆくえ</rt></ruby>を[setfontcol red]
[setfontcol black]われら[setfontcol red][setfontcol blue]キノピオ<ruby>探検隊<rt>たんけんたい</rt></ruby>[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]の[setfontcol red][icon Toad]<ruby>隊長<rt>たいちょう</rt></ruby>[setfontcol black]が<ruby>追<rt>お</rt></ruby>っています![setfontcol none]
Kinopio006_Flow001.UsEnglish:
We have located the [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow]Power Star[setfontcol black].
Our new [setfontcol red][setfontcol red][icon Toad] [setfontcol red]captain [setfontcol black]is homing in on it![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
Kinopio006_Flow001.UsFrench:
Notre mission? Retrouver la [setfontcol yellow]super
étoile [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol none] de cette galaxie.[newpage]
Le [setfontcol red]capitaine [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Toad] [setfontcol none]de la [setfontcol blue]Brigade Toad
[setfontcol none]est à la poursuite du voleur en ce
moment même!
Kinopio006_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡Hemos localizado la [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol black] ¡El [setfontcol red]jefe
del Escuadrón [setfontcol black][setfontcol red][icon Toad] [setfontcol black]va tras ella![setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol none]

Moc000.EuDutch:
[setfontcol blue]Touch water[setfontcol black]. [setfontcol red]Lose clouds[setfontcol black]. More
ahead! Keep going![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Moc000.EuEnglish:
[setfontcol blue]Touch water[setfontcol black]. [setfontcol red]Lose clouds[setfontcol black]. More
ahead! Keep going![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Moc000.EuFrench:
[setfontcol blue]Toucher eau[setfontcol none]. [setfontcol red]Perdre nuages[setfontcol none].
Autres plus loin! Continuer!
Moc000.EuGerman:
[setfontcol blue]Wasser berührt[setfontcol black]. [setfontcol red]Wolke verloren[setfontcol black].
Weiter! Weiter! Immer weiter![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Moc000.EuItalian:
[setfontcol blue]L[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][setfontcol blue]'[setfontcol blue]acqua[setfontcol none] [setfontcol blue]tocchi [setfontcol none]e [setfontcol red][setfontcol red]le nuvole [setfontcol red]perdi[setfontcol none].
Più avanti, altre.
Moc000.EuSpanish:
Si [setfontcol blue]tocas el agua[setfontcol none], [setfontcol red]despídete de las
nubes[setfontcol none]. ¡Hay más allí delante, así que
sigue tranquilo!
Moc000.JpJapanese:
[setfontcol blue]<ruby>水<rt>みず</rt></ruby>にふれる[setfontcol none]ト [setfontcol red]へんしんモドル[setfontcol none]
<ruby>先<rt>さき</rt></ruby>にも<ruby>雲<rt>くも</rt></ruby>アル このままススメ
Moc000.UsEnglish:
[setfontcol blue]Touch water[setfontcol black]. [setfontcol red]Lose clouds[setfontcol black]. More
ahead! Keep going![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Moc000.UsFrench:
[setfontcol blue]Toucher eau[setfontcol none]. [setfontcol red]Perdre nuages[setfontcol none].
Autres nuages là-bas. Continuer!
Moc000.UsSpanish:
[setfontcol blue]Tocar agua[setfontcol black]. [setfontcol red]Perder nubes[setfontcol black].
¡Adelante más! ¡Seguir![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]

Moc001_Flow000.EuFrench: Marcher sur [setfontcol red]nuages[setfontcol black]?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Moc001_Flow000.EuItalian: Come si cavalcano le [setfontcol red]nuvole[setfontcol black], sai[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol none]
Moc001_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Eh, tronco! ¿No sabes
andar por las [setfontcol red]nubes[setfontcol none]?
Moc001_Flow000.JpJapanese: オマエ [setfontcol red]<ruby>雲<rt>くも</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none] のれるカ?

Moc001_Flow001.EuGerman:
Drehen! Drehen! Du! Du! Du!
Für [setfontcol red]Wolke[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol red]Wolke[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol red]Wolke[setfontcol none]!
Moc001_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Tronco, haz un [setfontcol blue]Giro
[setfontcol none]y crearás una [setfontcol red]nube[setfontcol none]!
Moc001_Flow001.JpJapanese: ふっテ [setfontcol red]<ruby>雲<rt>くも</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]つくる

Moc002_Flow000.EuDutch: Make [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]three [setfontcol black]clouds[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]
Moc002_Flow000.EuEnglish: Make [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]three [setfontcol black]clouds[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]
Moc002_Flow000.EuFrench: Toi [setfontcol black]faire [setfontcol red]trois[setfontcol black] nuages![setfontcol none]
Moc002_Flow000.EuGerman:
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]Drei Wolken[setfontcol black]!
Nacheinander.[setfontcol none]
Moc002_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Puedes crear hasta [setfontcol red]3 nubes[setfontcol none]...[setfontcol black]
¡y a volar! ¿A que mola?[setfontcol none]
Moc002_Flow000.JpJapanese: [setfontcol red]3つ<ruby>作<rt>つく</rt></ruby>った[setfontcol none]ラ おわり
Moc002_Flow000.UsEnglish: Make [setfontcol black][setfontcol red]three [setfontcol black]clouds[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]

¡Tú sólo poder hacer[setfontcol black][setfontcol red] tres [setfontcol black]nubes[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]!
¡Saltar! ¡Girar! [setfontcol black]¡Saltar! ¡Girar![setfontcol black][setfontcol black] [setfontcol black]¡Síiii![setfontcol none]

ScoreAttackMan007_Flow000.EuDutch:
Whoa! I wasn't expecting you!
Good work getting up here.[newpage]
They call me [setfontcol red]The Chimp[setfontcol none]. Seems like
you may be a worthy [setfontcol red]high-climbing
[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]rival[setfontcol none]. [wait 15]Take [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]this[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! We'll talk later...
ScoreAttackMan007_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Whoa! I wasn't expecting you!
Good work getting up here.[newpage]
They call me [setfontcol red]The Chimp[setfontcol none]. Seems like
you may be a worthy [setfontcol red]high-climbing
[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]rival[setfontcol none]. [wait 15]Take [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]this[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! We'll talk later...
ScoreAttackMan007_Flow000.EuFrench:
Yo, man! T'es monté jusqu'ici?!
T'as du style, mon pote! Enfin un
[setfontcol red]adversaire [setfontcol none]qui a de la classe![newpage]
Tiens, prends [setfontcol yellow]cette [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol black]! [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]Quelque chose
me dit qu'on va se recroiser, toi et
moi! A plus, man!
ScoreAttackMan007_Flow000.EuGerman:
Oha! Ich habe diesen verrückten
Pilzkopf erwartet, nicht dich![wait 15]
Na, wie dem auch sei...[newpage]
Du scheinst mir ein würdiger Rivale
im [setfontcol red]Gipfelstürmen[setfontcol none] zu sein. Nimm dieses
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Wanderabzeichen [setfontcol none]als Preis dafür...[newpage]
Ich habe das Gefühl, dass wir uns
schon bald wiedersehen werden, also
bis dann, du tüchtiger Bergsteiger!
ScoreAttackMan007_Flow000.EuItalian:
[setfontcol black]Ehi! Ma tu chi sei? Comunque
complimenti per avercela fatta
fin qui! [setfontcol black]Bella scalata![setfontcol black][newpage]
Sei un [setfontcol red]degno rivale[setfontcol black]! [wait 15]Prendi questa
[setfontcol yellow]Superstella [setfontcol black][setfontcol black][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol black]come ricompensa!
Alla prossima sfida![setfontcol none]
ScoreAttackMan007_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Anda, pero si yo pensaba que
hasta aquí no llegaría nadie más![newpage]
Tú sí que eres un [setfontcol red]alpinista[setfontcol none] que está
más o menos a mi altura, colega...[newpage]
¡Llévate esta[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol none][setfontcol black] como premio
por haber llegado hasta aquí!
Ya nos veremos...[setfontcol none]
ScoreAttackMan007_Flow000.JpJapanese:
・・・あれ? オマエ!
[setfontcol blue]ここ[setfontcol none]まで<ruby>登<rt>のぼ</rt></ruby>ってくるとは なかなかだな![newpage]
おれさまの[setfontcol red]<ruby>山登<rt>やまのぼ</rt></ruby>りライバル [setfontcol none]と<ruby>認<rt>みと</rt></ruby>めてやろう
その<ruby>証<rt>あかし</rt></ruby>として [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar]コレ[setfontcol black]を<ruby>受<rt>う</rt></ruby>け<ruby>取<rt>と</rt></ruby>るのだ![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][newpage]
<ruby>光栄<rt>こうえい</rt></ruby>だろ! [wait 15]・・・そのかわり、 <ruby>次<rt>つぎ</rt></ruby>に<ruby>会<rt>あ</rt></ruby>ったら
[setfontcol red]ゼッタイ[setfontcol none]<ruby>遊<rt>あそ</rt></ruby>んでもらうからな!
ScoreAttackMan007_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Whoa! It's you. Good work getting up
here.[newpage]
They call me [setfontcol red]The Chimp[setfontcol none]. Seems like
you may be a worthy [setfontcol red]high-climbing
[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]rival[setfontcol none]. [wait 15]Take [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]this[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! We'll talk later...
ScoreAttackMan007_Flow000.UsFrench:
Hé, bravo! Tu as atteint le sommet de
la montagne! Tu as clairement la
marque d'un [setfontcol red]bon rival[setfontcol none], bonhomme![newpage]
Tiens, prends [setfontcol black]cette [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! Je sens qu'on
va se revoir bientôt. Ciao!
ScoreAttackMan007_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Vaya, no creí que alguien llegaría
hasta aquí ni en sueños![newpage]
¡Tú sí que eres un [setfontcol red]alpinista[setfontcol none] que está
más o menos a mi altura, colega![newpage]
¡Llévate esta [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar][setfontcol none][setfontcol black] como premio por
haber llegado hasta aquí! ¡La próxima
vez igual tengo otra cosa para ti![setfontcol none]

ScoreAttackMan007_Flow001.EuItalian: E ora... che gioco mi invento? [setfontsize small]Hmmm...
ScoreAttackMan007_Flow001.JpJapanese: <ruby>次<rt>つぎ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>遊<rt>あそ</rt></ruby>びは… [setfontsize small]ぶつぶつ・・・

SignBoard001.EuDutch:
You can change your camera view
with [icon DPad]. You'll hear a beep if you
can't get a better view.[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Press [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Cbtn] [setfontcol black]on [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][icon Nunchuk] to [setfontcol blue]reset [setfontcol none]your view.
SignBoard001.EuEnglish:
You can change your camera view
with [icon DPad]. You'll hear a beep if you
can't get a better view.[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Press [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Cbtn] [setfontcol black]on [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][icon Nunchuk] to [setfontcol blue]reset [setfontcol none]your view.
SignBoard001.EuFrench:
Tu peux changer de vue en appuyant
sur la [icon DPad]. Si l'option n'est pas
disponible, tu entendras un "bip".[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Appuie sur [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Cbtn] [setfontcol black]sur ton [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][icon Nunchuk] pour
[setfontcol blue]recentrer [setfontcol none]la caméra derrière toi.
SignBoard001.EuGerman:
Wenn es nicht möglich ist,
die Blickrichtung mit [icon DPad] einzustellen,
hörst du ein Geräusch.[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Drücke[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Cbtn] [setfontcol black]auf dem[setfontcol red][setfontcol black] [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][icon Nunchuk], um die
Kamera hinter dir zu [setfontcol blue]zentrieren[setfontcol none].
SignBoard001.EuItalian:
Puoi modificare la visuale con[setfontcol red] [setfontcol none][icon DPad].
Se senti un bip, significa che non
puoi cambiarla![newpage]
[setfontcol red]Premi[setfontcol none] [setfontcol black][icon Cbtn] sul Nunchuk [icon Nunchuk] per tornare
alla visuale [setfontcol blue]preimpostata[setfontcol black].[setfontcol none]
SignBoard001.EuSpanish:
Puedes mover la cámara y cambiar el
punto de vista con [icon DPad]. Oirás un pitido
cuando no puedas mover la cámara.[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Pulsa [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Cbtn] [setfontcol black]en el [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][icon Nunchuk] para usar el [setfontcol blue]punto
de vista original[setfontcol none].
SignBoard001.JpJapanese:
<ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>たいところを<ruby>変<rt>か</rt></ruby>えるには [icon DPad][setfontcol red]ボタン[setfontcol none]

SignBoard001.UsEnglish:
You can change your camera view
with [icon DPad]. You'll hear a beep if you
can't get a better view.[newpage]
[setfontcol red]Press [setfontcol none][setfontcol red][icon Cbtn] [setfontcol black]on [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][icon Nunchuk] to [setfontcol blue]reset [setfontcol none]your view.

caméra avec [icon DPad]. S'il est impossible
de le faire, un « bip » retentira.[newpage]

[setfontcol blue]retourner à l'angle de vue normal[setfontcol none].

punto de vista [setfontcol none]normal.

ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuDutch:
Well, well, well... You just rolled into
the domain of [setfontcol red]The Chimp[setfontcol none]! You've
heard about my gaming skills, right?[newpage]
Today I got a little challenge for ya.
Just [setfontcol black]skate [setfontcol none]and [setfontcol red]bump the [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]enemies[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black].[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Watch out for the spiked ones[setfontcol none].
Simple enough, right? So you ready to
experience this?!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Well, well, well... You just rolled into
the domain of [setfontcol red]The Chimp[setfontcol none]! You've
heard about my gaming skills, right?[newpage]
Today I got a little challenge for ya.
Just [setfontcol black]skate [setfontcol none]and [setfontcol red]bump the [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]enemies[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black].[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][newpage]
[setfontcol blue]Watch out for the spiked ones[setfontcol none].

ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Hé, man, ici c'est le domaine du grand
[setfontcol red]Billy Banane[setfontcol none]! Un vrai nirvana! T'es
prêt pour une nouvelle expérience?[setfontcol red][newpage]
[setfontcol black]Cool! Alors [setfontcol red][setfontcol black]patine [setfontcol red][setfontcol black]et [setfontcol red][setfontcol red]fonce dans les
Patavert et les Patador[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]. Mais [setfontcol blue]fais
gaffe aux Patapic[setfontcol black], mon pote![setfontcol none][newpage]
Je te préviens, man, c'est pas un
jeu pour les débutants. T'es sûr
de vouloir essayer?
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Willkommen bei einem weiteren Spiel
mit [setfontcol red]dem Wanderaffen[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Hast du Lust auf etwas Neues? Ganz
einfach: [setfontcol red]Eislaufen [setfontcol none]und [setfontcol blue]Gegner treffen[setfontcol none][setfontcol black].[setfontcol none][newpage]
Nimm dich vor den Stacheln in Acht.
Machst du mit?
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Sei entrato nel territorio della
[setfontcol red]Scimmia Bighellona[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Sei pronto per qualcosa di nuovo?
[setfontcol black]Pattina [setfontcol none]e [setfontcol red]colpisci i palloncini[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Ma [setfontcol blue]attenzione a quelli con le spine[setfontcol none]!
Allora, vuoi provare?
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Vaya, vaya... Parece que has llegado
a los dominios de[setfontcol red] Molonio[setfontcol none].[newpage]
¿Estás listo para probar lo último de
lo último? Tendrás que [setfontcol red]patinar[setfontcol none] y
[setfontcol red]llevarte por delante a los enemigos[setfontcol none][setfontcol black].[setfontcol none][newpage]
Por cierto, [setfontcol blue]cuidado con los de las
púas[setfontcol none]... ¿Estás listo para el tema?
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
よく<ruby>来<rt>き</rt></ruby>たな!
おれさまは、 [setfontcol red]さすらいの<ruby>遊<rt>あそ</rt></ruby>び<ruby>人<rt>にん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none][newpage]
<ruby>略<rt>りゃく</rt></ruby>して [setfontcol red]サスラー[setfontcol none]と<ruby>呼<rt>よ</rt></ruby>んでもいいぞ!
それはさておき、 [setfontcol blue]おれさまのゲーム[setfontcol none]を<ruby>遊<rt>あそ</rt></ruby>ぶのだ[newpage]
スイーッと <ruby>滑<rt>すべ</rt></ruby>って [setfontcol red]モグポン[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][setfontcol red]を<ruby>体当<rt>たいあ</rt></ruby>たり[setfontcol black]で[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]<ruby>倒<rt>たお</rt></ruby>せ![setfontcol red][setfontcol blue]
[setfontcol black]しかし、 [setfontcol blue]トゲポンには<ruby>要注意<rt>ようちゅうい</rt></ruby>[setfontcol black]なのだ![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][newpage]
…<ruby>用意<rt>ようい</rt></ruby>はいいか?
さあ! [setfontcol blue]おれさまのゲーム[setfontcol none]をとくと<ruby>味<rt>あじ</rt></ruby>わうがいい!

Por cierto, hay que tener [setfontcol blue]cuidado con

ScoreAttackMan000_Flow002.EuDutch:
Oh, really?! Well, I'm gonna let you
go, but just know that when you're
ready, [setfontcol red]The Chimp[setfontcol none] will be waiting.
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow002.EuEnglish:
Oh, really?! Well, I'm gonna let you
go, but just know that when you're
ready, [setfontcol red]The Chimp[setfontcol none] will be waiting.
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow002.EuFrench:
Hein?! Bah, t'as de la veine, je suis
bien luné aujourd'hui, man, alors je
te laisse filer sans rien dire.[newpage]
Mais promets-moi de revenir un
de ces quatre relever mon défi!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow002.EuGerman:
Grmpf! Nun, ich bin heute guter
Dinge, daher lass ich dich dieses
Mal in Frieden weiterziehen.[newpage]
Aber komm wieder und fordere den
[setfontcol red]Wanderaffen[setfontcol none] heraus! Nicht vergessen!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow002.EuItalian:
Hmmm... Ti va bene! Oggi sono di buon
umore, perciò per stavolta ti lascerò
stare! Ma il [setfontcol red]Bighellone [setfontcol none]è sempre qui!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow002.EuSpanish:
Me pillas de buen humor, colega, 
así que esta vez no me enfadaré.[newpage]
¡Pero prométeme que te pasarás por
aquí en otra ocasión!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow002.JpJapanese:
ぬなっ! まぁ <ruby>今日<rt>きょう</rt></ruby>は<ruby>気分<rt>きぶん</rt></ruby>がいいから<ruby>許<rt>ゆる</rt></ruby>してやる!
でも、 また[setfontcol red]チャレンジ[setfontcol none][setfontcol red][setfontcol black]しろ[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]よな[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]! [wait 15]わかったな!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow002.UsEnglish:
Oh, really?! Well, I'm gonna let you
go, but just know that when you're
ready, [setfontcol red]The Chimp[setfontcol none] will be waiting.
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow002.UsFrench:
Sérieux?! Bon, je te laisse t'en tirer
pour cette fois, mais tu ne sais pas
ce que tu manques, bonhomme...
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow002.UsSpanish:
