Kinopio000.EuDutch:
According to my investigation, you
must lure Glamdozer in close, then...
[setfontcol blue]KER-THWOMP[setfontcol none]! Know what I mean?
Kinopio000.EuEnglish:
According to my investigation, you
must lure Glamdozer in close, then...
[setfontcol blue]KER-THWOMP[setfontcol none]! Know what I mean?
Kinopio000.EuFrench:
D'après mes observations, il faut
l'attirer sur une trappe puis....
[setfontcol blue]CHAAARGER[setfontcol none]! C'est clair, non?
Kinopio000.EuGerman:
Ich habe herausgefunden, dass du sie
auf die andere Seite locken musst und
dann... [setfontcol blue]STA[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][setfontcol blue]-STA[setfontcol blue]MPF[setfontcol none]!!![wait 15] Verstehst du?
Kinopio000.EuItalian:
In base alle mie indagini, devi
[setfontcol blue]attirarla sopra quei fori[setfontcol none]. E poi...
[setfontcol blue]Patatan[setfontcol none]! Hai capito cosa voglio dire?
Kinopio000.EuSpanish:
Según mi investigación, primero
tienes que atraerla y luego...
¡¡[setfontcol blue]Catapún[setfontcol none]!!
Kinopio000.JpJapanese:
わたしの<ruby>調査結果<rt>ちょうさけっか</rt></ruby>によると・・・
[setfontcol blue]おびきよせてドスン[setfontcol none]! です
Kinopio000.UsEnglish:
According to my investigation, you
must lure Glamdozer in close, then...
[setfontcol blue]KER-THWOMP[setfontcol none]! Know what I mean?
Kinopio000.UsFrench:
D'après mes observations, il faut
attirer Dame Glamosaure sur une
trappe et... [setfontcol blue]BADA[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]BOUM[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio000.UsSpanish:
Según mi investigación, primero debes
atraer a la Reina Lunarcisa y luego...
¡¡[setfontcol blue]Catapún[setfontcol none]!! ¿Sabes cómo te digo?

What's this? Was this one of the little
fellow's friends?

What's this? Was this one of the little
fellow's friends?

Tiens, mais qui est-ce? Serait-ce

Wer ist das denn? Oh, vielleicht ein Freund

E questo? Somiglia all'altro!
Saranno amici?

¿Qué tenemos aquí? ¿Será uno
de los amigos del pequeñín?

What's this? Was this one of the little
fellow's friends?

StoryBook005.UsSpanish:
¿Qué tenemos aquí? ¿Será uno
de los amigos del pequeñín?

StoryBook013.EuDutch:
The Star Festival had just begun. Toads
everywhere were celebrating...
StoryBook013.EuEnglish:
The Star Festival had just begun. Toads
everywhere were celebrating...
StoryBook013.EuFrench:
C'était au début du festival des étoiles filantes,
le royaume Champignon était en liesse...
StoryBook013.EuGerman:
Das Sternenfest, das nur ein einziges Mal alle
100 Jahre stattfindet, hatte soeben begonnen...
StoryBook013.EuItalian:
Era l'inizio del Festival delle Stelle
e i Toad festeggiavano ovunque...
StoryBook013.EuSpanish:
El Festival de las Estrellas acababa de
comenzar y los Toads estaban celebrándolo.
StoryBook013.JpJapanese: <ruby>今日<rt>きょう</rt></ruby>は<ruby>百年<rt>ひゃくねん</rt></ruby>に<ruby>一度<rt>いちど</rt></ruby>の<ruby>星<rt>ほし</rt></ruby>くず<ruby>祭<rt>まつり</rt></ruby>の<ruby>日<rt>ひ</rt></ruby>・・・
StoryBook013.UsEnglish:
The Star Festival had just begun. Toads
everywhere were celebrating...
StoryBook013.UsFrench:
Le Festival des étoiles commençait à peine. Les
Toad célébraient avec joie ce féerique moment...
StoryBook013.UsSpanish:
El Festival de las Estrellas acababa de
comenzar y los Toads estaban celebrándolo.

StoryBook014.EuDutch: Star Bits rained down from the sky...
StoryBook014.EuEnglish: Star Bits rained down from the sky...
StoryBook014.EuFrench:
Des fragments d'étoile scintillant
de mille feux tombaient des cieux...
StoryBook014.EuGerman:
Tausende schimmernder Sternenteile fielen vom
Himmel und erfreuten die feiernden Toads...
StoryBook014.EuItalian: Migliaia di Astroschegge scendevano dal cielo...
StoryBook014.EuSpanish: Miles de trozos de estrella caían del cielo.
StoryBook014.JpJapanese: <ruby>空<rt>そら</rt></ruby>からきらきらスターピースが<ruby>降<rt>ふ</rt></ruby>りそそぎます
StoryBook014.UsEnglish: Star Bits rained down from the sky...
StoryBook014.UsFrench: De scintillants éclats d'étoile tombaient du ciel...
StoryBook014.UsSpanish: Miles de trozos de estrella caían del cielo...

Tico000_Flow001.EuDutch:
Thank you! It was starting to smell
mouldy in that cage...[newpage]
The [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol black]is [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]up ahead!
Tico000_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Thank you! It was starting to smell
mouldy in that cage...[newpage]
The [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol black]is [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]up ahead!
Tico000_Flow001.EuFrench:
Merci beaucoup pour ton aide! J'étais
en train de moisir dans cette cage...[newpage]
La [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol black]est droit devant[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]!
Tico000_Flow001.EuGerman:
Oh, vielen Dank dafür, dass du mich
befreit hast! Endlich hat jemand
meine Hilferufe erhört...[newpage]
Zum [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] Power-Stern
[setfontcol black]geht's hier lang[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]!
Tico000_Flow001.EuItalian:
Grazie per il tuo aiuto!
Cominciava a sentirsi odor di chiuso,
in quella gabbia![newpage]
La [setfontcol yellow]Superstella [icon PowerStar][setfontcol none][setfontcol yellow][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]è più avanti![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]
Tico000_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Muchas gracias por tu ayuda!
Empezaba a oler un poco
a humedad en esa jaula...[newpage]
¡La [icon PowerStar] está más adelante[setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]
Tico000_Flow001.JpJapanese:
<ruby>助<rt>たす</rt></ruby>かりました! ありがとう!
<ruby>牢屋<rt>ろうや</rt></ruby>の<ruby>中<rt>なか</rt></ruby>、 カビくさかったです…[newpage]
この<ruby>先<rt>さき</rt></ruby>に[setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar]パワースター[setfontcol none]があるはずです!
Tico000_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Thank you! It was starting to smell
moldy in that cage...[newpage]
The [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol black]is [setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none]up ahead!
Tico000_Flow001.UsFrench:
Merci beaucoup de m'avoir secouru!
Ça commençait à sentir le renfermé
là-dedans...[newpage]
La [icon PowerStar] est un peu plus loin!
Tico000_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡Muchas gracias por tu ayuda!
Empezaba a oler un poco a humedad
en esa jaula...[newpage]
¡La [icon PowerStar] está al frente[setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]

TrickRabbit000_Flow000.EuDutch:
Think you can [setfontcol red]catch[setfontcol none] me? I'd like to
see you try it! Boiyoing!
TrickRabbit000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Think you can [setfontcol red]catch[setfontcol none] me? I'd like to
see you try it! Boiyoing!
TrickRabbit000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Tu crois que tu peux [setfontcol red][setfontcol black]m'[setfontcol red]attraper[setfontcol none]?
Boïng!
TrickRabbit000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Denkst du wirklich, dass du mich
[setfontcol red]erwischen [setfontcol none]kannst? Hoppelhopp!
TrickRabbit000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Credi di riuscire a [setfontcol red]prendermi[setfontcol none]?
PION-PION?
TrickRabbit000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Te crees muy rápido, ¿eh?
¿A que no me [setfontcol red]pillas[setfontcol none]? ¡Boing, boing!
TrickRabbit000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
<ruby>追<rt>お</rt></ruby>いかけっこしよ!
オイラを [setfontcol red]つかまえる[setfontcol none]ことができるピョン?[newpage]
ココが[setfontcol blue] <ruby>氷<rt>こおり</rt></ruby>の<ruby>上<rt>うえ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]で [setfontcol red]スケート[setfontcol none]でもできない<ruby>限<rt>かぎ</rt></ruby>り
オイラはつかまらないピョン!
TrickRabbit000_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Think you can [setfontcol red]catch[setfontcol none] me? I'd like to
see you try it! Boiyoing!
TrickRabbit000_Flow000.UsFrench:
Tu crois pouvoir [setfontcol red]m'attraper[setfontcol none]? Haha!
Essaie toujours! BOÏ-YONG!
TrickRabbit000_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¿Crees poder [setfontcol red]alcanzarme[setfontcol none]? ¿Por qué 
no lo intentas? ¡BOOOING!

TrickRabbit000_Flow001.EuDutch:
OK, OK! You caught me! Here - take
[setfontcol black]this [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! Boiyoing! Boiyoing!
TrickRabbit000_Flow001.EuEnglish:
OK, OK! You caught me! Here - take
[setfontcol black]this [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! Boiyoing! Boiyoing!
TrickRabbit000_Flow001.EuFrench:
C'est bon, c'est bon, tu as gagné!
Tiens, prends-la, [setfontcol yellow]ta [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! Boïng!
TrickRabbit000_Flow001.EuGerman:
In Ordnung, ich gebe auf! Hier, dieser
[icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern[setfontcol none] ist deiner! Hoppelhopp!
TrickRabbit000_Flow001.EuItalian:
OK! Mi arrendo! Tieni! Puoi avere
la [setfontcol yellow]Superstella[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar]! PION-PION!
TrickRabbit000_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Arf, me has pillado! Vale, eres más
rápido que yo. ¡Toma esta [icon PowerStar]! ¡Boing!
TrickRabbit000_Flow001.JpJapanese:
まいった!
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]コレ[setfontcol none] あげるピョーン!
TrickRabbit000_Flow001.UsEnglish:
OK, OK! You caught me! Here--take
[setfontcol yellow][setfontcol black]this[setfontcol yellow] [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]! Boiyoing! Boiyoing!
TrickRabbit000_Flow001.UsFrench:
D'accord, d'accord, j'abandonne!
Tiens, une [icon PowerStar] pour te récompenser!
Boï-ying!
TrickRabbit000_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡Me rindo! ¡Ten, puedes quedarte con
esta [icon PowerStar]! ¡BOOOING!

TrickRabbit000_Flow002.EuDutch:
I won't make it so easy for you
next time! Boi...[wait 30]yoing...
TrickRabbit000_Flow002.EuEnglish:
I won't make it so easy for you
next time! Boi...[wait 30]yoing...
TrickRabbit000_Flow002.EuFrench:
Je te préviens, la prochaine fois,
ce sera beaucoup plus dur! Boïng!
TrickRabbit000_Flow002.EuGerman:
Das nächste Mal werde ich es dir
nicht so leicht machen!
TrickRabbit000_Flow002.EuItalian:
La prossima volta non sarà così
semplice! PION-PION!
TrickRabbit000_Flow002.EuSpanish:
¡La próxima vez será más difícil,
ya lo verás!
TrickRabbit000_Flow002.JpJapanese: <ruby>次<rt>つぎ</rt></ruby>は、 こうは いかないピョン!
TrickRabbit000_Flow002.UsEnglish:
I won't make it so easy for you
next time! Boi...[wait 30]yoing...
TrickRabbit000_Flow002.UsFrench:
La prochaine fois, je ne te laisserai
pas gagner! Boï-ying...
TrickRabbit000_Flow002.UsSpanish:
¡La próxima vez no será tan fácil!
¡BOOO[wait 30]ING!

ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuDutch:
Look who decided to show up!
[wait 15]Step into the house of [setfontcol red]The Chimp[setfontcol none]![newpage]
You ready for something new?[wait 15]
Just [setfontcol red]roll[setfontcol none] over the [setfontcol blue]enemies up ahead[setfontcol none]!
So, you game or what?

Look who decided to show up!

So, you game or what?
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Bienvenue dans mon royaume, man!
T'es prêt à jouer à mon nouveau jeu?[newpage]
Bon, voilà le deal: pour marquer des
points, faut [setfontcol red]rouler [setfontcol none]sur [setfontcol blue]les ennemis[setfontcol none]!
Alors, ça te branche?
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Willkommen! Ich bin der spielende
[setfontcol red]Wanderaffe[setfontcol none]! Kennen wir uns nicht?[newpage]
Wie dem auch sei, bist du bereit
für mein neuestes Spiel?[newpage]
Du verwandelst dich in einen
[setfontcol red]r[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]ollenden Felsen[setfontcol none] und zerbröselst
so [setfontcol blue]die Holzköpfe dieser Kegelbahn[setfontcol none]!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Benvenuto! Io sono la [setfontcol red]Scimmia
Bighellona[setfontcol none]! Patti chiari e amicizia
lunga: non mi chiamo [setfontcol red]Testa di Banana[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Dovrai trasformarti in una [setfontcol red]roccia
[setfontcol none]e cercare di [setfontcol blue]abbattere i birilli[setfontcol none]!
Allora, sei pronto per la nuova sfida?
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Vaya, vaya... Parece que has llegado
a los dominios de[setfontcol red] Molonio[setfontcol none]. En fin,
¿estás listo para algo nuevo?[newpage]
En este juego tendrás que [setfontcol red]rodar [setfontcol none]y
derribar a los [setfontcol blue]enemigos que hay
más adelante[setfontcol none].
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
よく<ruby>来<rt>き</rt></ruby>たのだ!
おれさまは、 [setfontcol red]さすらいの<ruby>遊<rt>あそ</rt></ruby>び<ruby>人<rt>にん</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none][newpage]
けっして[setfontcol red]バナナアタマ[setfontcol none]と
<ruby>呼<rt>よ</rt></ruby>んではいけないのだ![newpage]
いいか?
オマエに [setfontcol blue]おれさまの[setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]ゲーム[setfontcol black]を<ruby>遊<rt>あそ</rt></ruby>んでもらうぞ[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]![newpage]
ここから、 オマエ<ruby>自身<rt>じしん</rt></ruby>が[setfontcol red]ゴロ<ruby>岩<rt>いわ</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]になり [setfontcol blue]
この<ruby>先<rt>さき</rt></ruby>に<ruby>待<rt>ま</rt></ruby>ち<ruby>受<rt>う</rt></ruby>ける<ruby>敵<rt>てき</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]をできるだけ<ruby>倒<rt>たお</rt></ruby>すのだ!

Look who decided to show up!
[wait 15]Step into the house of [setfontcol red]The Chimp[setfontcol none]![newpage]
You ready for something new?[wait 15]
Just [setfontcol red]roll[setfontcol none] over the [setfontcol blue]enemies up ahead[setfontcol none]!

ScoreAttackMan000_Flow000.UsFrench:
Bienvenue dans le repaire de [setfontcol red]Billy
Banane[setfontcol none], bonhomme! Prêt à essayer
quelque chose de nouveau?[newpage]
Dans ce jeu, t[setfontcol black]u dois te transformer
en [setfontcol red]pierre roulante [setfontcol black][setfontcol none]et renverser les
[setfontcol blue]ennemis devant toi[setfontcol none]. Facile, non?

Vaya, vaya... Parece que has llegado
a los dominios de[setfontcol red] Bananacho[setfontcol none]. En fin,
¿estás listo para algo nuevo?[newpage]

ScoreAttackMan000_Flow001.EuDutch:
What?! But I [setfontcol blue]spent so much time
[setfontcol none]working on this! C'MON!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow001.EuEnglish:
What?! But I [setfontcol blue]spent so much time
[setfontcol none]working on this! C'MON!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow001.EuFrench:
Hein?! Me fais pas ça, man! Je me
suis préparé [setfontcol blue]toute ma vie [setfontcol none]pour ce
moment, mon pote!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow001.EuGerman:
Wie bitte? Dieses Ding zu bauen,
hat [setfontcol blue]eine Ewigkeit [setfontcol none]gedauert!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow001.EuItalian:
Cosa?! Ho [setfontcol blue]lavorato così tanto [setfontcol none]per
crearlo!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Jo, si supieras el [setfontcol blue]trabajo[setfontcol none] que me ha
costado montar este chiringuito...
¡No me dejes tirado, colega!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow001.JpJapanese:
なにぃ? このときのために おれさまが
<ruby>一ヶ月<rt>いっかげつ</rt></ruby> ここで[setfontcol blue]<ruby>工事<rt>こうじ</rt></ruby>を<ruby>続<rt>つづ</rt></ruby>けた[setfontcol black]というのに[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]…
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow001.UsEnglish:
What?! But I spent so much time
working on this! C'MON!
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow001.UsFrench:
Sérieux?! Mais... J'ai passé beaucoup
de temps à créer ce jeu, bonhomme!
C'est pas très gentil de ta part...
ScoreAttackMan000_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Jo, si supieras el trabajo que me ha
costado montar este chiringuito...

Rosetta000.EuGerman:
Du bist also derjenige, der alle
verstreuten Sterne eingesammelt hat...[newpage]
Ich möchte dir von ganzem Herzen
dafür danken.[wait 15] Deine Taten werden die
Geschichte des Kosmos neu schreiben.[newpage]
Möge der Glanz der Sterne
für ewig auf dich scheinen!
Rosetta000.EuItalian:
[Mario/Luigi], allora siete stati voi ad aver
riportato la luce nell'universo
raccogliendo tutte quelle stelle...[newpage]
Voglio ringraziarvi dal profondo del
cuore... [wait 15]Le vostre azioni vivranno nella
memoria del cosmo... per l'eternità.[newpage]
[wait 15]Che le stelle brillino sempre su di voi.
Rosetta000.EuSpanish:
Así que fuiste tú quien reunió
todas las estrellas que estaban
dispersas por el universo, [Mario/Luigi]...[newpage]
Te quiero dar las gracias de todo
corazón. [wait 15]Tus hazañas se recordarán
por todo el cosmos.[newpage]
Que la luz de las estrellas
ilumine tu camino...
Rosetta000.JpJapanese:
これで<ruby>散<rt>ち</rt></ruby>らばったパワースターが
<ruby>全<rt>すべ</rt></ruby>て<ruby>集<rt>つど</rt></ruby>うのですね・・・[newpage]
[Mario/Luigi]・・・・・・
<ruby>本当<rt>ほんとう</rt></ruby>に、[wait 15] <ruby>本当<rt>ほんとう</rt></ruby>にお<ruby>疲<rt>つか</rt></ruby>れ<ruby>様<rt>さま</rt></ruby>でした[newpage]
あなたの<ruby>名<rt>な</rt></ruby>は
<ruby>星々<rt>ほしぼし</rt></ruby>の<ruby>記憶<rt>きおく</rt></ruby>に<ruby>紡<rt>つむ</rt></ruby>がれていくことでしょう[newpage]
[wait 15]<ruby>世界<rt>せかい</rt></ruby>が <ruby>善<rt>よ</rt></ruby>き<ruby>星<rt>ほし</rt></ruby>くずで<ruby>満<rt>み</rt></ruby>ち<ruby>続<rt>つづ</rt></ruby>けますように・・・
Rosetta000.UsEnglish:
[Mario/Luigi]... So you were the one who
collected all of the scattered stars...[newpage]
I want to thank you...[wait 15] Your deeds
will live on in the memory of the
cosmos...[newpage]
[wait 15]May the stars shine down on you...
Rosetta000.UsFrench:
[Mario/Luigi]... C'est donc toi le héros qui a
retrouvé les étoiles éparpillées dans
l'immensité du cosmos.[newpage]
Merci... [wait 15]Ton exploit sera à jamais
gravé dans la mémoire de l'univers...[newpage]
[wait 15]Que la poussière d'étoiles te protège.
Rosetta000.UsSpanish:
[Mario/Luigi]... Así que fuiste tú quien
restauró la luz del universo...[newpage]
Te quiero agradecer de todo corazón[wait 15]
que salvaras a todas las estrellas que
estaban dispersadas por el universo.[newpage]
¡Que la luz de las estrellas
ilumine tu camino!

Dreamer_Flow000.EuDutch:
Here's a tip! Did you know you can
get to the end without even [setfontcol red]spinning[setfontcol none]?
Want to see how?
Dreamer_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Here's a tip! Did you know you can
get to the end without even [setfontcol red]spinning[setfontcol none]?
Want to see how?
Dreamer_Flow000.EuFrench:
Astuce![wait 30] Tu peux jouer [setfontcol red]sans avoir
besoin de tournoyer une seule fois[setfontcol none]!
Tu veux voir comment on fait?
Dreamer_Flow000.EuGerman:
Kleiner Tipp: Weißt du, dass man
hier durchkommen kann, ohne zu
[setfontcol red]drehen[setfontcol none]? Ich zeig's dir gerne!
Dreamer_Flow000.EuItalian:
Indizio! Sai che puoi anche giocare
[setfontcol red]senza fare piroette[setfontcol none]? Vuoi vedere
come?
Dreamer_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Un consejillo televisado: puedes
jugar sin hacer [setfontcol red]ni un solo [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]Giro[setfontcol none].
¿Te lo enseño?
Dreamer_Flow000.JpJapanese:
ヒント! [setfontcol red]スピンを<ruby>使<rt>つか</rt></ruby>わず [setfontcol none]こんなプレイも?!
どんな<ruby>感<rt>かん</rt></ruby>じか <ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>てみますか?
Dreamer_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Here's a tip! Did you know you can
get to the end without even [setfontcol red]spinning[setfontcol none]?
Want to see how?
Dreamer_Flow000.UsFrench:
Astuce! Saviez-vous que vous pouviez
atteindre l'étoile sans [setfontcol red]tourbillonner
[setfontcol none]une seule fois?![newpage]
Voulez-vous voir comment faire?
Dreamer_Flow000.UsSpanish:
Un teleconsejo: puedes jugar
sin hacer [setfontcol red]ni un solo [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]Giro[setfontcol none].
¿Te enseño cómo?

Dreamer_Flow002.EuGerman:
Na gut, das schaffst
du auch allein!
Dreamer_Flow002.JpJapanese: それじゃ、 がんばって!

ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow015.EuDutch:
Really? I heard you were the game
player to beat. C'mon - [setfontcol red]try it out[setfontcol none]!
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow015.EuEnglish:
Really? I heard you were the game
player to beat. C'mon - [setfontcol red]try it out[setfontcol none]!
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow015.EuFrench:
T'es sûr de toi? Un jeu fun, c'est
du pur bonheur pour l'esprit, man...
Allez, [setfontcol red]essaie[setfontcol none]!
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow015.EuGerman:
Huch... Meine Ohren spielen verrückt!
Ich habe gehört, du wolltest nicht...
Aber du meintest [setfontcol red]das Gegenteil[setfontcol none], oder?
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow015.EuItalian:
Eh? Devo avere le orecchie un po'
sporche... Mi è sembrato di sentire
no, ma volevi dire [setfontcol red]sì[setfontcol none], vero???
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow015.EuSpanish:
¿En serio? Jo, pensaba que eras todo
un experto en esto de los juegos... 
¡Venga, [setfontcol red]inténtalo[setfontcol none]!
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow015.JpJapanese:
んー? おれさまの<ruby>耳<rt>みみ</rt></ruby>がおかしいのか…
やらない、 と<ruby>聞<rt>き</rt></ruby>こえたが… [wait 15][setfontcol red]やる[setfontcol none]よな?
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow015.UsEnglish:
Really? I heard you were the game
player to beat. C'mon--try it out!
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow015.UsFrench:
Sérieux? J'ai entendu dire que tu
étais le concurrent à battre. Allez,
essaie, au moins!
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow015.UsSpanish:
¿En serio? Huy, pensaba que eras
todo un experto en esto de los
juegos... ¡Venga, [setfontcol red]inténtalo[setfontcol none]!

ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow016.EuDutch:
Oh, come on! I promise I won't laugh...[wait 15]
Too loudly, anyway.
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow016.EuEnglish:
Oh, come on! I promise I won't laugh...[wait 15]
Too loudly, anyway.
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow016.EuFrench:
Promis, man, je vais pas rigoler...[wait 15]
Enfin, je vais pas rigoler trop fort.
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow016.EuGerman:
Komm schon! Ich lache auch nicht... 
Jedenfalls nicht viel! Versprochen!
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow016.EuItalian:
Oh, dai! Ti prometto che non riderò![wait 15]
O cercherò di farlo fra me e me...
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow016.EuSpanish:
Bien, yo me quedaré por aquí. 
Intentaré no partirme mucho
de la risa... ¿Qué me dices?
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow016.JpJapanese:
きっと、 そういうと<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>っていたぞ!
…おれさまが、 [setfontcol red]<ruby>無視<rt>むし</rt></ruby>する[setfontcol black]と[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>ってるだろ?[newpage]
ハッハッハ [setfontcol red]<ruby>大当<rt>おおあ</rt></ruby>たり[setfontcol black]なのだ[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]!
おれさまのゲームを[setfontcol blue]プレイする[setfontcol black]のだ[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]!
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow016.UsEnglish:
Oh, come on! I promise I won't laugh...[wait 15]
Too loudly, anyway.
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow016.UsFrench:
Oh, allez! Je promets que je ne vais
pas rire... [wait 15]Pas trop fort, en tout cas.
ScoreAttackMan_ScoreAttack_Flow016.UsSpanish:
¡Anímate! Es más, me quedaré por
aquí e intentaré no partirme mucho
de la risa...[wait 15] ¿Qué me dices?

Kinopio000_Flow000.EuDutch:
GASP! [wait 15]Oh, thank you-- AHH! [Mario/Luigi]![newpage]
[wait 15]I, uh...[wait 15]was taking a quick nap and...[newpage]
Oh, who am I kidding?![wait 15] I grabbed
a [icon PowerStar], but I fell and got trapped inside
this chest! [wait 15]It was so stuffy in there![newpage]
Thank you for saving me! Why don't
you take this [icon PowerStar]! [wait 15]Just please don't
tell the other Toads about this!
Kinopio000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
GASP! [wait 15]Oh, thank you-- AHH! [Mario/Luigi]![newpage]
[wait 15]I, uh...[wait 15]was taking a quick nap and...[newpage]
Oh, who am I kidding?![wait 15] I grabbed
a [icon PowerStar], but I fell and got trapped inside
this chest! [wait 15]It was so stuffy in there![newpage]
Thank you for saving me! Why don't
you take this [icon PowerStar]! [wait 15]Just please don't
tell the other Toads about this!
Kinopio000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Pfiou![wait 15] Ah, c'est toi, [Mario/Luigi]!
Figure-toi que je faisais juste
une petite sieste...[newpage]
Oh, et puis zut, qui va croire un
mensonge aussi gros?[newpage]
J'essayais d'attraper cette [icon PowerStar], mais
je suis tombé et le coffre s'est
refermé! [wait 15]J'allais étouffer là-dedans![newpage]
Merci de m'avoir libéré! Tu peux
prendre cette [icon PowerStar],[wait 15] mais promets-moi
de ne rien dire aux autres!
Kinopio000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Uiuiuiui! Wie unbequem und stickig...
Oh... [Mario/Luigi], ich danke dir![newpage]
Stell dir vor: Ich hatte den [icon PowerStar] gerade
erwischt, da verlor ich die Balance
und der Deckel schloss sich über mir![newpage]
Aber sieh nur! Der [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern[setfontcol none],
den ich meinte! Du darfst ihn haben,
weil du mich gerettet hast!
Kinopio000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Oh! Grazie, [Mario/Luigi]!
Me la sono vista brutta![newpage]
Volevo prendere una [setfontcol yellow]Superstella[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar]
e sono caduto rimanendo intrappolato
nel forziere! Che buio lì dentro![newpage]
Ad ogni modo, ecco la [setfontcol yellow]Superstella[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar]
di cui ti parlavo! È tutta tua!
Kinopio000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡¡Arf!! [wait 15]¡Ay, gracias, [Mario/Luigi]!
Qué mal rato he pasado...[newpage]
Yo... [wait 15]Esto... Estaba echando una
siestecilla dentro del cofre y...[wait 15]
¡¿A quién quiero engañar?![newpage]
Iba a coger la [icon PowerStar]... ¡cuando me caí en
el cofre y me quedé atrapado! Toma,
toda tuya. [setfontsize small]Pero no se lo cuentes a nadie...
Kinopio000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
ぷっは～! <ruby>苦<rt>くる</rt></ruby>しかった～～!
・・・・・・・・・・・・・・・あ～～! [Mario/Luigi]さん![newpage]
いやぁ、 [icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol none]を<ruby>取<rt>と</rt></ruby>ろうとしたら
<ruby>宝箱<rt>たからばこ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>中<rt>なか</rt></ruby>に<ruby>落<rt>お</rt></ruby>ちちゃって、 <ruby>大変<rt>たいへん</rt></ruby>でしたよ～![newpage]
というわけで、 ワタシがゲットした
[icon PowerStar][setfontcol yellow]パワースター[setfontcol none] <ruby>持<rt>も</rt></ruby>ってってください!
Kinopio000_Flow000.UsEnglish:
GASP! [wait 15]Oh, thank you--AHH! [Mario/Luigi]![newpage]
[wait 15]I, uh...[wait 15]was taking a quick nap and...[newpage]
Oh, who am I kidding?![wait 15] I grabbed
a [icon PowerStar], but I fell and got trapped inside
that chest! [wait 15]It was so stuffy in there![newpage]
Thank you for saving me! Why don't
you take this [icon PowerStar]! [wait 15]Just please don't
tell the other Toads about this!
Kinopio000_Flow000.UsFrench:
OUF![wait 15] Oh, merci, je... AHH! M. [Mario/Luigi]![newpage]
[wait 15]Heu...[wait 15] C'est que...[wait 15] Je... Heu...[wait 15] J'étais
en train de faire une sieste quand...[newpage]
Bah, je suis le pire menteur de la
planète! Bon, j'avoue, j'ai essayé
d'attraper une [icon PowerStar]...[newpage]
Mais je suis tombé et le coffre s'est
refermé sur moi![wait 15] C'est fou comme
c'est étroit, un coffre...[newpage]
Merci de m'avoir sauvé! Tiens, prends
la [icon PowerStar]! [wait 15]Mais promets-moi de ne pas le
dire aux autres Toad...
Kinopio000_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡¡Arf!! [wait 15]¡Ay, gracias, [Mario/Luigi]!
Qué mal rato he pasado...[newpage]
Yo... [wait 15]Este... Estaba echando una
siestecilla dentro del cofre y...[wait 15]
¡¿A quién quiero engañar?![newpage]
Iba a tomar la [icon PowerStar]... ¡cuando me caí en
el cofre y me quedé atrapado! Toma,
toda tuya. [setfontsize small]Pero no se lo cuentes a nadie...

Kinopio000.EuDutch:
[setfontsize large]Oh! [setfontsize normal][Mario/Luigi]?! I didn't even see you
there! I've been, um...[wait 15]working hard
on this mission to help you find [icon PowerStar]!
Kinopio000.EuEnglish:
[setfontsize large]Oh! [setfontsize normal][Mario/Luigi]?! I didn't even see you
there! I've been, um...[wait 15]working hard
on this mission to help you find [icon PowerStar]!
Kinopio000.EuFrench:
[setfontsize large]Ah![setfontsize normal] [Mario/Luigi]?! Je ne t'ai pas vu
arriver! J'étais en train de... heu...
travailler dur pour trouver la [icon PowerStar]!
Kinopio000.EuGerman:
[setfontsize large]Oha! Bist du es?
[setfontsize normal]Mein Freund [Mario/Luigi]!
Kinopio000.EuItalian:
Oh! [Mario/Luigi]?! Non ti avevo neanche
visto! Sono... ehm... impegnatissimo a
cercare [setfontcol yellow]Superstelle [setfontcol none][icon PowerStar]!
Kinopio000.EuSpanish:
[setfontsize large]¿Cómo? [setfontsize normal]¡Pero si es [Mario/Luigi]!
No me había dado cuenta... Bueno,
¡yo también te ayudo a buscar [icon PowerStar]!
Kinopio000.UsEnglish:
[setfontsize large]Oh! [setfontsize normal][Mario/Luigi]?! I didn't even see you
there! I've been, um...[wait 15]working hard
on this mission to help you find [icon PowerStar]!
Kinopio000.UsFrench:
[setfontsize large]Oh! [setfontsize normal]M. [Mario/Luigi]! Heu... Je ne t'avais
pas vu... Moi? Des vacances? Non...
Je... J'étudie la région!
Kinopio000.UsSpanish:
[setfontsize large]¿Cómo? [setfontsize normal]¡Pero si es [Mario/Luigi]!
No me había dado cuenta... Bueno,
¡yo también te ayudo a buscar [icon PowerStar]!

Kinopio000_Flow000.EuDutch:
Some[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black] [setfontcol blue]holiday[setfontcol black]! [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]I can't go swimming
because everything is frozen! [setfontsize small]Grrr...[setfontsize normal]
Kinopio000_Flow000.EuEnglish:
Some[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black] [setfontcol blue]holiday[setfontcol black]! [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]I can't go swimming
because everything is frozen! [setfontsize small]Grrr...[setfontsize normal]
Kinopio000_Flow000.EuFrench:
Misère...[wait 15] J'étais venu ici pour faire un
peu de [setfontcol blue]natation[setfontcol none][setfontcol black], mais [setfontcol none]sans eau, ça va
être dur...
Kinopio000_Flow000.EuGerman:
Ooooh... [wait 15]Ich kam für einen[setfontcol blue] Urlaub
[setfontcol black]hierher, bin aber [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]enttäuscht.[wait 15] Weit und
breit kein [setfontcol red]Wasser [setfontcol none]zum Planschen...
Kinopio000_Flow000.EuItalian:
Ahhh... [wait 15]Sono venuto qua in [setfontcol blue]vacanza[setfontcol none][setfontcol black],
ma è tutto ghiacciato e non si può
[setfontcol none]nuotare... [setfontsize small]Che rabbia...
Kinopio000_Flow000.EuSpanish:
Jooo...[wait 15] Vaya birria de [setfontcol blue]vacaciones[setfontcol black]...
Yo que venía a nadar, ¡y resulta
que todo está helado![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Kinopio000_Flow000.JpJapanese:
あーぁ・・・ [wait 15]せっかく[setfontcol blue]バカンスにきた[setfontcol black]のに[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
<ruby>凍<rt>こお</rt></ruby>って<ruby>泳<rt>およ</rt></ruby>げないなんて、 ついてないなぁ･･･
Kinopio000_Flow000.UsEnglish:
Some[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black] [setfontcol blue]vacation[setfontcol black]! [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]I can't go swimming
because everything is frozen! [setfontsize small]Grrr...[setfontsize normal]
Kinopio000_Flow000.UsFrench:
Bouuu... [wait 15]Je suis venu ici pour prendre
des [setfontcol blue]vacances[setfontcol black], mais je ne peux même
pas faire de la plongée. C'est glacé![setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
Kinopio000_Flow000.UsSpanish:
¡Menudas [setfontcol blue]vacaciones[setfontcol none]! No puedo nadar
porque todo está helado... [setfontsize small]Grrr...[setfontsize normal]

Kinopio000_Flow001.EuGerman: Siehst du den [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern [setfontcol none]dort?
Kinopio000_Flow001.EuItalian:
Laggiù! Vedi quella
[setfontcol yellow]Superstella[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar]?

Kinopio000_Flow002.EuDutch:
OH, LOOK! There's a [icon PowerStar] over there![wait 30]
Yep, I knew it all along! [setfontsize small]Heheh...[setfontsize normal]
Kinopio000_Flow002.EuEnglish:
OH, LOOK! There's a [icon PowerStar] over there![wait 30]
Yep, I knew it all along! [setfontsize small]Heheh...[setfontsize normal]
Kinopio000_Flow002.EuFrench:
Tu as vu, là-bas? Il y a une [icon PowerStar]![wait 30] Je le
savais depuis le début![setfontsize small] Hé hé hé...
Kinopio000_Flow002.EuGerman:
Hast du das gesehen? Dort drüben
ist ein [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power-Stern[setfontcol none]!
Kinopio000_Flow002.EuItalian: Guarda! C'è una [setfontcol red]Superstella[setfontcol none] [icon PowerStar] laggiù!
Kinopio000_Flow002.EuSpanish:
¿No ves la [icon PowerStar]?[wait 30] ¡Si es que lo sabía!
[setfontsize small]¡Je, je, je![setfontsize normal]
Kinopio000_Flow002.JpJapanese:
ほらほら!
<ruby>向<rt>む</rt></ruby>こうに[icon PowerStar][setfontcol red]パワースター[setfontcol none]がありますよッ!
Kinopio000_Flow002.UsEnglish:
OH, LOOK! There's a [icon PowerStar] over there![wait 30]
Yep, I knew it all along! [setfontsize small]Heheh...[setfontsize normal]
Kinopio000_Flow002.UsFrench:
OH! REGARDE! Il y a une [icon PowerStar] là-bas![wait 30]
Hahaha... haha... Je le savais depuis le
début, évidemment. [setfontsize small]Ahem...
Kinopio000_Flow002.UsSpanish:
¡OH, MIRA! ¡Hay una [icon PowerStar] por allí![wait 30]
¡Sí! ¡Lo sabía! [setfontsize small]¡Je, je, je![setfontsize normal]

Tico000_Flow001.EuDutch:
Whew! [wait 15]Thanks! It was more humid
[setfontcol blue]in there[setfontcol none] than you'd think.
Tico000_Flow001.EuEnglish:
Whew! [wait 15]Thanks! It was more humid
[setfontcol blue]in there[setfontcol none] than you'd think.
Tico000_Flow001.EuFrench: Ouf![wait 15] C'était assez humide [setfontcol blue]là-dedans[setfontcol none]!
Tico000_Flow001.EuGerman:
Puuh! [wait 15][setfontcol blue]Dort drinnen [setfontcol none]war es feuchter,
als du dir vorstellen kannst!
Tico000_Flow001.EuItalian:
Fiùùù! [wait 15][setfontcol blue]Là dentro [setfontcol none]faceva un caldo!
Non riuscivo più a respirare!
Tico000_Flow001.EuSpanish:
¡Fiu! [wait 15][setfontcol black][setfontcol blue]Allí dentro [setfontcol black]había [setfontcol none]más humedad
de la que te imaginas...
Tico000_Flow001.JpJapanese:
ふーー・・・ [wait 15]<ruby>意外<rt>いがい</rt></ruby>と [setfontcol blue]あの<ruby>中<rt>なか</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none]って
<ruby>蒸<rt>む</rt></ruby>し<ruby>暑<rt>あつ</rt></ruby>いし <ruby>息苦<rt>いきぐる</rt></ruby>しかったんですよ～
Tico000_Flow001.UsEnglish:
Whew! [wait 15]Thanks! It was more humid
in there than you'd think.
Tico000_Flow001.UsFrench:
Fiou! [wait 15]Merci! C'était étouffant dans
cette bulle de verre!
Tico000_Flow001.UsSpanish:
¡Fiu! [wait 15][setfontcol blue]Allí dentro [setfontcol none]hay más humedad
de lo que te imaginas...

StoryBook_KoopaCastle000.EuDutch: [playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO1]"All right! Time for the grand finale, Captain!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle000.EuEnglish: [playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO1]"All right! Time for the grand finale, Captain!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle000.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO1]"Matelot, l'heure de l'épreuve
finale est arrivée!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle000.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO1]„Gut! Es ist an der Zeit für
das große Finale, Steuermann!“
StoryBook_KoopaCastle000.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO1]E va bene! È giunto il momento del gran finale,
Comandante!
StoryBook_KoopaCastle000.EuSpanish: [playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO1]¡Estupendo! ¡Llegó la hora del gran final!
StoryBook_KoopaCastle000.JpJapanese: [playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO1]「さ! <ruby>大詰<rt>おおづ</rt></ruby>めだよ <ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>!!」
StoryBook_KoopaCastle000.UsEnglish: [playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO1]"All right! Time for the grand finale, Captain!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle000.UsFrench: [playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO1]« C'est l'heure du combat final, capitaine! »
StoryBook_KoopaCastle000.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO1]"¡Muy bien, jefe! ¡Es hora de cerrar con 
broche de oro!"

StoryBook_KoopaCastle001.EuFrench: [playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO2]"Quelque part dans ce lieu sordide..."
StoryBook_KoopaCastle001.UsFrench: [playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO2]« Quelque part dans cette forteresse... »

StoryBook_KoopaCastle002.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO3]„Dort wartet deine Prinzessin
auf niemand anderen als dich!“
StoryBook_KoopaCastle002.EuItalian: [playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO3]La tua Principessa... ti sta aspettando!
StoryBook_KoopaCastle002.JpJapanese: [playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO3]「アンタの<ruby>大切<rt>たいせつ</rt></ruby>なヒトが <ruby>待<rt>ま</rt></ruby>っている!」

StoryBook_KoopaCastle003.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO4]"What a surprise... It's a comet!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO5]"It looks like Power Stars weren't the only
 things getting eaten up around here!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle003.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO4]"What a surprise... It's a comet!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO5]"It looks like Power Stars weren't the only
 things getting eaten up around here!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle003.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO4]"Ça alors... Mais c'est une comète!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO5]"Apparemment, il n'y a pas que
les [icon PowerStar] qui se font engloutir ici!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle003.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO4]„Was für eine Überraschung... Ein Komet!“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO5]„Sieht fast so aus, als ob er nicht nur
Power-Sterne verspeist hat!“
StoryBook_KoopaCastle003.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO4]Che sorpresa... È una Cometa![newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO5]Allora le Superstelle
non erano le sole cose che mangiasse!
StoryBook_KoopaCastle003.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO4]¡Menuda sorpresa! ¡Un cometa![newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO5]¡No solo se comía las Superestrellas!
StoryBook_KoopaCastle003.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO4]「<ruby>驚<rt>おどろ</rt></ruby>いたね・・・ あれは<ruby>彗星<rt>すいせい</rt></ruby>だ!」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO5]「<ruby>食<rt>く</rt></ruby>ってたのは パワースターだけじゃなかったんだよ」
StoryBook_KoopaCastle003.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO4]"What a surprise... It's a comet!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO5]"It looks like Power Stars weren't the only
 things getting eaten up around here!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle003.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO4]« Par les océans stellaires! C'est une comète! »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO5]« Il ne mangeait pas que des super étoiles! »
StoryBook_KoopaCastle003.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO4]"HUY... ¡Eso es un cometa!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO5]"¡Parece que las Superestrellas no eran
lo único en su dieta!"

StoryBook_KoopaCastle004.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO6]"It looks like [icon Bowser] wants to get even bigger!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO7]"You need to stop that [icon Bowser] monster before he
 devours everything in his path!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO8]"Get in there and show him what ya got!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle004.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO6]"It looks like [icon Bowser] wants to get even bigger!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO7]"You need to stop that [icon Bowser] monster before he
 devours everything in his path!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO8]"Get in there and show him what ya got!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle004.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO6]"[icon Bowser] a l'air de vouloir
grandir encore et encore!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO7]"Tu dois absolument arrêter ce pirate de [icon Bowser]
avant qu'il ne dévore tout sur son passage!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO8]"Va lui montrer que ce n'est pas
lui qui fait la loi dans le cosmos!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle004.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO6]„Auweia, der Unhold scheint noch mächtiger
werden zu wollen!“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO7]„Halte den Unhold auf, bevor er alles
in seinem Weg dem Erdboden gleichmacht!“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO8]„Also raus mit dir! Zeig, was du draufhast!“
StoryBook_KoopaCastle004.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO6]Sembra che quel tizio [icon Bowser] voglia diventare
ancora più grande![newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO7]Devi fermare quel mostro [icon Bowser] prima che divori
ogni cosa che incontra sul suo cammino![newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO8]Affrontalo e mostragli quanto vali!
StoryBook_KoopaCastle004.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO6]¡Parece que [icon Bowser] quiere seguir creciendo![newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO7]¡Tienes que pararle los pies a [icon Bowser] antes
de que arrase con todo lo que pille![newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO8]¡Venga, enséñale de qué pasta estás hecho!
StoryBook_KoopaCastle004.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO6]「[icon Bowser]ヤツはまだまだ デカくなるつもりだ!」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO7]「<ruby>食<rt>く</rt></ruby>い<ruby>尽<rt>つ</rt></ruby>くされる<ruby>前<rt>まえ</rt></ruby>に [icon Bowser]カイブツを<ruby>止<rt>と</rt></ruby>めるんだ!」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO8]「さっ! <ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>う<ruby>存分<rt>ぞんぶん</rt></ruby> <ruby>暴<rt>あば</rt></ruby>れてきな!!」
StoryBook_KoopaCastle004.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO6]"It looks like [icon Bowser] wants to get even bigger!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO7]"You need to stop that [icon Bowser] monster before he
 devours everything in his path!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO8]"Get in there and show him what ya got!"
StoryBook_KoopaCastle004.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO6]« Il essaie de devenir encore plus puissant! »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO7]« Tu dois arrêter ce monstre [icon Bowser] avant qu'il
ne dévore tout sur son passage! »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO8]« Montre à ce marin d'eau douce de quel bois
tu te chauffes! À L'ABORDAGE! »
StoryBook_KoopaCastle004.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO6]"¡Parece que [icon Bowser] quiere seguir creciendo!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO7]"¡Detén a ese monstruo [icon Bowser] antes de que arrase
con todo lo que se encuentre a su paso!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_KPA_MEISTER_VO8]"¡Vamos, dale su merecido!"
