StoryBook_MeetKoopa000.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK1]"You're too late, [Mario/Luigi]!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2]"The power of the stars is already MINE!
 And look what else I got..."
StoryBook_MeetKoopa000.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK1]"You're too late, [Mario/Luigi]!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2]"The power of the stars is already MINE!
 And look what else I got..."
StoryBook_MeetKoopa000.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK1]"Tu arrives trop tard, [Mario/Luigi]!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2]"Je maîtrise désormais le pouvoir des étoiles!
Et regarde ce que j'ai trouvé en plus de ça!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa000.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK1]„Zu spät, [Mario/Luigi]!
Die Kraft der Sterne gehört jetzt MIR!“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2]„Und sieh mal, was ich mir noch unter
 den Nagel gerissen habe!“
StoryBook_MeetKoopa000.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK1]Stavolta arrivi troppo tardi, [Mario/Luigi]![newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2]Il potere delle stelle è già nelle mie mani!
E guarda cos'altro ho preso!
StoryBook_MeetKoopa000.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK1]¡Demasiado tarde, [Mario/Luigi]![newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2]¡La fuerza de las estrellas es solo mía!
Y fíjate quién se va a venir conmigo...
StoryBook_MeetKoopa000.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK1]「おそいぞ [Mario/Luigi]!」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2][wait 15]「ワガハイもついにスターのパワーを<ruby>身<rt>み</rt></ruby>に<ruby>付<rt>つ</rt></ruby>けた!!」
StoryBook_MeetKoopa000.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK1]"You're too late, [Mario/Luigi]!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2]"The power of the stars is already MINE!
 And look what else I got..."
StoryBook_MeetKoopa000.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK1]« Tu arrives trop tard, [Mario/Luigi]! »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2]« L'énergie des super étoiles m'appartient! Et
regarde qui j'ai trouvé... »
StoryBook_MeetKoopa000.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK1]"¡Demasiado tarde, [Mario/Luigi]!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2]"¡La fuerza de las estrellas es solo mía!
Y fíjate quién se va a venir conmigo..."

StoryBook_MeetKoopa001.JpJapanese: [playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_LAUGH_LONG] 「ガーッハッハッハッハ!」

StoryBook_MeetKoopa002.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK3]"I'm HUUUUGE!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK4]"Even scarier up close, huh?"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa002.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK3]"I'm HUUUUGE!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK4]"Even scarier up close, huh?"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa002.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK3]"Je suis ENOOOOOORME!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK4]"Regarde-moi de plus près... Avoue que
je suis encore plus terrifiant comme ça!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa002.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK3]„ICH BIN RIIIIESENGROOOOOSS!!!“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK4]„Sogar noch furchterregender
aus der Nähe, oder?“
StoryBook_MeetKoopa002.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK3]Io sono... ENORME!!![newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK4]E a vedermi da vicino, piccoletto,
te la starai già facendo sotto!
StoryBook_MeetKoopa002.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK3]¡¡¡Soy ENORME!!![newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK4]¡¿A que de cerca doy más miedo?!
StoryBook_MeetKoopa002.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK3]「どうだ スーパーサイズなワガハイは」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK4]「<ruby>近<rt>ちか</rt></ruby>くでみると もーっとコワイだろ!」
StoryBook_MeetKoopa002.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK3]"I'm HUUUUGE!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK4]"Even scarier up close, huh?"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa002.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK3]« Je suis GIGANTESQUE! »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK4]« Et je suis encore plus effrayant de près, tu
ne trouves pas, minus? »
StoryBook_MeetKoopa002.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK3]"¡Ahora soy ENOOORME!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK4]"¡Seguro que doy más miedo de cerca!
¿Verdad, chaparrito?"

StoryBook_MeetKoopa003.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2_2]"Maybe I'll have Peach bake ME something
 for once..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK_2_3]"I sure could go for a galaxy-sized slice
 of cake right now!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa003.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2_2]"Maybe I'll have Peach bake ME something
 for once..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK_2_3]"I sure could go for a galaxy-sized slice
 of cake right now!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa003.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2_2]"Pour une fois, Peach [icon Peach] va faire de
bons petits gâteaux rien que pour MOI!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK_2_3]"Voilà ce qu'il me faut, un gâteau de la taille
d'une galaxie! Oh oui, un gâteau galactique!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa003.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2_2]„Und Peach kann bestimmt was 
Leckeres für MICH backen.“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK_2_3]„Ich bin genau in der Stimmung für
einen riesigen Schokokuchen!“
StoryBook_MeetKoopa003.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2_2]Forse chiederò a Peach di cucinare qualcosa
per me...[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK_2_3]Ho voglia di una torta di dimensioni galattiche!
StoryBook_MeetKoopa003.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2_2]Quizá hasta consiga que Peach me haga
una tarta de una vez por todas...[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK_2_3]¡Ahora mismo me podría comer una tarta
tan grande como una galaxia!
StoryBook_MeetKoopa003.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2_2]「ピーチには ワガハイのために」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK_2_3]「スーパーサイズのケーキを<ruby>焼<rt>や</rt></ruby>いてもらおう」
StoryBook_MeetKoopa003.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2_2]"Maybe I'll have Peach bake ME something
 for once..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK_2_3]"I sure could go for a galaxy-sized slice
 of cake right now!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa003.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2_2]« Peut-être que je vais demander à Peach de
ME cuisiner quelque chose, pour une fois... »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK_2_3]« Moi aussi j'ai envie d'un morceau de gâteau...
mais de la grosseur d'une GALAXIE! HAH!»
StoryBook_MeetKoopa003.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK2_2]"Y esta vez, Peach hará un pastel
para MÍ, para variar..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK_2_3]"¡Ahora mismo me podría comer un pastel
tan grande como una galaxia!"

StoryBook_MeetKoopa004.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK5]"I'm way too huge for this puny planet!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK6]"I deserve an empire that's more ME size!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK7]"And I'll put it in the centre of the universe!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa004.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK5]"I'm way too huge for this puny planet!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK6]"I deserve an empire that's more ME size!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK7]"And I'll put it in the centre of the universe!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa004.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK5]"Ta petite planète de rien
du tout est trop minable!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK6]"A nouvelle taille, nouveaux appétits:
il me faut un royaume à ma mesure!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK7]"Je vais placer mon trône au centre de
l'univers et de là je régnerai sur le cosmos!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa004.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK5]„Euer erbärmlicher Planet ist zu klein für mich!“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK6]„Mein neues Riesen-Ich verlangt 
nach einem neuen Riesen-Reich!“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK7]„Das Zentrum des Universums wird
der perfekte Ort für meine neue Heimat sein!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa004.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK5]Ad ogni modo il vostro Pianeta è noiosissimo...[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK6]Per uno della mia grandezza serve un regno di
dimensioni cosmiche![newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK7]E conosco il posto ideale...
Mi merito di essere al centro dell'universo!
StoryBook_MeetKoopa004.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK5]¡Ya me he cansado de esta birria de planeta![newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK6]¡Necesito un imperio galáctico
que esté a mi altura![newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK7]Así ocuparé el sitio que me merezco:
¡el centro del universo! ¡JUA, JUA, JUA!
StoryBook_MeetKoopa004.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK5]「こんな せまくるしい<ruby>星<rt>ほし</rt></ruby>は <ruby>住<rt>す</rt></ruby>みあきた!」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK6]「スーパーなワガハイは スーパーな<ruby>帝国<rt>ていこく</rt></ruby>を」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK7]「<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>中心<rt>ちゅうしん</rt></ruby>に つくるのだ!!」
StoryBook_MeetKoopa004.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK5]"I'm way too huge for this puny planet!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK6]"I deserve an empire that's more ME size!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK7]"And I'll put it in the center of the universe!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa004.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK5]« Bon, j'en ai assez de ta mini planète! »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK6]« Je mérite un empire à ma taille! »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK7]« Et je compte l'installer au seul endroit digne
de ma personne : le centre de l'univers! »
StoryBook_MeetKoopa004.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK5]"¡Ya estoy harto de este planetucho!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK6]"¡Necesito un imperio galáctico que
esté a mi altura!"[newpage]
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_SPEAK7]"Y lo pondré en el único lugar digno de mi
estatura: ¡el centro del universo!"

StoryBook_MeetKoopa005.EuDutch: [playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_LAUGH]"Have fun with your stupid mushrooms!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa005.EuEnglish: [playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_LAUGH]"Have fun with your stupid mushrooms!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa005.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_LAUGH]"Allez, amuse-toi bien avec tes
petits champignons ridicules!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa005.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_LAUGH]„Viel Spaß noch mit deinen
jämmerlichen Pilzen!“
StoryBook_MeetKoopa005.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_LAUGH]Continua pure a masticare funghetti
tutto il giorno!!!
StoryBook_MeetKoopa005.EuSpanish: [playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_LAUGH]¡Que te diviertas con tus tristes champiñones!
StoryBook_MeetKoopa005.JpJapanese: [playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_LAUGH]「オマエはここに<ruby>残<rt>のこ</rt></ruby>って キノコでもかじっていろ!」
StoryBook_MeetKoopa005.UsEnglish: [playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_LAUGH]"Have fun with your stupid mushrooms!"
StoryBook_MeetKoopa005.UsFrench: [playsfx SE_SY_OP_D_KOOPA_LAUGH]« Amuse-toi bien avec tes mini champignons! »

StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby001.EuDutch:
The strange little fellow seemed confused...[newpage]
Was he lost?
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby001.EuEnglish:
The strange little fellow seemed confused...[newpage]
Was he lost?
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby001.EuFrench:
L'étrange petit bonhomme
avait l'air un peu perdu...
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby001.EuGerman:
Dieser sonderbare kleine Geselle
sieht verwirrt aus...[newpage]
Ob er sich verlaufen hat?
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby001.EuItalian:
Questo piccolo sembra un po' confuso...[newpage]
Si sarà perso?
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby001.JpJapanese:
<ruby>見<rt>み</rt></ruby>たことない<ruby>子<rt>こ</rt></ruby>ですね････[newpage]
<ruby>迷子<rt>まいご</rt></ruby>のようです
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby001.UsEnglish:
The strange little fellow seemed confused...[newpage]
Was he lost?
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby001.UsFrench:
Notre héros découvrit sur son chemin une
pauvre petite étoile qui semblait bien confuse...[newpage]
Était-elle perdue?
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby001.UsSpanish:
El extraño pequeñín parecía desconcertado...[newpage]
¿Acaso se había extraviado?

StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby002.EuDutch: He seemed to take a shine to [Mario/Luigi]!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby002.EuEnglish: He seemed to take a shine to [Mario/Luigi]!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby002.EuFrench: Il se prit tout de suite d'affection pour [Mario/Luigi]!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby002.EuGerman: Oh, wie schön... [Mario/Luigi] ist ihm sympathisch!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby002.EuItalian: Sembra che si sia già affezionato a [Mario/Luigi]!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby002.EuSpanish: Ooooh, ¡qué lindo! ¡Le ha cogido cariño a [Mario/Luigi]!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby002.JpJapanese: おやおや・・・ [Mario/Luigi]は <ruby>気<rt>き</rt></ruby>に<ruby>入<rt>い</rt></ruby>られたようですね
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby002.UsEnglish: He seemed to take a shine to [Mario/Luigi]!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby002.UsFrench: Une chose est sûre, elle semblait adorer [Mario/Luigi]!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby002.UsSpanish:
Ooooh, ¡parece que la presencia de [Mario/Luigi] ha
tranquilizado al pequeñín! ¡Ahora está feliz!

StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby003.EuDutch:
[Mario/Luigi]'s cap filled with warmth as he felt a new
power surging through him!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby003.EuEnglish:
[Mario/Luigi]'s cap filled with warmth as he felt a new
power surging through him!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby003.EuFrench:
Soudain, [Mario/Luigi] vit sa casquette briller d'un
nouvel éclat! Un nouveau pouvoir l'envahit!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby003.EuGerman:
Eine behagliche Wärme breitet sich unter
Marios Mütze aus, während sich eine ungeahnte,
mysteriöse Kraft in seinem Körper verteilt!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby003.EuItalian:
Mario avverte uno strano calore sotto il suo
cappello... Un nuovo potere che si manifesta...
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby003.EuSpanish:
¡[Mario/Luigi] siente un ligero calor bajo su gorra 
y nota una nueva fuerza en su interior!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby003.JpJapanese: <ruby>帽子<rt>ぼうし</rt></ruby>の<ruby>中<rt>なか</rt></ruby>が<ruby>暖<rt>あたた</rt></ruby>かくて、 <ruby>体中<rt>からだじゅう</rt></ruby>に<ruby>力<rt>ちから</rt></ruby>がわいてきました
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby003.UsEnglish:
[Mario/Luigi]'s cap filled with warmth as he felt a new
power surging through him!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby003.UsFrench:
Soudain, [Mario/Luigi] sentit un nouveau pouvoir l'envahir,
et sa casquette brilla d'une douce lueur!
StoryBook_MeetTicoBaby003.UsSpanish:
¡Un ligero calor emana de la gorra de [Mario/Luigi] 
y él nota una nueva fuerza en su interior!

StoryBook_NormalEnding1st000.JpJapanese: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SIGH_AT_ASTRO]「・・・まあ! きれい」

StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd000.EuDutch: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_VO1]"...I always thought we would meet again."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd000.EuEnglish: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_VO1]"...I always thought we would meet again."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd000.EuFrench: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_VO1]"... Je savais bien qu'on finirait par se revoir."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd000.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_VO1]„Ich habe immer gewusst, dass wir 
uns wiedersehen würden.“
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd000.EuSpanish: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_VO1]Sabía que nos encontraríamos de nuevo...
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd000.JpJapanese: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_VO1]「・・・お<ruby>会<rt>あ</rt></ruby>い<ruby>出来<rt>でき</rt></ruby>ると<ruby>思<rt>おも</rt></ruby>っていましたよ」
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd000.UsEnglish: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_VO1]"...I always thought we would meet again."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd000.UsFrench: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_VO1]« Je savais que nous nous reverrions un jour. »
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd000.UsSpanish: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_VO1]"Sabía que nos encontraríamos de nuevo..."

StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd002.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_SMILE_ROSETTA]"I am Rosalina... I watch over and protect
 the cosmos."[newpage]
"I have been waiting for all of you."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd002.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_SMILE_ROSETTA]"I am Rosalina... I watch over and protect
 the cosmos."[newpage]
"I have been waiting for all of you."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd002.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_SMILE_ROSETTA]"Mon nom est Harmonie... Je suis
la gardienne et la protectrice du cosmos."[newpage]
"Je vous attendais, mes amis."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd002.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_SMILE_ROSETTA]„Ich bin Rosalina... Meine Aufgabe ist es, über
den Kosmos zu wachen und ihn zu beschützen.“[newpage]
„Ich habe lange auf euch gewartet.“
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd002.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_SMILE_ROSETTA]Io sono Rosalinda...
Osservo dall'alto e proteggo il cosmo intero...[newpage]
Aspettavo tutti voi.
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd002.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_SMILE_ROSETTA]Me llamo Estela y me encargo
de proteger el universo.[newpage]
Os he estado esperando.
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd002.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_SMILE_ROSETTA]「わたしは ロゼッタ・・・ <ruby>星<rt>ほし</rt></ruby>を<ruby>観<rt>み</rt></ruby>る<ruby>者<rt>もの</rt></ruby>」[newpage]
「あなた<ruby>方<rt>がた</rt></ruby>を <ruby>待<rt>ま</rt></ruby>っていました」
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd002.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_SMILE_ROSETTA]"I am Rosalina... I watch over and protect
 the cosmos."[newpage]
"I have been waiting for all of you."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd002.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_SMILE_ROSETTA]« Mon nom est Rosalina... Je suis la gardienne
et la protectrice du cosmos. »[newpage]
« Je vous attendais. »
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd002.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_SMILE_ROSETTA]"Me llamo Rosalina y me encargo
de proteger el universo."[newpage]
"Te he estado esperando."

StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd003.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_BREATH1]"When that evil monster took our star power..."[newpage]
"I was separated from my precious little one..."[newpage]
"But I knew we'd see each other again."[newpage]
"Because..."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd003.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_BREATH1]"When that evil monster took our star power..."[newpage]
"I was separated from my precious little one..."[newpage]
"But I knew we'd see each other again."[newpage]
"Because..."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd003.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_BREATH1]"Ce monstre a dérobé le pouvoir des étoiles..."[newpage]
"... et nous a séparés, mon cher petit et moi."[newpage]
"Mais je savais que nous nous retrouverions."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd003.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_BREATH1]„Dieser riesige Unhold hat sich
unserer Power-Sterne bemächtigt...“[newpage]
„Und er hat mich auf gemeinste Art von
meinem kostbaren Baby-Luma getrennt...“ [newpage]
„Ich war mir jedoch sicher, dass es ihm gut
ergehen würde,[wait 30] weil ich dir vertraut habe.“
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd003.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_BREATH1]Quel mostro ci ha rubato le Superstelle...[newpage]
E mi ha separato dal mio piccolo...[newpage]
Ma sapevo che ci saremmo rivisti...[newpage]
Perché...
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd003.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_BREATH1]Ese monstruo nos había robado
toda la fuerza de las estrellas.[newpage]
Y me había separado de
mi querido pequeñín.[newpage]
Aunque estaba segura de que
nos volveríamos a ver.
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd003.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_BREATH1]「<ruby>邪<rt>よこしま</rt></ruby>な<ruby>魔物<rt>まもの</rt></ruby>に 『<ruby>星<rt>ほし</rt></ruby>の<ruby>力<rt>ちから</rt></ruby>』 を<ruby>奪<rt>うば</rt></ruby>われた<ruby>時<rt>とき</rt></ruby>・・・」[newpage]
「わが<ruby>子<rt>こ</rt></ruby>と、 <ruby>離<rt>はな</rt></ruby>ればなれになってしまいましたが」[newpage]
「わたしは、 <ruby>再<rt>ふたた</rt></ruby>び<ruby>会<rt>あ</rt></ruby>えると<ruby>確信<rt>かくしん</rt></ruby>していました」[newpage]
「なぜなら・・・」
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd003.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_BREATH1]"When that evil monster took our star power..."[newpage]
"I was separated from my precious little one..."[newpage]
"But I knew we'd see each other again."[newpage]
"Because..."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd003.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_BREATH1]« Lorsque ce vil monstre a dérobé nos
précieuses super étoiles... »[newpage]
« Ma chère petite Luma et moi avons été
tragiquement séparées. »[newpage]
« Mais je savais que je la retrouverais... »[newpage]
« Oui, je savais, parce que...»
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd003.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_BREATH1]"Ese monstruo robó nuestras Superestrellas..."[newpage]
"Y me separó de mi querido pequeñín."[newpage]
"Aunque estaba segura de que
nos volveríamos a ver."

StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd004.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_WORRIED]"There is a force that binds us, defying even
 time and space..."[newpage]
"Not even the laws of the universe can stop it."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_SHORT1]"I knew its gentle pull would prevail."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd004.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_WORRIED]"There is a force that binds us, defying even
 time and space..."[newpage]
"Not even the laws of the universe can stop it."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_SHORT1]"I knew its gentle pull would prevail."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd004.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_WORRIED]"Nous sommes unis par des liens très puissants,
plus forts que l'espace et le temps..."[newpage]
"Même les lois implacables de
l'univers ne peuvent les défaire."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_SHORT1]"Et j'étais sûre que cette
force finirait par l'emporter."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd004.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_WORRIED]„Losgelöst von Raum und Zeit, von einer
geheimen Macht angetrieben...“[newpage]
„Bist du, mutiger Raumfahrer, durch die
Weiten des Universums gereist.“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_SHORT1]„Ich wusste, dass du die Kraft in dir trägst...“
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd004.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_WORRIED]C'è una forza che ci congiunge e ci permette
di superare i limiti spaziali e temporali...[newpage]
Nessuna legge universale potrebbe fermarla.[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_SHORT1]Ero certa che anche tu l'avresti avvertita...
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd004.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_WORRIED]Porque nos une una fuerza especial
que desafía el tiempo y el espacio.[newpage]
Ni siquiera las leyes del universo
pueden detenerla.[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_SHORT1]Sabía desde el principio que
volveríamos a estar juntos.
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd004.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_WORRIED]「<ruby>時間<rt>じかん</rt></ruby>と<ruby>空間<rt>くうかん</rt></ruby>を<ruby>越<rt>こ</rt></ruby>え、 わたし<ruby>達<rt>たち</rt></ruby>を<ruby>結<rt>むす</rt></ruby>び<ruby>続<rt>つづ</rt></ruby>ける 『<ruby>力<rt>ちから</rt></ruby>』 ・・・」[newpage]
「<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>理<rt>ことわり</rt></ruby>でも <ruby>阻<rt>はば</rt></ruby>むことの<ruby>出来<rt>でき</rt></ruby>ない・・・」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_SHORT1]「<ruby>温<rt>あたた</rt></ruby>かい 『<ruby>引力<rt>いんりょく</rt></ruby>』 の<ruby>存在<rt>そんざい</rt></ruby>を わたしは<ruby>知<rt>し</rt></ruby>っているからです」
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd004.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_WORRIED]"There is a force that binds us, defying even
 time and space..."[newpage]
"Not even the laws of the universe can stop it."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_SHORT1]"I knew its gentle pull would prevail."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd004.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_WORRIED]« Une force nous unit l'une à l'autre, un
pouvoir qui défie le temps et l'espace... »[newpage]
« Et même les puissantes lois de l'univers n'y
peuvent rien. »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_SHORT1]« Je savais que cette force l'emporterait. »
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd004.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_WORRIED]"Porque nos une una fuerza especial
que desafía el tiempo y el espacio."[newpage]
"Ni siquiera las leyes del universo
pueden detenerla."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_TALK_SHORT1]"Sabía desde el principio que
volveríamos a estar juntos."

StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd005.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_LOOK_UP_AT_ROSETTA]"It is the desire to be reunited with someone
 who is important to you."[newpage]
"That pull is what brought us together."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd005.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_LOOK_UP_AT_ROSETTA]"It is the desire to be reunited with someone
 who is important to you."[newpage]
"That pull is what brought us together."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd005.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_LOOK_UP_AT_ROSETTA]"Le désir de retrouver un être cher..."[newpage]
"... Oui, c'est cette force
irréfrénable qui nous a réunis."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd005.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_LOOK_UP_AT_ROSETTA]„Du warst fest entschlossen, deine Prinzessin
aus den Fängen des Unholds zu befreien.“[newpage]
„Es war diese Kraft deiner Entschlossenheit,
die dich hierher geführt hat.“
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd005.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_LOOK_UP_AT_ROSETTA]Il tuo desiderio di riunirti con qualcuno
che ti sta a cuore...[newpage]
È la forza che ti ha fatto arrivare fin qua.
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd005.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_LOOK_UP_AT_ROSETTA]Deseabas con todo tu corazón
estar junto a tu princesa...[newpage]
Y esa fuerza te ha traído hasta aquí.
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd005.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_LOOK_UP_AT_ROSETTA]「『<ruby>大切<rt>たいせつ</rt></ruby>な<ruby>人<rt>ひと</rt></ruby>に<ruby>会<rt>あ</rt></ruby>いたい』 と<ruby>願<rt>ねが</rt></ruby>う<ruby>気持<rt>きも</rt></ruby>ち」[newpage]
「その 『<ruby>引力<rt>いんりょく</rt></ruby>』 が わたし<ruby>達<rt>たち</rt></ruby>を<ruby>引<rt>ひ</rt></ruby>き<ruby>合<rt>あ</rt></ruby>わせるのです」
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd005.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_LOOK_UP_AT_ROSETTA]"It is the desire to be reunited with someone
 who is important to you."[newpage]
"That pull is what brought us together."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd005.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_LOOK_UP_AT_ROSETTA]« Et c'est le désir de retrouver un être cher
qui nous a tous rassemblés. »
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd005.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_LOOK_UP_AT_ROSETTA]"Deseabas con todo tu corazón
encontrar a tu ser querido..."[newpage]
"Y esa fuerza te ha traído hasta aquí."

StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd006.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_APPEAR_YES]"We have come through so much to meet again."[newpage]
"This is not some mere whim of the stars..."[newpage]
"I am sure of that."[newpage]
[wait 120][playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_BREATH_TO_MR]"[Mario/Luigi]..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_THANK_YOU]"Thank you for returning this child to me."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd006.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_APPEAR_YES]"We have come through so much to meet again."[newpage]
"This is not some mere whim of the stars..."[newpage]
"I am sure of that."[newpage]
[wait 120][playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_BREATH_TO_MR]"[Mario/Luigi]..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_THANK_YOU]"Thank you for returning this child to me."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd006.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_APPEAR_YES]"Nous avons traversé tant d'épreuves
avant de pouvoir nous retrouver..."[newpage]
"Cela n'a rien d'un miracle, j'en suis persuadée."[newpage]
"C'est le pouvoir des étoiles
 qui a rendu tout ça possible."[newpage]
[wait 120][playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_BREATH_TO_MR]"[Mario/Luigi]..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_THANK_YOU]"Merci d'avoir ramené mon petit sain et sauf."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd006.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_APPEAR_YES]„Dass wir hier wohlbehalten
aufeinandertreffen, ist ein wahres Wunder.“[newpage]
„Lass uns der Kraft der Sterne dafür danken.“[newpage]
[wait 120][playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_BREATH_TO_MR]„[Mario/Luigi]...“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_THANK_YOU]„Danke, dass du meinen Baby-Luma
nach Hause geleitet hast.“
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd006.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_APPEAR_YES]Se ci siamo incontrati...[newpage]
Non è per semplice capriccio delle stelle...[newpage]
Di questo ne sono certa.[newpage]
[wait 120][playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_BREATH_TO_MR][Mario/Luigi]...[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_THANK_YOU]Grazie per aver riportato a casa il mio piccolo.
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd006.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_APPEAR_YES]Hemos pasado por tanto hasta reencontrarnos...[newpage]
Parece que nuestro destino estuviera
escrito en las estrellas.[newpage]
[wait 120][playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_BREATH_TO_MR][Mario/Luigi]...[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_THANK_YOU]Gracias por traer de vuelta a mi pequeñín.
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd006.JpJapanese:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_APPEAR_YES]「この<ruby>巡<rt>めぐ</rt></ruby>りでも あなたに<ruby>出会<rt>であ</rt></ruby>えたのは」[newpage]
「<ruby>星々<rt>ほしぼし</rt></ruby>がおこした <ruby>気<rt>き</rt></ruby>まぐれな<ruby>現象<rt>げんしょう</rt></ruby>では<ruby>無<rt>な</rt></ruby>いと・・・」[newpage]
「わたしは <ruby>信<rt>しん</rt></ruby>じます」[newpage]
[wait 120][playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_BREATH_TO_MR]「[Mario/Luigi]・・・」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_THANK_YOU]「わが<ruby>子<rt>こ</rt></ruby>を ・・・ありがとう」
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd006.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_APPEAR_YES]"We have come through so much to meet again."[newpage]
"This is not some mere whim of the stars..."[newpage]
"I am sure of that."[newpage]
[wait 120][playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_BREATH_TO_MR]"[Mario/Luigi]..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_THANK_YOU]"Thank you for returning this child to me."
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd006.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_APPEAR_YES]« Nous avons vécu une aventure des plus
mouvementées pour nous revoir. »[newpage]
« Ce n'est pas un simple caprice des étoiles
si notre souhait a été réalisé... »[newpage]
« Ça, j'en suis certaine. »[newpage]
[wait 120][playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_BREATH_TO_MR]« [Mario/Luigi]... »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_THANK_YOU]« Merci du fond du cœur d'avoir ramené mon
enfant à la maison. »
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd006.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_APPEAR_YES]"Hemos pasado por tanto para volver
a encontrarnos..."[newpage]
"Parece que nuestro destino estuviera
escrito en las estrellas."[newpage]
[wait 120][playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_BREATH_TO_MR]"[Mario/Luigi]..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_ROS_THANK_YOU]"Gracias por traer de vuelta a mi pequeñín."

StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd007.EuDutch:
"I will never forget you."[newpage]
"Even when I someday become a star myself..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO2]"I will never forget you, [Mario/Luigi]!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd007.EuEnglish:
"I will never forget you."[newpage]
"Even when I someday become a star myself..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO2]"I will never forget you, [Mario/Luigi]!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd007.EuFrench:
"Je ne t'oublierai jamais."[newpage]
"Même lorsque je me transformerai
moi-même en étoile..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO2]"Non, jamais je ne t'oublierai, [Mario/Luigi]!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd007.EuGerman:
„Ich werde dich niemals vergessen!“[newpage]
„Auch wenn ich eines Tages ein
Stern sein werde...“[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO2]„Werde ich dich niemals vergessen, [Mario/Luigi]!“
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd007.EuItalian:
Non ti dimenticherò mai...[newpage]
Anche quando un giorno diventerò io stessa
una Stella...[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO2]Non mi dimenticherò mai di te, [Mario/Luigi]!
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd007.EuSpanish:
No te olvidaré nunca.[newpage]
Incluso cuando crezca y sea una estrella...[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO2]¡Jamás te olvidaré, [Mario/Luigi]!
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd007.JpJapanese:
[setfontsize large]「わすれない!」[newpage]
[setfontsize normal]「ボクが・・・ いつか<ruby>星<rt>ほし</rt></ruby>になっても・・・」[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO2]「[Mario/Luigi]のこと・・・ わすれない!」
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd007.UsEnglish:
"I will never forget you."[newpage]
"Even when I someday become a star myself..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO2]"I will never forget you, [Mario/Luigi]!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd007.UsFrench:
« Je ne t'oublierai pas. »[newpage]
« Même lorsque je deviendrai moi-même une
grande étoile, un jour... »[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO2]« Je ne t'oublierai jamais, [Mario/Luigi]! »
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd007.UsSpanish:
"No te olvidaré nunca."[newpage]
"Incluso cuando crezca y sea una estrella..."[newpage]
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO2]"¡Jamás te olvidaré, [Mario/Luigi]!"

StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd008.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO3]"Ta bravoure restera gravée dans
ma mémoire pour l'éternité!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd008.EuGerman: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO3]„Niemals! Das werde ich nicht vergessen!“
StoryBook_NormalEnding2nd008.JpJapanese: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_BABY_TICO_TO_MARIO3]「ゼッタイ! ゼッタイ!! わすれない!!」

StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd000.EuDutch: "May the stars shine down on you..."
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd000.EuEnglish: "May the stars shine down on you..."
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd000.EuItalian: Che le stelle continuino ad illuminare la tua via...
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd000.EuSpanish:
Que la luz de las estrellas
ilumine vuestro camino...
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd000.JpJapanese: 「<ruby>皆様方<rt>みなさまがた</rt></ruby>に <ruby>善<rt>よ</rt></ruby>き<ruby>星<rt>ほし</rt></ruby>くずが <ruby>降<rt>ふ</rt></ruby>りますように・・・」
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd000.UsEnglish: "May the stars shine down on you..."
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd000.UsFrench: « Que la poussière d'étoiles vous protège... »
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd000.UsSpanish:
"Que la luz de las estrellas
ilumine tu camino..."

StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd001.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SEE_SKY_ASTRO]"So the little one was reunited with his
 special someone!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd001.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SEE_SKY_ASTRO]"So the little one was reunited with his
 special someone!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd001.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SEE_SKY_ASTRO]"Ainsi, Harmonie et le jeune [icon YoungMasterLuma]
sont à nouveau réunis!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd001.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SEE_SKY_ASTRO]„Wie rührend... Der besondere Luma hat zurück
zu der ihm kostbaren Person gefunden.“
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd001.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SEE_SKY_ASTRO]E così il piccolo ha ritrovato
la persona a lui cara!
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd001.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SEE_SKY_ASTRO]¡Qué lindo! El pequeño destello ha vuelto
junto a ser querido.
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd001.JpJapanese: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SEE_SKY_ASTRO]「あの<ruby>子<rt>こ</rt></ruby>は <ruby>大切<rt>たいせつ</rt></ruby>な<ruby>人<rt>ひと</rt></ruby>に<ruby>会<rt>あ</rt></ruby>えたのね」
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd001.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SEE_SKY_ASTRO]"So the little one was reunited with his
 special someone!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd001.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SEE_SKY_ASTRO]« Alors, la petite Luma a retrouvé son être
cher! C'est merveilleux! »
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd001.UsSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_PEACH_SEE_SKY_ASTRO]"¡Qué lindo! El pequeño destello ha vuelto
junto a su ser querido."

StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd002.EuDutch: "And you too, pal! Am I right?"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd002.EuEnglish: "And you too, pal! Am I right?"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd002.EuFrench:
"Et toi aussi, tu as retrouvé ta
chère princesse! Pas vrai, matelot?"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd002.EuGerman:
„Aber auch du, mein Freund!
Ist es nicht so?“
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd002.UsEnglish: "And you too, pal! Am I right?"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd002.UsFrench: « Et toi aussi, matelot! Pas vrai? »

StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd003.EuDutch:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_LETS_GO]"All right, you two! It's time to get
 you back to your home planet!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd003.EuEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_LETS_GO]"All right, you two! It's time to get
 you back to your home planet!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd003.EuFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_LETS_GO]"Très bien, vous deux! Il est temps
de retourner sur votre planète!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd003.EuGerman:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_LETS_GO]„Alles klar, ihr zwei! Es ist höchste Zeit,
zu eurem Heimatplaneten zurückzukehren!“
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd003.EuItalian:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_LETS_GO]Dunque... Voi due!
È ora di riportarvi al vostro Pianeta!
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd003.EuSpanish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_LETS_GO]¡Venga, pareja, ya va siendo hora
de que os llevemos a vuestro planeta!
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd003.JpJapanese: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_LETS_GO]「さ アンタたちの<ruby>星<rt>ほし</rt></ruby>へ もどろうか <ruby>船長<rt>せんちょう</rt></ruby>!」
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd003.UsEnglish:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_LETS_GO]"All right, you two! It's time to get you back
 to your home planet!"
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd003.UsFrench:
[playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_LETS_GO]« Bon, allez, vous deux! Il est temps de vous
ramener sur votre planète! »
StoryBook_NormalEnding3rd003.UsSpanish: [playsfx SE_DM_V_ED_MEISTER_LETS_GO]"¡Muy bien! ¡Es hora de llevarlos a su planeta!"

StoryBook_RideSpinDriver000.EuDutch:
"[Mario/Luigi]? Where did that monster come from?!"[newpage]
"He took your princess to the centre of the
universe! You must hurry and save her!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver000.EuEnglish:
"[Mario/Luigi]? Where did that monster come from?!"[newpage]
"He took your princess to the centre of the
universe! You must hurry and save her!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver000.EuFrench:
"[Mario/Luigi]? Mais d'où il sort, ce monstre?"[newpage]
"Il a kidnappé la princesse [icon Peach] pour
l'emporter au centre de l'univers?"[newpage]
"Mais alors, il faut le rattraper au plus vite!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver000.EuGerman:
„[Mario/Luigi], wo kam dieser riesige Unhold nur her?“[newpage]
„Er hat deine Prinzessin ins Zentrum
des Universums verschleppt.
Befreie sie, so schnell du kannst!“
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver000.EuItalian:
[Mario/Luigi]! Cosa vuole quel mostro?![newpage]
Ha rapito la Principessa?! Dobbiamo salvarla!
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver000.EuSpanish:
¿[Mario/Luigi]? ¡¿De dónde ha salido ese villano?![newpage]
¡Se ha llevado a la princesa al centro
del universo! ¡Tienes que ir a rescatarla!
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver000.JpJapanese:
「あなたが [Mario/Luigi]さん? ですよね?!」[newpage]
「お<ruby>姫様<rt>ひめさま</rt></ruby>が タイヘンですよ!!」
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver000.UsEnglish:
"[Mario/Luigi]? Where did that monster come from?!"[newpage]
"He took your princess to the center of the
universe! You must hurry and save her!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver000.UsFrench:
« [Mario/Luigi], c'est bien ça? Tu es celui à qui le
monstre était en train de parler! »[newpage]
« Si je comprends bien, il vient de kidnapper la
princesse de ce royaume? Tu dois la secourir! »
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver000.UsSpanish:
"¿[Mario/Luigi]? ¡¿De dónde ha salido ese villano?!"[newpage]
"¡Se ha llevado a tu princesa al centro
del universo! ¡Tienes que ir a rescatarla!"

StoryBook_RideSpinDriver001.EuDutch:
[setfontsize large]"OH! Master [icon YoungMasterLuma] Luma!"[newpage]
[setfontsize normal]"Young master [icon YoungMasterLuma] Luma, did you get thrown
 overboard too? Good thing you're safe!"[newpage]
"I see... So you're going to stay in [Mario/Luigi]'s cap?
 That should be safe for now..."[newpage]
"But, [Mario/Luigi], you have other things to worry
 about...like saving the princess! ...But how?"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver001.EuEnglish:
[setfontsize large]"OH! Master [icon YoungMasterLuma] Luma!"[newpage]
[setfontsize normal]"Young master [icon YoungMasterLuma] Luma, did you get thrown
 overboard too? Good thing you're safe!"[newpage]
"I see... So you're going to stay in [Mario/Luigi]'s cap?
 That should be safe for now..."[newpage]
"But, [Mario/Luigi], you have other things to worry
 about...like saving the princess! ...But how?"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver001.EuFrench:
"[setfontsize large]Oh![setfontsize normal] Mais c'est le jeune maître Luma [icon YoungMasterLuma]!"[newpage]
"Tu es tombé du vaisseau, toi aussi?
Heureusement tu as l'air de bien aller!"[newpage]
"Tu es heureux, sous la casquette de [Mario/Luigi]?
Là au moins, tu seras en sécurité..."[newpage]
"Mais on a d'autres préoccupations pour le
moment. [Mario/Luigi], il faut absolument qu'on sauve
la princesse!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver001.EuGerman:
„[setfontsize large]Wow![setfontsize normal] Der ehrwürdige Baby-Luma!“[newpage]
„Hallo, mein Kleiner. Geht es dir gut?“[newpage]
„Hast du es bequem dort unter [Mario/Luigi]s Mütze?
Nun, da ist es wohl genauso sicher
wie überall sonst auch...“[newpage]
„Aber es gibt jetzt wichtigere Dinge zu tun.
[Mario/Luigi], wir müssen die Prinzessin retten!“
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver001.EuItalian:
[setfontsize large]Oh! [setfontsize normal]Uno Sfavillotto Babylume [icon YoungMasterLuma]![newpage]
Ehi, piccolo [icon YoungMasterLuma], sei stato scagliato fuori bordo
anche tu? Meno male che sei salvo![newpage]
Vuoi tornare sotto il cappello di [Mario/Luigi]?
Beh, certo! È più sicuro di tanti altri posti...[newpage]
Comunque... [Mario/Luigi], ora dobbiamo pensare a
come aiutare la Principessa!
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver001.EuSpanish:
[setfontsize large]¡Oh! ¡Si es el destello maestro [icon YoungMasterLuma]![newpage]
[setfontsize normal]Joven maestro [icon YoungMasterLuma], ¿cómo has acabado aquí?[newpage]
Hum... Entiendo. Prefieres quedarte en la gorra
de [Mario/Luigi], ¿eh? Ahí estarás a salvo por ahora...[newpage]
En fin, tenemos otras cosas de las que
preocuparnos... ¡como rescatar a la princesa!
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver001.JpJapanese:
「[setfontsize large]わっ![setfontsize normal] [icon YoungMasterLuma]チコ<ruby>様<rt>さま</rt></ruby>!!」[newpage]
「[icon YoungMasterLuma]チコ<ruby>様<rt>さま</rt></ruby>も <ruby>飛<rt>と</rt></ruby>ばされてきたのですか?? よくご<ruby>無事<rt>ぶじ</rt></ruby>で!」[newpage]
「なるほど [Mario/Luigi]さんの<ruby>帽子<rt>ぼうし</rt></ruby>の<ruby>中<rt>なか</rt></ruby>で! そこなら<ruby>安全<rt>あんぜん</rt></ruby>・・・」[newpage]
「いやいや それより [Mario/Luigi]さん!!」[newpage]
「お<ruby>姫様<rt>ひめさま</rt></ruby>を お<ruby>助<rt>たす</rt></ruby>けしないと!!」
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver001.UsEnglish:
"[setfontsize large]OH! Master [icon YoungMasterLuma] Luma!"[newpage]
[setfontsize normal]"Young master [icon YoungMasterLuma] Luma, did you get thrown
 overboard too? Good thing you're safe!"[newpage]
"I see... So you're going to stay in [Mario/Luigi]'s cap?
 That should be safe for now..."[newpage]
"But, [Mario/Luigi], you have other things to worry
 about...like saving the princess! ...But how?"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver001.UsFrench:
« [setfontsize large]OH! La... La Luma prodige [icon YoungMasterLuma]![setfontsize normal] »[newpage]
« Jeune Luma prodige [icon YoungMasterLuma], vous avez été
projetée par-dessus bord, vous aussi? »[newpage]
« Par chance, vous allez bien! Oh, vous voulez
rester sous le chapeau de [Mario/Luigi]? Très bien! »[newpage]
« Bon, [Mario/Luigi], tu dois trouver un moyen d'aider
la princesse! ...Mais comment? »
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver001.UsSpanish:
[setfontsize large]"¡¿Cómo?! [setfontsize normal]¡Increíble! ¡El destello
maestro [icon YoungMasterLuma] se encuentra aquí!"[newpage]
"Joven maestro [icon YoungMasterLuma], ¿cómo has acabado aquí?"[newpage]
"Hum... Entiendo. Prefieres quedarte en la gorra
de [Mario/Luigi], ¿eh? Ahí estarás a salvo por ahora..."[newpage]
"Y [Mario/Luigi], tú tienes que preocuparte de
rescatar a la princesa. ¿Pero cómo lo harás?"

StoryBook_RideSpinDriver002.EuDutch:
"I know! With young master [icon YoungMasterLuma] Luma's help,
 you can use the power of the stars!"[newpage]
"And we [icon Luma] Lumas can help a little too!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver002.EuEnglish:
"I know! With young master [icon YoungMasterLuma] Luma's help,
 you can use the power of the stars!"[newpage]
"And we [icon Luma] Lumas can help a little too!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver002.EuFrench:
"Ton ami le jeune [icon YoungMasterLuma] t'aidera
à utiliser le pouvoir des étoiles..."[newpage]
"Et nous, les Luma [icon Luma], on t'aidera
aussi de notre mieux!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver002.EuGerman:
„Wie ich sehe, erlaubt dir die Macht
des besonderen Baby-Luma, die
Kraft der Sterne zu nutzen.“[newpage]
„Und auch wir Luma werden dir helfen,
wo wir nur können!“
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver002.EuItalian:
Ah! Ma se lo Sfavillotto Babylume [icon YoungMasterLuma] sta con te,
potrai usare il potere delle stelle![newpage]
E anche noi altri Sfavillotti [icon Luma] possiamo darti
una mano!
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver002.EuSpanish:
El joven maestro [icon YoungMasterLuma] te permitirá
usar la fuerza de las estrellas.[newpage]
¡Y los [icon Luma] también podemos ayudarte!
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver002.JpJapanese:
「そうだ! [icon YoungMasterLuma]チコ<ruby>様<rt>さま</rt></ruby>が<ruby>一緒<rt>いっしょ</rt></ruby>なら 『<ruby>星<rt>ほし</rt></ruby>の<ruby>力<rt>ちから</rt></ruby>』 で・・・」[newpage]
「ボクたち [icon Luma]チコがお<ruby>手伝<rt>てつだ</rt></ruby>いできますよ!」
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver002.UsEnglish:
"I know! With young master [icon YoungMasterLuma] Luma's help,
 you can use the power of the stars!"[newpage]
"And we [icon Luma] Lumas can help a little too!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver002.UsFrench:
« Oh! Je sais! La jeune Luma prodige [icon YoungMasterLuma] peut
t'aider à utiliser l'énergie des étoiles! »[newpage]
« Et nous, les autres Luma [icon Luma], pourrons aussi
te donner un coup de main! »
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver002.UsSpanish:
"¡Ya sé! Con el joven maestro [icon YoungMasterLuma] a tu lado
podrás hacer uso del poder de las estrellas."[newpage]
"¡Y nosotros [icon Luma] también podemos ayudarte!"

StoryBook_RideSpinDriver003.EuDutch:
"As thanks for saving our friends..."[newpage]
"We'll send you into space to get that monster!"[newpage]
"Now! Let's go after them!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver003.EuEnglish:
"As thanks for saving our friends..."[newpage]
"We'll send you into space to get that monster!"[newpage]
"Now! Let's go after them!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver003.EuFrench:
"Pour te remercier d'être
venu en aide à nos amis..."[newpage]
"... nous allons te propulser dans l'espace."[newpage]
"Partons à la poursuite de ce monstre!
Attention au décollage!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver003.EuGerman:
„Du bist ein wahrer Freund der Luma!
Aus Dank, dass du uns geholfen hast,
helfen wir dir bei deiner Reise.“[newpage]
„Wir katapultieren dich ins Weltall, damit
du dich an die Fersen des Unholds heftest!“
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver003.EuItalian:
Come ringraziamento per aver salvato i nostri
amici...[newpage]
Ti lanceremo nello spazio affinché tu possa
catturare quel mostro![newpage]
Andiamo!
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver003.EuSpanish:
Por cierto, ¡gracias por
salvar a nuestros amigos![newpage]
¡Te enviaremos al espacio exterior!
¡Venga, a por ese canalla!
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver003.JpJapanese:
「ボクらの<ruby>仲間<rt>なかま</rt></ruby>を<ruby>助<rt>たす</rt></ruby>けてくれたお<ruby>礼<rt>れい</rt></ruby>に」[newpage]
「<ruby>宇宙<rt>うちゅう</rt></ruby>へご<ruby>案内<rt>あんない</rt></ruby>します!」[newpage]
「さあ! <ruby>追<rt>お</rt></ruby>いかけましょう!」
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver003.UsEnglish:
"As thanks for saving our friends..."[newpage]
"We'll send you into space to get that monster!"[newpage]
"Now! Let's go after them!"
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver003.UsFrench:
« D'ailleurs, pour te remercier d'avoir aidé
nos semblables... »[newpage]
« Nous allons t'envoyer dans l'espace pour que
tu puisses pourchasser ce monstre! »[newpage]
« Pas de temps à perdre! Allons-y! »
StoryBook_RideSpinDriver003.UsSpanish:
"Como agradecimiento por salvar a
nuestros amigos..."[newpage]
"¡Te ayudaremos a llegar al espacio exterior!"[newpage]
"Prepárate, ¡que vamos tras el monstruo!"

SignBoard005.EuDutch:
Whoa! [wait 15]You made it all the way here!
You know the only way through is to
[setfontcol red]defeat every enemy[setfontcol none], right?
SignBoard005.EuEnglish:
Whoa! [wait 15]You made it all the way here!
You know the only way through is to
[setfontcol red]defeat every enemy[setfontcol none], right?
SignBoard005.EuFrench:
Ouah! [wait 15]Tu as réussi à venir jusqu'ici!
Ta mission est simple: il faut [setfontcol red]te
[setfontcol none][setfontcol red]débarrasser de [setfontcol none][setfontcol red]tous les ennemis[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard005.EuGerman:
Nicht schlecht! [wait 15]
Du hast es bis hierhin geschafft![newpage]
Aber dir ist klar geworden, dass
du [setfontcol red]alle Feinde besiegen musst[setfontcol none],
um weiterzukommen, oder?
SignBoard005.EuItalian:
Incredibile! [wait 15]Sei arrivato fin qui! Sai
che l'unico modo per proseguire è
[setfontcol red]sconfiggere tutti i nemici[setfontcol none], vero?
SignBoard005.EuSpanish:
Enhorabuena... [wait 15]¡por llegar hasta aquí!
Sabes que la única forma de pasar es
[setfontcol red]eliminando a todos los enemigos[setfontcol none], ¿no?
SignBoard005.JpJapanese:
よぉ!![wait 15] ココに<ruby>来<rt>き</rt></ruby>ちまったんだな?!
[setfontcol red]アイツらを<ruby>倒<rt>たお</rt></ruby>していく[setfontcol none]<ruby>以外<rt>いがい</rt></ruby>に <ruby>道<rt>みち</rt></ruby>はないゼ?
SignBoard005.UsEnglish:
Whoa! [wait 15]You made it all the way here!
You know the only way through is to
[setfontcol red]defeat every enemy[setfontcol none], right?
SignBoard005.UsFrench:
Oh![wait 15] Vous avez trouvé comment vous
rendre jusqu'ici![newpage]
Vous savez donc que la seule façon
d'avancer est d'[setfontcol red]éliminer tous les
monstres[setfontcol none] de chaque planète, non?
SignBoard005.UsSpanish:
¡Vaya... [wait 15]llegaste hasta aquí! Sabes
que la única manera de pasar es
[setfontcol red]eliminando a todos los enemigos[setfontcol none], ¿no?

SignBoard050.EuDutch:
You're back?! [wait 30]You're a funny one!
[wait 15]Well, same deal... The only way
through is to [setfontcol red]defeat every enemy[setfontcol black].[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
SignBoard050.EuEnglish:
You're back?! [wait 30]You're a funny one!
[wait 15]Well, same deal... The only way
through is to [setfontcol red]defeat every enemy[setfontcol black].[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
SignBoard050.EuFrench:
De retour?! [wait 30]Bizarre, bizarre! [wait 15]Bon, tu
connais la chanson... Pour avancer,
[setfontcol red]débarrasse-toi de tous les ennemis[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard050.EuGerman:
Du bist zurück?!?[wait 30]
Ganz schön verrückt! [wait 15]
Nun, gleiches Spiel wie immer...[newpage]
Du kommst hier nur durch, wenn
du [setfontcol red]alle Feinde besiegs[setfontcol none][setfontcol black][setfontcol red]t[setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]
SignBoard050.EuItalian:
Già di ritorno?! [wait 30]Sei proprio strano!
[wait 15]Beh, la musica non cambia! Prosegui
solo se [setfontcol red]abbatti tutti i nemici[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard050.EuSpanish:
¡Pero si has vuelto! [wait 30]¡Eso son ganas![wait 15]
Por si se te ha olvidado: solo pasarás
si [setfontcol red]eliminas a todos los enemigos[setfontcol black].[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
SignBoard050.JpJapanese:
また<ruby>来<rt>き</rt></ruby>たのか?![wait 30] あんた、 おもしれェな!
[wait 15]<ruby>今度<rt>こんど</rt></ruby>も さっさと[setfontcol red]アイツらを<ruby>倒<rt>たお</rt></ruby>して[setfontcol black]くれよ[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
SignBoard050.UsEnglish:
You're back?! [wait 30]You're weird!
[wait 15]Well, same deal... The only way
through is to [setfontcol red]defeat every enemy[setfontcol black].[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
SignBoard050.UsFrench:
Vous êtes de retour?![wait 30] Bizarre! [wait 15]Bon,
la même règle est de mise : pour
progresser, [setfontcol red]éliminez tous les ennemis[setfontcol none].
SignBoard050.UsSpanish:
¿Otra vez aquí? [wait 30]¡Qué raro![wait 15] Bueno, lo
mismo que antes... Solo podrás pasar
[setfontcol red]eliminando a todos los enemigos[setfontcol black].[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

and go back in[setfontcol none]! Boi-yoi-yoing!

[setfontcol red]Tournoie [setfontcol none]pour faire [setfontcol blue]coulisser

Durch [setfontcol red]Drehen[setfontcol none][setfontcol red] [setfontcol none]schiebst du die Blöcke

[setfontcol red]スピン[setfontcol none]で カベが

PION-PION!

¡Combina el [setfontcol red]Salto Escalada
[setfontcol none]con los [setfontcol blue]giros[setfontcol none]! ¡Boing!
Rabbit001.JpJapanese: [setfontcol red]カベキック[setfontcol none] ア～ンド [setfontcol blue]スピン[setfontcol black]!  [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]ピョーン!!
Rabbit001.UsFrench:
Fais un [setfontcol red]saut mural[setfontcol none], puis [setfontcol blue]tourbillonne[setfontcol none]!
Boï-ying!

TamakoroTutorial_Flow005.EuDutch:
From that [setfontcol red]starting position[setfontcol none], [setfontcol blue]tilt [icon WiiRemote]
[setfontcol none]to start rolling forwards.[newpage]
Use [icon Abtn] to [setfontcol blue]jump[setfontcol black]. You can [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]also smoosh
things that get in your way![newpage]
Enough chatter, though! Go ahead and
give it a try! You'll get the hang of it!
TamakoroTutorial_Flow005.EuEnglish:
From that [setfontcol red]starting position[setfontcol none], [setfontcol blue]tilt [icon WiiRemote]

la [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol none]pour te mettre en mouvement.[newpage]
En appuyant sur [icon Abtn], tu peux [setfontcol blue]sauter[setfontcol none]
et écrabouiller les ennemis en chemin![newpage]
Mais assez de blabla! Il est temps de
passer à la pratique. A toi de jouer!
TamakoroTutorial_Flow005.EuGerman:

die entsprechende Richtung zu rollen.[newpage]
Drücke [icon Abtn], um zu [setfontcol blue]springen[setfontcol black] und wenn
dir was [setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]im Wege steht, rolle es platt[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]![newpage]
Genug der Worte, Probieren geht
über Studieren! Glaub mir, du wirst
dich schon zurechtfinden!
TamakoroTutorial_Flow005.EuItalian:
Dalla[setfontcol black] [setfontcol red]posizione di base[setfontcol black][setfontcol none], [setfontcol blue]inclina il

a spostarti rotolando.[newpage]
Puoi usare [icon Abtn] per [setfontcol blue]saltare[setfontcol black].
Puoi[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol black] [setfontcol none]anche schiacciare i nemici
sul percorso![newpage]
Ma basta con le chiacchiere! Fai una
prova! Cerca di andare avanti!
TamakoroTutorial_Flow005.EuSpanish:
Desde esta posición [setfontcol red]inicial[setfontcol none], [setfontcol blue]inclina
[setfontcol black]el[setfontcol blue] [icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol none]para rodar hacia adelante.[newpage]
Pulsa [icon Abtn] para [setfontcol blue]saltar[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]. S[setfontcol none]i quieres,

enemigos que se crucen en tu camino.[newpage]
¡Pero basta de cháchara! ¡La práctica
hace al maestro! ¡Verás qué pronto
aprendes a rodar!
TamakoroTutorial_Flow005.JpJapanese:
その[setfontcol red][setfontcol red]<ruby>基本姿勢<rt>きほんしせい</rt></ruby>[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]から [icon WiiRemote][setfontcol blue]Wiiリモコンを<ruby>傾<rt>かたむ</rt></ruby>ける[setfontcol black]と[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]
タマコロを<ruby>転<rt>ころ</rt></ruby>がして <ruby>移動<rt>いどう</rt></ruby>できるぞ[newpage]
あとは、 [icon Abtn]で [setfontcol blue]ジャンプ[setfontcol none]!
ジャマするヤツは ふみつぶせ![newpage]
まぁ、 <ruby>習<rt>なら</rt></ruby>うより<ruby>慣<rt>な</rt></ruby>れろだ
それで <ruby>先<rt>さき</rt></ruby>まで<ruby>進<rt>すす</rt></ruby>んでみな!
TamakoroTutorial_Flow005.UsEnglish:
From that starting position, [setfontcol blue]tilt [icon WiiRemote]
[setfontcol none]to start rolling forward.[newpage]
Use [icon Abtn] to [setfontcol blue]jump[setfontcol black].[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black] You can [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]also smoosh

Enough chatter, though! Go ahead and
give it a try! You'll get the hang of it!
TamakoroTutorial_Flow005.UsFrench:
En partant de cette [setfontcol black]position neutre,[setfontcol none]
[setfontcol blue]inclinez [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue][icon WiiRemote][setfontcol none] pour rouler vers l'avant.[newpage]
Vous pouvez appuyer sur [icon Abtn] pour
[setfontcol blue]sauter[setfontcol none], et vous pouvez écraser les
ennemis sur votre chemin![newpage]
Bon, assez discuté! Allez-y, essayez

TamakoroTutorial_Flow005.UsSpanish:
Desde esta posición [setfontcol red]inicial[setfontcol none], [setfontcol blue]inclina
el [setfontcol blue]Wii Remote [setfontcol blue][icon WiiRemote] [setfontcol none]para rodar hacia
adelante.[newpage]
Oprime [icon Abtn] para [setfontcol blue]saltar[setfontcol none][setfontcol black]. S[setfontcol none]i quieres,
también puedes aplastar a los
enemigos que se crucen en tu camino.[newpage]
¡Pero basta de charlas! ¡La práctica
hace al maestro! ¡Verás qué pronto
aprendes a rodar!

[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]あの<ruby>塔<rt>とう</rt></ruby>[setfontcol black] ついに<ruby>完成<rt>かんせい</rt></ruby>したんだよ!

[setfontcol red]That tower[setfontcol none] is finally finished, but I

La [setfontcol red]tour [setfontcol none]est enfin terminée, mais

Caretaker000_Flow002.EuDutch:
What?! You didn't get [setfontcol red]a single one[setfontcol black]?!
[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]Did you do that on purpose?[setfontcol none][setfontcol black][newpage]
[setfontcol none]Well... I suppose that is impressive in
its own way, but I have to say, I'm
still pretty disappointed...

Caretaker000_Flow002.EuSpanish:
¡¿Cómo?! ¡¿No has cogido [setfontcol red]ni una[setfontcol black]?!
¿Lo has hecho a propósito, o qué?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black][newpage]

おばちゃん、 そういうのは あんまり<ruby>好<rt>す</rt></ruby>かんな

?! You didn't get [setfontcol red]a single one[setfontcol black]?! [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]Did

No [setfontcol blue]scary monsters [setfontcol black]up [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]here! I'm safe
for now.[newpage]
[setfontsize large]Ahh! [setfontsize normal][wait 15][Mario/Luigi]?![wait 30] I was just
making sure we're all clear!
Kinopio003.EuFrench:
[setfontsize large]Aaah![setfontsize normal][wait 15] [Mario/Luigi]?! Tu m'as effrayé! Ne
t'inquiète pas, aucune [setfontcol blue]sale [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]bestiole [setfontcol black]à
signaler en h[setfontcol blue][setfontcol black]aut[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]! On est en sécurité!
Kinopio003.EuGerman:
[setfontsize large].[wait 5].[wait 5].[wait 15]Aaah! [setfontsize normal][wait 15][Mario/Luigi], du hier?!?
Immerhin gibt's hier oben keine
[setfontcol blue]unheimlichen Pieksmonster[setfontcol none]![wait 15] Huch?!?
Kinopio003.EuItalian:
Qui non ci sono [setfontcol blue]spaventosi mostri[setfontcol none]!
Sono in salvo! Oh! [wait 15][Mario/Luigi]?![wait 30] Mi stavo
accertando che fossimo al sicuro!
Kinopio003.EuSpanish:
¡Aquí no hay [setfontcol blue]monstruos[setfontcol none]!
¡Estamos a salvo de momento!.[wait 5].[wait 5].
[wait 15][setfontsize large]¡Huy! [setfontsize normal][wait 15]¡¿[Mario/Luigi]?! ¡Qué susto!
Kinopio003.JpJapanese:
ここなら、 [setfontcol blue]コワいトゲトゲ[setfontcol none]もいない!
<ruby>安心安全<rt>あんしんあんぜん</rt></ruby>、 わが<ruby>命<rt>いのち</rt></ruby>! [setfontsize large]・[wait 5]・[wait 5]・[wait 15]あ! [setfontsize normal][wait 15][Mario/Luigi]さん?!
Kinopio003.UsEnglish:
No [setfontcol blue]scary monsters [setfontcol black]up [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none]here! I'm safe
for now.[newpage]
[setfontsize large]Ahh! [setfontsize normal][wait 15][Mario/Luigi]?![wait 30] I was just
making sure we're all clear!
Kinopio003.UsFrench:
[setfontsize large]Ahh! [setfontsize normal]Oh! C'est toi, [wait 15]M. [Mario/Luigi]! Aucun
monstre effrayant ici! Nous sommes
en sécurité pour le moment!
Kinopio003.UsSpanish:
¡Aquí no hay [setfontcol blue]monstruos[setfontcol none]!
¡Estamos a salvo de momento!.[wait 5].[wait 5].
[wait 15][setfontsize large]¡Huy! [setfontsize normal][wait 15]¡¿[Mario/Luigi]?! ¡Qué susto!

Kinopio003_Flow000.EuDutch:
AAAAHHHH! Sir! [wait 15]We spotted a
[setfontcol red]monster [setfontcol black]over [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]here![setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.EuEnglish:
AAAAHHHH! Sir! [wait 15]We spotted a
[setfontcol red]monster [setfontcol black]over [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]here![setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.EuFrench:
Ohé! Capitaine! [wait 15]J'ai repéré un gros
[setfontcol red]monstre [setfontcol black]par [setfontcol red][setfontcol black]là-bas![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.EuGerman:
Kapitän! [wait 15]Wir haben hier drüben
ein riesiges [setfontcol red]Monster[setfontcol none] entdeckt!!!
Kinopio003_Flow000.EuItalian:
Aaah!
[wait 15]Abbiamo individuato un [setfontcol red]mostro
[setfontcol none]proprio lì!
Kinopio003_Flow000.EuSpanish:
¡Aaah! Eh... [wait 15]¡Hemos visto
un [setfontcol red]monstruo [setfontcol none]por aquí!
Kinopio003_Flow000.JpJapanese:
ああああ・・・ 
あ・・・ [wait 15]あんなトコロに、 [setfontcol red]<ruby>敵<rt>てき</rt></ruby>[setfontcol none] <ruby>発見<rt>はっけん</rt></ruby>ですよッッッ!!!!
Kinopio003_Flow000.UsEnglish:
AAAAHHHH! Sir! [wait 15]We spotted a
[setfontcol red]monster [setfontcol black]over [setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol black]here![setfontcol none]
Kinopio003_Flow000.UsFrench:
[setfontsize large]AAAAAHHH![setfontsize normal][newpage]
Capitaine! J'ai trouvé un énorme
[setfontcol red]monstre [setfontcol none]par ici!

Kinopio010_Flow001.EuDutch:
My brigade bailed on me when they
got scared! What happened to
bravely exploring the unknown?!
Kinopio010_Flow001.EuEnglish:
My brigade bailed on me when they
got scared! What happened to
bravely exploring the unknown?!
Kinopio010_Flow001.EuFrench:
Les membres de ma brigade ont eu
peur et m'ont laissé tout seul ici! Où
est donc leur esprit d'aventure?!
Kinopio010_Flow001.EuGerman:
Der Suchtrupp hat sich vor Angst aus
dem Staub gemacht! Was ist nur aus
den furchtlosen Entdeckern geworden?
Kinopio010_Flow001.EuItalian:
La Truppa mi ha abbandonato appena
si è ritrovata nei guai! E dire che
eravamo in missione speciale...
Kinopio010_Flow001.EuSpanish:
Mi cuadrilla me dejó colgado a las
primeras de cambio... ¡¿Es que nadie
quiere explorar lo desconocido?!
Kinopio010_Flow001.JpJapanese:
ワタシを <ruby>置<rt>お</rt></ruby>いてくなんて、 ヒドい<ruby>隊員<rt>たいいん</rt></ruby>たちです!
せっかく<ruby>調査中<rt>ちょうさちゅう</rt></ruby>だったのに!!
Kinopio010_Flow001.UsEnglish:
My brigade bailed on me when they
got scared! What happened to
bravely exploring the unknown?!
Kinopio010_Flow001.UsFrench:
Ma brigade est partie sans moi...
Mes soldats sont trop peureux pour
explorer les mystères de l'inconnu!
Kinopio010_Flow001.UsSpanish:
Mi escuadrón salió huyendo en cuanto
se asustó... ¡¿Es que ya no hay nadie
que quiera explorar lo desconocido?!

Kinopio010_Flow002.EuFrench:
Poules mouillées!
[setfontsize small]Moi j'ai à peine peur...
Kinopio010_Flow002.EuItalian: [setfontsize small]A dir la verità... Anch'io ho paura!
Kinopio010_Flow002.JpJapanese: お<ruby>宝<rt>たから</rt></ruby> <ruby>調査中<rt>ちょうさちゅう</rt></ruby> [setfontsize small]・・・ボソッ

SignBoard000.EuDutch: [setfontcol red]Spin [setfontcol none]to grab a [setfontcol green]shell[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard000.EuEnglish: [setfontcol red]Spin [setfontcol none]to grab a [setfontcol green]shell[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard000.EuFrench:
[setfontcol red]Tournoie [setfontcol none]pour saisir
une [setfontcol green]carapace verte[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard000.EuGerman:
[setfontcol red]Dreh dich[setfontcol black], um dir
einen[setfontcol red][setfontcol none] [setfontcol green]Panzer [setfontcol black]zu schnappen[setfontcol green][setfontcol none]!
SignBoard000.EuItalian:
Con una [setfontcol red]piroetta
[setfontcol none]afferri un [setfontcol green]Guscio[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard000.EuSpanish:
¡Haz un [setfontcol red]Giro [setfontcol none]para coger
un [setfontcol green]caparazón verde[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard000.JpJapanese: [setfontcol red]スピン[setfontcol none]で [setfontcol green]コウラ[setfontcol black]<ruby>取<rt>と</rt></ruby>りな[setfontcol green][setfontcol none]
SignBoard000.UsEnglish: [setfontcol red]Spin [setfontcol none]to grab a [setfontcol green]shell[setfontcol none]!
SignBoard000.UsFrench:
[setfontcol red]Tourbillonnez [setfontcol none]pour
